review:
steamdeck不可となっていますが、2024/04/01時点で1時間程やってみたところ、普通にプレイできています。
ただし、左上の□アイコンを好奇心でクリックしたところウィンドウサイズが画面を超過してしまい、戻すのに苦労したので、触らないことをおすすめします。
デスクトップモードにしたりオプションでウィンドウサイズ、フルスクリーンを何回か変更していたら戻りましたが、一回では何故か戻らなかったので謎です。

author: {'steamid': '76561198269134448', 'num_games_owned': 460, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 2312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2312, 'last_played': 1711241174}
review:
[b] 史诗战斗幻想5不包含的特色…… [/b]
    [b]   不胜其烦的地雷战。 [/b]
    [b]   处处受限的存档点。 [/b]
    [b]   苦大仇深的主人公。 [/b]
    [b]   一去无返的事件点。 [/b]

EBF5给我的感觉就像是一个经验老道的RPG玩家自己所构想的奇幻冒险，摆脱了RPG游戏绝大多数的诟病。 
内容上，400M左右的游戏大小下有着不掺杂一丝水分的30-40小时的主线冒险 更别说高难下的挑战和全收集。
流程上，全程平衡性极佳，每一个地图小怪属性鲜明boss战有挑战，后期丝毫不缩水，几乎所有的怪物都可以捕捉，收集要素满满。
剧情上，充满了幽默风趣的轻松故事，主角团甚至还会和玩家经行互动。
美术风格有特色，地图探索感拉满，谜题虽多但并不复杂，而且充满了许多其他电子游戏要素（

如果你能接受有大量寻宝要素回合制游戏，那么EBF5绝对是上乘的佳作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198195066810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2, 'playtime_at_review': 4578, 'last_played': 1711732978}
review:
[h1] Para mim é o melhor rpg em turnos que já joguei. [/h1]
[b] Pontos positivos: [/b]
*História
*Diálogos
*Combate
*Complexidade
*Puzzles e segredos
*Personagens
*Missões secundárias

[b] Pontos negativos [/b]

*Fator diversão e replay (as vezes fica repetitivo e depois que você zera só por 2 motivos irá querer jogar de novo, ou por causa do custom mode, ou por causa das conquistas)
 
[h3] Nota: 9,5 [/h3] Pode comprar, bão d+, tenho mais de 500 horas somadas e eu o recomendo fortemente.

author: {'steamid': '76561199210513838', 'num_games_owned': 6, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 140, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1711445235}
review: An amazing 10/10 game that sticks to what it is, does it well, and has stood the test of time. Played this as a child and only ever remember good times. It is a good challenge if you want it to be with good gameplay that requires thought if you want to do well. The stats, equipment, characters, and abilities are all well balanced with no issues that I can complain about. I love the new collection mechanic that really adds to the collecting gameplay. I'm the kind of player that likes getting all the achievements, summons, abilities, and items personally. I really hope another is in the makes. Will 100% buy it if it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198400397246', 'num_games_owned': 53, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2470, 'last_played': 1688309449}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 5 serinin son rpg oyunudur, gerek savaş mantığıyla gerek yeni eklenen mekanikleriyle, gerek de birbirinden farklı oyun modları, bir ton achievementi, fazlasıyla özelleştirilebilen zorluk ayarlarıyla Epic Battle Fantasy serisinin en iyi oyunudur denebilir. Hikaye bakımından çok bir olayı yoktur ancak diyaloglar zaten çok değildir ve okumaya değecektir. Benim steamde olan 41 saatim telefondan oynadığım saatleri ve daha önce korsan indirdiğimde oyunu iki defa bitirmemi hesaba katmıyor bile yani oyunu sevdiyseniz baya uzun bir süre oynayabilirsiniz.

Normalde fiyatı da ucuz falan derdim ama steam dolara geçince 25TLden 25 dolara çıktı...

author: {'steamid': '76561198223423444', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9653, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9653, 'last_played': 1705683292}
review:
Si te gustan los RPG por turnos no te lo puedes perder, que digo, si eras de la época de los juegos flash o recreativas, te gustará aún más.

Sin combates aleatorios, muchísima personalización y si encima quieres dificultad, pontelo en la dificultad máxima y gozalo.

La música es magistral y te dará unas 50 horas más o menos de contenido si quieres hacerlo todo, puede que más si te cuestan los bosses opcionales... De los mejores RPG a la antigua que vas a jugar

author: {'steamid': '76561198142106336', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 9377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9377, 'last_played': 1708373924}
review:
Easily my favorite of the series and I'm still in the middle of getting all the achievements, which hopefully by the time anyone reads this I will have gotten them all.

This game is simply a must-have for anyone who enjoys turn-based RPGs inspired by classic Final Fantasies, it fortunately includes no random encounters as well, so that's always a treat! The story this time is a bit unique, and the main gameplay is even better with a lot more tactics and builds and the music is just as amazing as it's predecessors.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010541939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 777, 'playtime_forever': 3044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3044, 'last_played': 1558897631}
review:
Неплохая игра.
Конечно добавили много разного хорошего и интересного, но по сравнению с EBF4 пятая слишком затянута. Она проходится в два с половиной раза дольше - за 50 часов вместо 20 у четвёртой! Хоть новые механики и интересны, но некоторые бои и даже целые локации лишние. 
А в остальном игра неплохая, со смешными моментами; которые редки на фоне продолжительности игры, всё же предыдущие части были по гуще. Но даже не смотря на все недостатки, это одна из лучших игр в своём жанре!

author: {'steamid': '76561199017147357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5404, 'last_played': 1701702949}
review:
charming RPG with a lot LOT of stuff to do
fights have great variety with elemental factors applying to nearly everything and many gimmicks to attacks+enemies that don't have singular solutions
the core mechanics of the fights also heavily encourage having a backup plan and swapping members on the fly for best efficiency
game also has a lot of customization to add replay value not only in difficulty and equipment builds but also many things to switch up the way enemies work
some gripes however are the combat system slowing to a crawl when trying to revive your team and Epic difficulty outside of boss fights generally being a heavy slugfest 
my recommendations are:
1. lower difficulty below Epic for generic overworld fights (excluding [spoiler] special/scaling/!@#$ areas [/spoiler])
2. don't try any remixes/randomizers on first run
3. avoid neutral damage builds unless you have good reason, they tend to deal significantly less damage/way too much damage without/with preparation



I won't judge you for not disabling the cleavage setting.

author: {'steamid': '76561199580643732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1710526924}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024174503', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 8313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8279, 'last_played': 1709625596}
review:
Ну, я считаю её всётаки послабее 3 части и посильнее 4ой. Сделать безлапа конкретный персонажем выглядит как ок идея, хотя я всё ещё предпочитаю использовать стандартное трио: танк физик мэт, стеклянная магическая пушка полная воскрешения Натали, и универсал на танке. Остальные как то не вписываются, потому и ходят в резерве до лучших времён. Любому, кто захочет поиграть в эту игру я рекомендую глянуть на ютубе 1 и 2 часть для примерного понимания чё там ваще было (игры очень древние и короткие), и начать всётаки с третей части. Но тем не менее эта часть привнесла много хорошего - одно 7 небо чего стоит... Сюжет всё ещё эпичен, хотя как то просел с предыдущих частей (но только в начале, после сбора ОПГ вполне начинает нагонять), множество крайне мощных загадок сделали шаг вперёд - приходилось конкретно так подумать. Были собраны приветы со всего творчества купо геймса в этой вселенной - прямые отсылки на все 4 предыдущие части. Видно, что это кульминация - врятли 6 часть будет. В лучшем случае перезапуск или новая вселенная с похожими правилами. Я доволен данной игрой, хотя и врятли в захлёб наворачивать круги в НГ+, как я это делал много лет назад во времена моей школы, ещё на армор геймсе. Но я рад хотя бы тому, что я, уже выросший и вставший на ноги, смог сказать купогеймсу спасибо и купить весь набор ЕБФ. Жаль, что я врятли найду в себе силы сделать круг почёта по всей пятёрке. Купо, бери прунью за шкирку, а ренью за что высунутся, и твори что то новое. Не уходи в болото мобильного гейминга, здесь у тебя уже готовая фан база ПК бояр, что любят и ждут.

З.Ы. в следующий раз сделай красивую цифру ачивок, а то когда хвастаешься "собрал все 133 ачивки, то чёт не то, не звучит..."

author: {'steamid': '76561198383958617', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 4948, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4290, 'last_played': 1709994206}
review:
4버전 플래시 프리미엄으로 팔때부터 즐겼었고, 스팀판으로도 모든버전 구매 완료.

게임을 소개할때 수많은 장점을 논하는데, 사실 순수 턴제는 한물 간 분야긴 함. 난 어렸을때 재미지게 즐겼던 추억 + 수많은 개임사들이 자멸할때 인생작 4편보다 초월해 돌아왔다는 치사량의 뽕맛덕분에 정신을 차릴수 없었다. 평가를 이제 쓰는 이유는 뽕에 쓰러져서지 뭐.

게임을 즐기는 사람이라면 편하게 보이는 수많은 오마주, 그리고 무엇보다 게임은 즐기는것. 누구도 불편하지 않은, 제작자도 그저 구성지게 즐기는것만 생각해서 만든 그 구성. 과거를 추억하고 추억의 시리즈를 완결시키는데 완벽한 경험이었음.

과거의 향수 제외하고도 구성진 게임이니 츄라이츄라이.
4편도 재밌으니 턴제를 사랑한다면 찍먹 ㄱㄱ

review: I beat Epic Battle Fantasy 4 and had an amazing time, so I had to pick up the sequel when I saw it. I cannot recommend a game more than this if you like turn-based RPGs. It has humor, collecting, secrets, difficult/interesting combat, and so many references. Totally worth ever bit you're thinking of spending on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052679900', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3363, 'last_played': 1708047337}
review:
Traditional turn-based RPG, with excellent design. It's a parody of the genre, so don't expect anything serious plot wise. It's very self aware and it's part of the charm. 

Some things I like are how new gear is never a straight upgrade over older gear, and you are encouraged to switch equipment mid-battle at times. I think I've used every piece of gear and every spell I've acquired while playing the main story. Combat is some of the best turn-based RPG combat I've played. Every skill, every spell, every limit break, they all felt useful. Don't see that often. Soundtrack is full of bangers too! 

tl;dr top tier turn-based combat, buy it rn (also recommend playing the previous titles, they're all great!)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970521106', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 10177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8355, 'last_played': 1710049851}
review:
EBF5 is just... pleasant to play. The turn-based battle system is deep and rewards a good understanding of mechanics (especially on higher difficulties), and the game really focuses on making experimentation and individual battle encounters the center of strategy, rather than focusing too much on long-term planning or punishing resource management.

And of course the game is also just charming, though admittedly its style may not be for everyone. The game is just unabashedly silly, with plenty of humor (including quite a bit of sexual and dark humor, + you can turn the more mature elements off in the settings if you don't like that), but it also knows when to dial things back so it doesn't feel too obnoxious.

Basically, if you like RPGs - whether you're a hardcore player wanting a challenge, or just want to enjoy the silly writing, or anything in between - the game is definitely worth picking up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070808999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 7143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6738, 'last_played': 1709312798}
review:
This game is really good. It is a traditional turn-based combat, exploration with puzzles and the like RPG, and it does that really well, but it also knows when to stray from tradition. There are no random encounters, and you shouldn't need to grind at any point to get strong enough to face a new area. Equipment is upgradeable and each new piece of equipment has its own bonus effects, so new equipment is exciting but isn't going to instantly outclass everything you already had. No character is absolutely the best or worst, and the game encourages you to use all of them by letting you switch between them freely without taking up a turn. Your party heals for free whenever you aren't in combat, so every battle can be a challenge on harder difficulties, as the game is designed to not have free 'filler' fights.

 The combat system has changed a bit from previous games in the series, but I think the changes are well done. Gone is the traditional MP system, and instead more powerful attacks have a cooldown to prevent spamming them. The buff system has also been overhauled, and now instead of buffs stacking, they are replaced completely whenever a new buff/debuff happens for that stat- which makes battle tempo faster. The attack menus have been condensed in a way that is pretty intuitive- instead of a weak single target fire attack, and a strong one, and a multitarget one, there is one fire attack and after you pick it you can choose to make it a mass attack or a stronger single-target attack. 

The game doesn't take itself too seriously, with quite a bit of meta humor and references to other games, which I find charming but I know that's more subjective. It's weirdly cute, but every once in a while something really fucked up happens, and it just reminds me of older games in that way. Like haha ice cream monsters and then oh shit cosmic horror? Ohno. Its something that I really enjoy and its not like no one does it, but a lot of games tend to lean too far one way or the other for me when they try to balance it and I feel like this game has a good blend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198341862003', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 5402, 'last_played': 1712418874}
review:
THE definition of a hidden gem. This game is a must play for any turn based rpg fans, filled with amazing humour, tense battles and so SO much personality. Currently achivement hunting, and damn is it fun to do so!
Strays away from frustrating aspects of old RPGs such as mana systems (Strong skills are locked behind a turn cooldown), using many items after each battles (Characters heal automatically outside of combat) and no random encounters. Most encounters are optional, but you'll want to do each one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198086845387', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 2874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2871, 'last_played': 1711105599}
review:
[h1]Apotheosis of Indie Gaming.[/h1]
[b]THE[/b] JRPG everyone needs to play

During my 40+hr playthrough I had many random thoughts that I saved in a notepad file.

AFAIK The Dev actually reads reviews, sooo... Hiii Matt!!! You're the only sane person on the worst website ever (twitter) and my only reason to open it! Thank you for everything!!!

I finished the game on the pirated copy back in autumn 2022, and just like majority of Pirates (people of principles), I eventually bought it. Because the game is very good. [url=https://twitter.com/KupoGames/status/1743972159758663941]AAA Companies don't understand this[/url]

Back then my main reason to buy it was that I wanted to compare the ENG and RUS translations, and thankfully, I remembered some of the story 1.5 years after.

Without further ado, here are my "Random Thoughts"!

You can't play with Natalie's boobs in her dialogue portrait wtf???

Anna said that all fascists are Blond(e)s. Being a blond person myself, this made me die from laughter (because very true!!! I am a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ynglism]Slavic-Aryan[/url] myself!!!)

Russian translation is a real mixed bag. AFAIK Matt asked people who made Pirated Russian EBF4 translation to make the EBF5 one, but this time it's official.
During the very start of the game, the text feels really... weird. It really shows that it was made by people who most likely never did such a colossal project before, very similar to games such as Pixel Piracy (that was translated by my friend and even me a little bit LMAO).
BUT! After a dozen or so hours the people translating it finished The Glossary [spoiler](The reason why Nintendo games are rarely localized to Russian. God bless these 5 fans who are working on the Fire Emblem: Three Houses translation and don't accept any donations)[/spoiler]... and the game started to feel pretty natural!!! MOST of the stuff is translated correctly, even though it has some basic grammatical errors (Ш=Щ, Е=Ё, lack of commas, periods etc.). Also it has the "Russian Minecraft Translation Syndrome", when the not-really-serious game uses VERY book-ish words for the item/mob names.
The amount of meme speech is amazing! Closer to the end you can see Matt (character, not The Dev) referencing the Russian meme about Elon Musk, and also calling Chibi Knight a "Kikorik" (a reference to the famous children cartoon). This is 100% not what was in the original, but hellofalot fun!
Funny thing - League of Legends' Russian translation also has a lot of "Gamer Speech", but it feels so out of place and bad, while in EBF it feels natural!

You can turn off flashbangs!!! I hate this mechanic in games such as PAYDAY 2 or Counter-Strike, because it makes my eyes feel like they're bleeding. GodCat bless you, Matt.
UPD: Unfortunately the flashes are still there if you capture enemies Pok*mon-style!
UPD 2: Also Fire Spirits flash very often when they get hit many times with the Neon Valkyrie's miniguns

A lot of abilities got replaced or removed, so finally you don't have to click between several tabs of abilities to find the one you need!!! Also stuff like Lance's rockets are not random now!

The paper cutouts from EBF4 are back and they look GORGEOUS! When I look at them I want to recreate them IRL...

The backtracking here is done right! Around the time you get really bored fighting everyone, you get some new movement item that allows you to explore old locations, and it's kinda relaxing!

Also, EBF5 basically screams "OLD GAME" in the best way possible! There's SO MUCH optional content and goofy little things that you won't notice during your first/average playthrough!
I could listen to Izumi's "Chao" forever...
And this optional content is actually pretty fun to do! Unlike sidequests in something like Borderlands 2 (even though it's peak gaming) and Witcher 3 (hidden indie gem)

Mana got completely removed and swapped to Cooldowns. Best thing ever. [url=https://twitter.com/KupoGames/status/1750124836074946647]Relevant tweet from Matt[/url]
It's awesome how he decided to make a perfect game, while removing everything that made games unfun.

The world feels SO alive! If you pay attention to what's happening on the screens that you visited long ago, you may find .- ..- - .. ... - ...

A little bit more about piracy: Matt is a freaking genius. NPCs call you "super cool guy who paid money for the game" when you did not. It actually makes you feel bad, unlike crap with DRM. BTW! None of Matt's games have DRM!!!

Also apparently the game has multiple endings (bad, neutral, and good)
During my first playthrough I got the bad ending, and you know what? Even now it feels the most canon one. The protagonists didn't forgive each other for what they've done to each other, and continued to act the way they are.
The thing is that all of the 4.5 protags are completely unlikable morons, and this is what makes them so lovable!!! And out of all games this one shows it the best!

UPD: During my second playthrough it seems that I also got the bad ending, because Anna didn't became friends with the boys. It's funny because back in 2022 the only paired ending I got was Lance x Anna, and I started shipping them even before I finished the game.

Aaand that's it!

GO PLAY IT!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198045143501', 'num_games_owned': 390, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1706182576}
review:
Probablemente edite cuando me pase el juego.

A primera vista recuerda totalmente a los clásicos juegos flash de armorgames y newgrounds, aunque reconozco que una vez en el juego, alberga una sorprendente cantidad y relativa buena calidad en los efectos visuales de combate.
El terreno sigue la escuela de Legend of Zelda en cuanto a la rejugabilidad de las zonas basada en la adquisición de herramientas que las van desbloqueando.

El gameplay es simplista y sin embargo ofrece un abanico de opciones suficientemente grande como para permitir al jugador adaptarse a cada desafío o simplemente cambiar radicalmente la especialización de cada personaje. Y hacerlo es necesario para superar los combates mas complicados. En definitiva una recompensa adecuada por el esfuerzo creativo de los jugadores, que  es probablemente la característica mas requerida y a la vez la mas difícil de implementar en un videojuego que aspire a ser de calidad.

A medida que vaya progresando podré editar esta parte de la reseña, correspondiente al grado de grindeo necesario para progresar.

En definitiva, buscaba cobre y acabé encontrando oro. Todo un descubrimiento gracias a Kokojo y la comunidad de Final Fantasy Hacktics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198451800443', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 7148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6510, 'last_played': 1706076921}
review:
内容多，战斗爽，美术好等等这游戏把太多JRPG应有的东西做的相当好，没有恶心人的剧情，没有倒霉的事件，全程都像郊游一样就拯救世界了，跟前几作一样，而且一点都不会无趣，因为作者太懂梗了，每个人物都有一大堆吐槽的话，每个角色性格分明，可能你玩了好几个周目还会看到以前没说过的话，而且现在再看也不觉得过时
难度的话非常人性化，除了官方的作弊和挑战以外，只要你对各种抗性防御有稍微一点了解，那最高难度也是相当简单，如果你没玩最高难度，那你就可以随便穿个自己觉得好看的一路平推了，很贴心的在图书馆里有非常多的小贴士，如果觉得困难可以去看，可以说很用心了
每一个玩这个游戏的人都应该把前几部都玩了，虽然看起来不是一个世界观，但是其中有很多联动相当有意思，不输游戏本身的某些梗，比如这部里安娜提到一个喜欢和史莱姆玩的女孩，在4的新手村，3里面雪地有四个雪人，主角会提到四勇士收集水晶的故事，是4的剧情，兰斯抓的一个小迷妹，从4就开始追着他不放了
真正让一个游戏圆满的并不是游戏本身，而是作者，现在游戏制作风气不好，很多时候游戏制作者只是把玩家当韭菜，但是这款很多年前的游戏，如果你玩到了大画廊，你就绝对不会有“这作者在捞我钱”的感觉。如果你去到它的官网，你可以了解到这个作者的生活和三观，他有坚持与网友分享自己每一段时间的经历与感受
说句实话，80，不高不低的价格，你去找吧，你找不到比这个玩着更舒服的JRPG

author: {'steamid': '76561199073316265', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 755, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 696, 'last_played': 1706037387}
review:
这部作品对JRPG的一些老毛病做了人性化的优化，是比较难得的，比如碰到敌人时，只要我们不选择攻击，就不会强制进入战斗……虽然想这么说，但这个改动在游戏中其实显得非常鸡肋。因为游戏里有大量的小怪会拦在路口，不打这个怪就过不了这条路，不打这个小怪就拿不到宝箱里的那几个材料（这点也让人不满意，为了宝箱打怪，但里面放的都是些常见的材料）。

其次，游戏在进入中期后就开始滥用群怪。一场和小怪的战斗，只有3个怪的情况都属于少见了，多数时候怪的数量都在4~5个（甚至一场战斗还有2~3波群怪），而且怪的血量也被大大拉高了（即便我玩的是简单难度，装备和技能也有及时升级也无济于事，因为出的都是大怪），因此每场战斗都显得非常繁琐。在男二刚加入队伍时，他的炸弹之母作为一个强力的AOE短暂地将我从繁琐的战斗中解放了出来。但很快，这个技能即使升到满级，并在吃了队友的增伤buff后，都难以一发解决战斗了——小怪战中炸几个低血量的小怪还能差不多秒杀，炸大型怪则顶多炸掉半血了。

在p5r、天穹少女法妮雅（苍蓝星）这两款jrpg中，都有设计当角色等级高于怪物较多时的接敌秒杀功能，这使得这两款游戏在后期完全可以当成《只狼》来玩，想办法去背刺秒杀敌人，从而避免繁琐的战斗。我知道这种做法让玩家跳过战斗，无法体验到作者设计的新的机制怪带来的游戏体验。但说实话游戏中大量怪物的素材复用（光是史莱姆，石头怪，灌木换了个颜色重新出现的情况都有多少了……），对我来说，战斗很难体验到什么新鲜感——扫描看属性，逃跑，重新进入战斗，给队友上增伤buff，削弱敌方防御，猫和男二各来一发大威力AOE，然后开始对大怪针对性补伤害……

即便不用背刺，对比一下p5r发给玩家的官方逃课外挂，大神的数万真言，来几波秒几波。我觉得这款史诗战斗幻想5，既然想要解构传统的JRPG，并去优化玩家体验，改进其中不合理的地方的话，只有目前这种程度是远远不够的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198329390566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1588, 'last_played': 1708180771}
review: The EBF series has been my most memorable game since my early exposure to internet and flash games. It's the kind of game I go back after a long break forgetting it, and return happily when the mood is right again. Just decided to support even further by buying it on Steam. The 5th one is pretty much the culmination of every previous series mechanics and imo the most unique take of a turn based fighting game. Characters and npc all have their silly personalities and interactions. Designs all sick and cute with sometime subtle details you'd miss until you look again. THE SONGS is something I LOVE putting them in repeat in spotify. Phyrnna make the most memorable osts in video game ever <3. For the first time in my life, I decided trying to 100% medals on this playthrough. Wish me luck! Thank you, really, for creating this series as a core part of my childhood

author: {'steamid': '76561198091135459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 3056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3056, 'last_played': 1693279948}
review:
the finale of the series. pretty fun, lots of things to enjoy. there's difficult combat requiring good strategies, complex puzzles, a bunch of hidden secrets (puzzles, references, etc) and uh, boobs?

it is a shame there isnt gonna be a sixth one, but I understand why. sometimes you just wanna be done with something, thats fine. it's great when good media has unfinished areas (storylines, mechanics, that kinda stuff. not plotholes and things) because it just lends itself to the user's imagination!

I enjoy. it would be nice if it was easier to capture bosses though. not like, increase their catch rate, but make it so that you can go back and try again. my first run there were a couple bosses I wasnt able to catch (either they died when i was trying to catch them or I just didn't bother trying very hard) it would be nice if I didnt have to worry about setting a manual save right before fighting them, because it autosaves after winning battles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285573455', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 2206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2014, 'last_played': 1705044492}
review:
恰巧最近在重温dq5，没想到一上手ebf5就废寝忘食把dq5抛在脑后，一口气打通关，不得不感慨明雷遇怪真是人类的好文明。
而跟老式的jrpg一比，ebf5的优点也愈发耀眼：没有蓝条，技能想用就用，没有刷级的需求，不用一路暗雷受尽折磨，随时随地的自动存档，战斗间随意切换后备的角色，就连战斗结束后都是快速自动回血，可以说是摈弃了古早jrpg的大部分垃圾时间。
既然ebf5乐意节省玩家的时间，来让玩家专心享受战斗，也说明了ebf5在回合制战斗这一块内容上，素质是绝对过硬的。基于属性克制系统，ebf5以丰富的buff和debuff，甚至还有一系列中性词缀的相互影响，极大程度地让回合制战斗变得变化莫测——而这其中，我个人最为推崇的是ebf5把随机技能加入了装备词条中，游戏中有大量类似“自动复活”、“再动一回合”这样的强力buff，是可以通过装备特定武器或者衣服还有饰品时，随机在每回合开始时概率触发的。这也使得哪怕是同一场战斗，按照同一指令进行攻略，都可能产生不同的局面。而由于这些技能几乎百分百是对玩家有益的，且触发概率极高（比如像“自动复活”这种神级buff，我个人感觉的触发几率甚至都百分之五十左右），于是游戏的战斗部分处处都有种免费抽卡的快感，尤其在跟强敌战斗时，在血线紧张且身上被敌人下了各种强力debuff时，这种救命时刻经常会发生，有惊无险的感觉非常刺激。
而与战斗多样性配套的，就是令人眼花缭乱的装备池和技能池了。30多小时通关，我大概还有近半的装备和技能没收集到，而已经收集到的装备中，也还有三分之一左右没有升级到顶。ebf5里每一件装备的区分度都非常高，有专门用偷东西的，有专门奶人的，有专门走防御流的，有走debuff流的，有专门用来捕捉宠物的，更别提火、水、雷、风、土、毒、爆、冰、无、圣、暗各种元素用来属性克制的本职作用的。而这些装备以及技能，每强化一级带来的提升也不仅仅是数值的增长，而是会增加某种新能力！比如某件衣服，当你强化一级的时候会额外增加冰属性威力提升，强化到三级时会附带战斗中可能召唤出强力的猛犸象为你攻击敌人，强化到五级时会附带提高捕捉怪物的成功概率。这也使得游戏的一大乐趣除了找寻新装备和新技能之外，更是好奇这些新装备和新技能升级到满级时究竟会有什么意想不到的效果。
得益于这些足够丰富的养成要素，ebf5几乎夸张到每一场战斗结束后都会让玩家获得一定明显的提升，而应接不暇的探索要素又会紧接在战斗后出现——密集的宝箱、永久性属性成长食物、可获得新技能的支线任务、能够解开之前无法到达之地谜题的新道具等等，都会堆放在怪物身后的必经之路。于是游戏的正反馈便完成了循环，玩家时时刻刻都能感觉到新东西的出现，时时刻刻都能感到自己在变强，异常得上头。
只要是回合制jrpg爱好者，都推荐一玩！

author: {'steamid': '76561198049792048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1655089021}
review:
IMHO, a step down from its predecessors EBF 4 & 3. Too much slow grind, too many unnecessary systems of progression, too long to get the full party together. In the 5 hours I played, I still did not unlock Lance! I have no idea what level he will be, but now they will not all be even. I was excited to play as NoLegs, but he seriously sucks. He's okay at killing multiple weak monsters, but that is not a very useful niche since every character has good multi-target skills for that. Against bosses he's nigh useless.

But still, if you want more EBF in your life this is a good time. In a vacuum, it's better than 90% of the RPGs on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094088847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 7032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6998, 'last_played': 1702742469}
review:
Одна из ульт местной магички Натали - чистый живительный фансервис. Берите не задумываясь. 

А теперь давайте серьёзно. 
ЖРПГ, высмеивающая штампы ЖРПГ и делающая это достойно - редкость. ЖРПГ которая при этом не имеет унылый затыкивательный геймплей, основанный чисто на циферках - ещё большая редкость. Комбинация предыдущих двух пунктов - это вообще забей, один на миллион. И что ж, вся франшиза Epic Battle Fantasy как раз таковой является. Удивительно, как всё началось с пары скромных флеш-игр с пошаговой боёвкой, а потом переросло в полноценную РПГ. 
Рисовка очень даже прекрасна, и это я говорю не только про "ту самую" ульту, но и про всё остальное в принципе - локации проработаны добротно, атаки и спеллы на высшем уровне, ОСОБЕННО ульты, враги так и вовсе на всякий лад - тут вам и кошасто-ушастая няшность, и андеды разных мастей, и тонны всяких тварей, даже тентаклемонстр есть! 
Геймплей - просто прекрасен. Как я уже говорил, в отличие от многих ЖРПГ здесь всё не сводится к тому, что в лейте ты начинаешь тупо нажимать пару кнопок и давить всех боссов миллиардами урона, нужно реально думать, что и как юзать, и как те или иные эффекты взаимодействуют друг с другом, кому стоит дать одни спеллы, а кому лучше дать что-нить другое, про разнообразие билдов вообще молчу - ту же Наташку можно сделать либо бешеной стеклопушкой, взрывающей всё живое АОЕ-спеллами всех возможных элементов, либо затанкованным саппортом, раздающим хилы, ресы и баффы направо и налево, либо и вовсе дать ей косу/нож и заставить шинковать врагов обычными атаками! Или та же Анька - мощный физдамагер, баффер, или даже хилер почище Наташки? Решайте сами! А уж если прибавить ко всему этому возможность ловить мобов, где у КАЖДОГО моба есть свои способности, ВКЛЮЧАЯ БОССОВ? Ну, тактическое разнообразие зашкаливает... (по крайней мере пока вы не поймаете Монолит Викингов и не начнёте прожимать его на каждом боссфайте, кек)
Сюжет по факту звёзд с неба не хватает и всерьёз себя не воспринимает, но, как уже понятно из предисловия, ему это не сильно нужно - данная игра по максимуму высмеивает различные штампы ЖРПГ и прочего подобного медиа, да и своих особых шуточек в игре тоже вполне хватает.
Перевод вполне себе неплох, совсем уж явных косяков не довелось обнаружить, а некоторые шутки адаптированы максимально орно. 

Из минусов - первое время вы только и будете делать, что сканировать врагов и отбегать, дабы потом уже лицом вперёд пойти либо на верную смерть, либо на халявные дропы. Также ближе к лейту начинается нервотрёпка с некоторыми боссами и эквипами.
Алсо, за систему сезонных квестов мне хочется дать Мэтту по шапке. 

Вердикт? Берите, если фанатеете от пошаговых РПГ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000165920', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2326, 'last_played': 1702042684}
review:
做完一个传统JRPG爱好者来说，本作完全是价廉物美优质的体现，非常传统的2D画面，三职业，主动技能大招+可自选技能，配上装备的多样化，导致人物的性能在不同配置下有很大的区别。抓宠物后的技能也非常强力和实用，技能升级也不光是数值的上升，有单体变群体的区别，武器和防具升级后有相应的被动，战斗后能自动恢复，怪物数值一键扫描，无条件撤退，明雷，过图自动记录，继承了一切传统JRPG的优秀系统又有自己的发挥。地图又有包含很多隐藏，有探索和解谜的乐趣。战斗难度不光有传统的难度系统，还有多种自定义的设定，完全突出了是一个爱好游戏的玩家做出的真正是给大家玩的游戏，诚意满满。
缺点的话，剧情方面十分羸弱，但是梗非常多，也是很大的乐趣，后期的话就算不特意刷怪，技能也都升满了导致后期的正反馈较弱，战斗不免会有烦躁的感觉，但是瑕不掩瑜，非常优秀的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066097296', 'num_games_owned': 470, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 3514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3514, 'last_played': 1683421768}
review: Very easily the most fun you can have with a traditional turn-based RPG party combat system. If you've played [i] literally any other turn-based RPG [/i] and been left wanting for better combat - please just try this. Everything is handled expertly - all equippables have unique effects and getting a new weapon or armor piece doesn't mean tossing out the old one, it just means you have a new tool to use; hell, I think I'd used every single item and ability at least once by the time I finished the main game, let alone postgame stuff. Couple that with being able to spend an action to completely change a character's loadout and you can do some really goofy shit mid-fight. And the status effects are STUPIDLY fun to play around with - you aren't limited to 5 different flavors of stun and DoT-effects like Pokemon or other titles, you've got stuff like Tired that act as debuff-over-time effects that can be used to bypass immunity to certain stat debuffs, plus neutral statuses like Dry and Wet that can alter your elemental defenses, and to go even further some of these can combine into other statuses like Bad Luck and Doom instantly killing any target afflicted with both! Every single JRPG fan should play this, and every single JRPG dev should take notes. This is peak turn-based combat, as much as that word has lost meaning.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191227494', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 803, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 741, 'last_played': 1702746546}
review:
I genuinely don't know if there will ever be a game that hits that sweet spot quite as well as EBF5 has, and that deeply disappoints me.

Not only has the series been a substantial part of my childhood, not only is it being largely an indie dev incredibly impressive, not only is the OST very good (one particular "secret" song in fact has made me cry), but just... I don't know man. It's actually quite hard to put into words what makes this game so special, other than that it's just an incredible feat of effort and determination from a developer who has refined every game-dev skill he had over a decade to make this magnitude of a product.

Good shit, Kupo. You made what has to be my favorite RPG ever.

review:
Jogo magnífico, simples de entender a mecânica, bem humorado e com uma história show. Com os conteúdos extras ( já vem incluso quando você compra ) torna mais legal ainda, e como um bom RPG, tem uma pancada de segredos e coisas escondidas.
 Dá pra tornar o jogo mais infantil nas configurações caso queira, sem dúvida uma opção que deveria ter em mais jogos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212945513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 17097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17090, 'last_played': 1711058377}
review:
Melhor RPG que já joguei - pelo menos no quesito gameplay.

Existe uma quantidade absurda de conteúdo pra explorar e masterizar, além de opções de remixar aspectos do jogo para aumentar o nível de rejogabilidade que é o maior que já vi em um rpg.

O sistema de climas e captura e uso de inimigos é divertido e interessante, e adiciona novas camadas na hora de e]criar estratégias.

Ah, e não tem como esquecer das opções de desafios que melhoram MUITO a experiência do jogo, além de obviamente dificultá-lo consideravelmente.

Enfim, o jogo em quesito gameplay e rejogabilidade é 10/10

OST 7/10
 -A música no geral é boa. As músicas de área são todas ótimas. No entanto, as músicas de combates normais sofrem em quantidade, não havendo muitas delas em relação à quantidade de encontros inimigos que o jogo proporciona. 
As melhores músicas estão no endgame, reservadas para chefes extras e maratonas.

História 4/10
 -História serei sincero, não sou muito fã. Acho bem meh, e notei que o diálogo pré chefe final segue a mesma fórmula do EBF3,4 e BH2, oq é bem decepcionante quando se percebe. 

Humor 8/10
-Tem uma quantidade considerável de diálogos engraçados e umas referências boas que foram adaptadas baseadas na cultura brasileira durante a tradução do jogo, oq é algo que admiro e que mostra que houve esforço envolvido nas traduções do jogo.

Visual 10/10´
-Eu simplesmente gosto muito do visual desse jogo. É bonitinho com um estilo de arte fofo, além de ser bem colorido

author: {'steamid': '76561198359144642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 7142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7036, 'last_played': 1702435191}
review:
Finalmente me decidí a completar al 100% el juego y debo decir que es tal y como lo recuerdo, hecho con cariño y que se nota que lo hizo alguien con amor a su juego.
Me trae completos recuerdos de cuando jugué a los anteriores en flash y a su vez recuerdos de cuando impacientemente me metía a la pagina a ver cada actualización de este juego, probando la demo de combate y todo lo que se podía ofrecer.
Ojala que si llega el día en que salga un EBF6 se note este mismo amor y cariño. Ojalá perder la memoria para volver a gozarme este juegazo, 10/10 lo volvería a comprar.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991391480', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 9640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5868, 'last_played': 1702497729}
review: Don't let its Flash game origins fool you, EBF5 is a polished product with lots of features even the big boys can't be bothered with. The fights are tough, but you can see them coming, the healing is generous, and you can save anytime you're not in battle. There's also auto-mapping, tool tips for status effects, and tons of achievements to earn. Oh, and lots and lots of silly humor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361274550', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3870, 'last_played': 1698236869}
review: Never played any other turn based RPG's like this one and i went into this with a recommendation from a friend. Gotta say this game is freaking amazing, from the story to the love and care put into every single bit of detail and all the references, im amazed. Gameplay is soo much fun considering all the different combinations you can use to exploit the enemies weaknesses and maximize the damage (i like big numbers :)). You can also capture almost every single foe out there and they are really, like really useful so you should do that if you decide to play this game. Definitely an amazing recommendation from me!

author: {'steamid': '76561199056695590', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2342, 'last_played': 1682069345}
review: Я фанат да мозга кастей этай АХУЕННАЙ ой извините ЕБАТЬ КАКОЙ ПРЕКРАСТНАЙ ДА БЛЯТЬ НЕ АДНАВО СЛОВА НЕ ХВАТИТ ЧТОБЫ АПИСАТЬ ЭТУ ИГРУ ЕЁ НИКТО И НИКАГДА НЕ ТРОГАЕТ ВИЗДЕ НИКТО СУКА НИКТО И ЭТА САМАЯ ЛУТШАЯ ЧАСТЬ ВСЕЕЕЕЕЙ СЕРИЙ ТВАЮ МАТЬ СКАЧЯЙ ПИРАТКУ ПАСЛУШАЙ САУНДТРЕКИ И ПАИМИ АНИ ЗАХВАТЫВАЮТ ТВАЮ ДУШУ КАГДА ТЫ ИХ СЛУШАЕШ ТЫ БУДЕШ НЕТ ТЫ СУКА БУДИШ ЗАХВАТЫВАТЬ ВСЁ И ВСЯ Я БЛЯТЬ ПРАШОЛ EPICK BATTLE FANTASY 5 НА ВСЕ АЧИВКИ НА 100% НЕТ 112% ЭТА БЛЯТЬ ЛУТШАЯ ИГРА В МИРЕ ТОЛЬКА ЗАИДИ НА ЛЮБОЙ САИТ ПАСЛУШАЙ ПЕСНИ ИЗ ЭТАЙ ИГРЫ ВЕРНИСЬ СЮДА И КУПИ ЕЁ ИЛИ Я ПРИДУ К ТЕБЕ ДАМОЙ С ТАПАРОМ И АТРУБЛЮ ТЕБЕ ЕБАЛА ЭТА ЛУТШАЯ ИГРА БЛЯТЬ ВА ВСЁМ МИРЕ НИЧТО И НИКТО НЕ СМОЖЫТ С НЕЙ СРАВНИЦА У ИГРЫ ИДИАЛЬНАЯ АПТИМИЗАЦЫЯ ЛУТШАЯ, ЛУТШЫЙ СУКА СЮЖЕТ И ЕЩЁ БОЛЕЕ ЛУТШАЯ СИСТЕМА ПРАКАЧКИ ПЕРСА ЭТА ЛУУУУТШАЯ RPG FLASH ИГРА В ИСТОРИЙ АНА ЖЫЛА ЖЫВЁТ И БУДИТ ЖЫТЬ ЕЁ НИКТО НЕ СМОЖЫТ ПРЕВЗАИТИ ДАЖЕ ТВОЙ WORL OF WARCRAFT И ДРУГИЕ ПАПУЛЯРНЫЕ ИГРЫ ЭТА ИГРА АЛИЦЫТВАРЯЕТ ТО ЧТО НЕ ВАЖНА ЕСТЬ В ИГРЕ MULTY PLAYER ИЛИ НЕТ ЕСТЬ В НЕЙ МОДЫ ИЛИ НЕТ АНА АЛИЦЫТВАРЯЕТ ТО ЧТО ДАЖЕ ИГРА С ХУЁВЫМИ ПРЕДМЕТАМИ БУДИТ СУКА ЛУТШАЯ ЕСЛИ В НЕЙ ЕСТЬ ВСЁ ЧТО ТЫ ТАК ДАВНО ЖЫЛАЛ ДАЖЕ ГОЛЫЕ БАБЫ  ТУТ ЕСТЬ СУПЕР АТАКИ МИЛИАРДЫ АРУЖЫЙ ЮБКИ ДЛЯ ТЁЛАК ИХ ВСЕГО 2 НО СУКА КАКИЕЖЕ АНИ АХУЕННЫЕ ЭТА БЛЯТЬ ЛУТШАЯ ИГРА АЛИЦЫТВАРЯЮЩЕЯ ТО ЧТО В ИГРЕ НЕЛЬЗЯ НАХАДИЦА МОДАМ НУЖНА ВСЕВОЛИШТА 4 ПЕРСАНАЖА ДАХУЯ АРУЖЫЯ ЛУТШЫЕ ЗАПАМИНАЮЩИЕСЯ ВРАГИ ЛОР И САМАЕ АХУЕННАЕ ЭТА ДАСТИЖЕНИЯ АСОБЕННА АНИ , АНИ РЕАЛЬНА ЗАХВАТЫВАЮТ ЗАИДИ В EPICK BATTLE FANTASY ХЭЛОИНАМ НА РАЖДЕСТВО НА ПАСХУ И ТЫ АХУЕЕШ ИБА АНА ПРИВЯЗЫНА К ТВАЕМУ ВРЕМИНИ И АНА ЗНАЕТ КАГДА ХЭЛОУИНИ ИЛИ ПАСХА НОВЫЕ ПРЕДМЕТЫ МАТЬ ВАШУ НАДЕНЬ БЕЛЫЕ ПЕРЧЯТКИ ТЫ ПРИТРАГИВАЕШСЯ К ИСКУСТВУ САСУНОК

author: {'steamid': '76561198859685754', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 344, 'playtime_at_review': 9982, 'last_played': 1712398658}
review:
ちょうど5年前,私が小学6年生だったとき,このゲームを期待を胸に購入したのを覚えている。当時の私は期待を胸にこのゲームをプレイした。
以下.私が印象に殊に残ったことをネタバレにならない程度に箇条書きで打ち込む。

まず,いままでの作品と異なり,MPという概念が消失し,代わりにクールタイムが追加された。MPを大量消費して強力なスキルに依存することができず,戦略を求められている。
さらに,敵にはそれぞれ元素の耐性・弱点がある。(原則として)　さらに,様々なステータスを使って大ダメージを付与することや,味方のダメージを最小にすることも可能だ。
さらに,主人公やその3人と1匹の愉快な物語もまた面白い。本当に。

つまりは面白いゲームということです。ぜひ買ってね!

author: {'steamid': '76561198126519367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1708422140}
review:
Way underappreciated series this one. Fans are obsessed, but more people just should know about this. Everything is done just so right. And yes you can grind but there is little need to, just maybe rebattle something if you want to upgrade an equipment, the pacing of the game makes it mostly needless,
The humor is good, and there is a right amount of it. It's not a comedy, just something to make you giggle every now and then. And the characters are likeable, even the n*zi, just the right amount.
For new players i tend to recommend the new part. But the previous ones are just as much valid today than they were back in the days the series started. The 3 and up are good for casual RPG with story, the 1 and 2 are challenges for even experienced RPG players. No lack of challenges later either, but the pacing makes it less hardcore.

Also. The best soundtrack of all games ever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198863210548', 'num_games_owned': 31, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4985, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3833, 'last_played': 1705793225}
review:
[Graphics] : Similar to EBF4 {Flash(-esque) graphics}, but with more detailed designs and fluid animations

[Combat Gameplay] : The MP system being replaced with Cooldown took me a bit to get used to from EBF4, but ended up being just as good if not better in some respects. If you're new to the series, then you might adapt to this system more easily.

[Overall Gameplay] : Like its predecessor, very addictive as the sheer hoard of hidden items and treasures almost seemed infinite throughout my playthroughs. I continued to find more even as soon as I thought I had all of them. This isn't even mentioning the hidden areas and their own odd stories. 

[Difficulty] : Slightly harder than its predecessor, though this is not a flaw of course--just my two cents coming from someone who played EBF4 numerous times. This is just my experience and probably because I had to adapt to the Cooldown system as opposed to the preceding games. 

[Controls] : Pretty standard mouse and keyboard. 

[Technical] : As someone who frequently lost their saves in the previous game prior to Version 2.0, backup saves are a very welcome addition, along with other changes that include a smoother experience overall with no history of crashes. 

[Art] :  The new animations and Limit Breaks are vastly improved with much more detail than EBF4 and the rest. This is not even mentioning the other art-styles/mediums being represented here that give the game a whole new flavor of experience. 

[Consensus] : Very good, the only real complaints are some boss attacks and even then that's probably due to 'skill issue' and whatnot. Overall, a very splendid game for both veterans and newcomers alike, and even I who had only played one other game; albeit with much amusement akin to here. A surprisingly addictive gameplay along with other features such as new areas and mechanics bring yet another game to come back to over and over again. 

[Rating] : 9.8/10 

- A recurring plot point is never brought to conclusion, one I cannot spoil due to my horrendous formatting knowledge {or lack thereof}. [-0.2]

- A few attacks I found to be unfair, and even then that's probably my own incompetence speaking. I will let the comments, if any, decide this segment. 
   [-?.?]

author: {'steamid': '76561198855088518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 5373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4890, 'last_played': 1706236865}
review:
One of the few RPGs I've ever played where I enjoyed it beginning, middle, end. 

In some ways, I found Epic Battle Fantasy 5 to be more a puzzle than an RPG, especially on harder difficulties: What armor should my party be wearing for this fight? Which skills and summons should I have equipped? This boss has a gimmick that seems impossible to beat... what's the trick here? ([spoiler]Looking at you, Neon Valhalla...[/spoiler]) I love that I can't cheese my way out of most fights and I love that, at the same time, there are multiple effective strategies you can use.

Some of the optional side dungeons and bosses are more grindy for my liking, but that's not an inherently bad thing; they're optional for a reason. The best thing about this game is that its difficulty customization settings make this the perfect game for someone who's never played an RPG before and for someone who is a pro at these kind of games. (For reference, I've played this game on Epic difficulty with no handicaps.) A fun challenge can be found for everyone.

This is particularly a fun game for collecting achievements. If you intend to collect all 133, good luck!

Overall, this game has a lot of charm, humor, and love put into it and you can clearly tell. For that alone, I recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088952588', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5599, 'last_played': 1625490282}
review:
Je crois que j'ai jouer au 4 sur armor games en flash a l'époque. 
Le 5 c'est un peu la conclusion d'une histoire dont on aimerait qu'elle ne finisse jamais. 
J'ai adorer les codes pris au RPG vanilla ( le tour par tour, les status/buffs, les invocations et l'optimisation d'équipements) 
Le jeu n'est pas dur en soi sur l'histoire principale, mais propose des défis incroyables bourrés de références en secondaire/easter eggs .
On s'attache vite à l'équipe des protagonistes ainsi qu'à l'ost insane des combats/ambiances (phyrna toujours au top )
Ce RPG c'est un peu une ode à la nostalgie et à l'aventure, pourtant si simple dans son essence

author: {'steamid': '76561198046268101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 2607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2607, 'last_played': 1693750276}
review:
Flashベースのアニメーションが楽しいJRPG。マウスのみで操作可能。
戦闘と宝箱回収をしながら雪原から溶岩地帯まで行動範囲を広げていき各地方のボスを倒しつつゴールを目指します。
ストーリー演出と移動時間は少な目でコンパクトにまとまっています。NPCもたくさんいますが無理に会話しなくてもゲームは進みます。
一番楽しいのは宝箱から装備品が出た瞬間で、装備ごとに属性や追加効果が違うので初期に入手した装備でも最後まで出番があります。寄り道要素も多いですが変な装備品が手に入ったりするので徒労感はありません。
先を急がないアイテムコレクターにおすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561197986527965', 'num_games_owned': 726, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 3683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3683, 'last_played': 1688446994}
review:
If you liked EBF 3 & 4, you're almost certainly going to like this.

The biggest changes in this one include the following:

No Legs as an additional fifth character that functions as a multi-attack/support character whose survival depends on his ability to evade incoming damage as he has low health.

The MP system has been replaced with a cooldown system.

In-combat weather which depending on the weather type potentially does something to both your party and enemies such as dealing damage, providing buffs/debuffs, and other things.

The optional ability to capture enemies/bosses. Each of these has a differing special ability that you can use as a summon in battle with SP (summoning points). Regular enemies are easy to capture while elite/bosses are tougher to catch. Some equipment upgrades require having certain monsters captured to spend to upgrade the equipment.

EBF 5 is more of the same of the previous games. It has a lighthearted humorous plot/story/characters while providing compelling turn based combat gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093372996', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2533, 'last_played': 1691503384}
review:
"A memorable and humorous adventure."

SCORE: 8.5/10

REVIEW:

"Winds of the past waft my nose with nostalgic air."

Epic Battle Fantasy 5 takes me on a nostalgic journey back to the flash games of my childhood. Back in those days, when my family first introduced a shared PC, I would often find myself engrossed in the world of Kongregate or watching AVGN reviews. It was around the age of ten that I stumbled upon the Epic Battle Fantasy series, and I've been following it avidly ever since.

This latest instalment, helmed by the talented Matt Roszak, continues to uphold the essence of those classic flash games while delivering a modern and engaging experience. While Epic Battle Fantasy 5 doesn't necessarily introduce ground-breaking quality-of-life features or redefine gaming mechanics, it doesn't need to. What it does offer is a labour of love spanning over a decade, evident in every pixel and line of code.

I recommend this to anybody who want to relive their childhood playing flash games or even just avid Turn-Based RPG enthusiasts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144595474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 20417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20417, 'last_played': 1689509568}
review:
唉 雖然過了將近4 5年
我也是當時參予翻譯人員之一
很抱歉因為生活上的事物 沒在第一時間邊遊玩邊校正
導致文本還有漏網的簡體字跟對岸用詞
因為翻譯群組就是簡繁就歸類中文一組
原文是先翻成簡體再轉繁體
雖然閒暇時就硬尻原文意思 修改適合本人投入該角色或當地的詞彙(本人是台灣人) 
仍不免看漏了眼幾個其他翻譯人員所打相似的簡體字

所以在此向各位致歉

review:
从小学的时候就开始了解ebf了 当时沉迷3代无法自拔（每次打开4399第一个点开的就是幻想大战3）
然后陆陆续续的打了12和45一共四代 给我的童年留下了美好的回忆
5代之前打盗版全成就了 现在补个票（顺便再打了次全成就
真的值 如果玩过之前的1234代那么5代基本算是集大成了（除了马人磕了啤酒罐写出来的剧情呜呜为什么娜姐和马特没有幸终（？））
没玩过前作的话5代也很适合入坑
顺便 等下次打折入个4代玩玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198394342730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4617, 'last_played': 1686563809}
review:
I played this game in browser many years ago, and I recall having such a great time with it that I just had to buy it here. Surely enough my second play-through was all the more epic and fantastical than I could have hoped for. Loved everything from the cute story, the quirky characters, the diverse combat skills, and all the clever puzzles.

I can see myself playing again in another few years time, it was that great of an experience. But even if I don't, this game will always have a special place in my gamer heart.

author: {'steamid': '76561199091628172', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13556, 'last_played': 1679795764}
review:
The Epic Battle Fantasy series is one that I've played since the first game. Flash games were my childhood, and king among them was the Epic Battle Fantasy series. Recently I've gone back to play all of the games, in order to see how the games hold up today.

But of course, when it comes to the latest game in the series (this one, if you haven't been paying attention)
It knocks it out of the park. The gameplay is quite in depth, requiring a good bit of planning on higher difficulties. 
The characters are fun and expressive, the jokes are funny and the world is vast!

With references to other media aplenty and sliding block puzzles for Matt to bash his head against, it serves to be an enjoyable experience, and I strongly recommend you give it a try yourself!

author: {'steamid': '76561198371732752', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1700526204}
review: I remember playing these game on kongregate as a little kid. I'd had it on my wishlist for a while and picked it up on sale, but I should've bought it a long time ago for full price. It's such a good game, and keeps the charm of the old games alive well. This franchise will always have a special place in my heart because these games were some of the first I ever played on a computer. I highly recommend it even if you haven't played the other EBF games or are new to this genre. There's plenty of content and things to do besides just the main story, achievements, etc etc. It has wonderful art, music, and most importantly gameplay. 10/10 with nostalgia but probably still an 8/10 to the uninitiated.

author: {'steamid': '76561198803028322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1094, 'last_played': 1710928998}
review:
Este es un juego extremadamente infravalorado, si piensas en comprarlo, no lo dudes más, solamente hazlo y ya. Si miras esta reseña mientras está en oferta, mejor. Así es más fácil pillarlo y aún le das cariño al creador que puso muchísimo trabajo en esto.

Altamente rejugable, estilo de arte adorable, muchísimo contenido opcional, mecánicas de batalla no vistas en juegos RPG populares, y un sinfín inconmensurable de referencias a la cultura popular. Por más simple que parezca el juego es realmente uno de mis favoritos, por no decir mi favorito. 

En conclusión, entre el amplio rebaño de los RPG, este es sin duda, un ejemplar único.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065376289', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 23525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23509, 'last_played': 1707267253}
review:
The fleshiest RPG I've ever enjoyed, and it's still simple to learn.

Once upon a time, somebody said offhand that it wasn't "viable" to use the swordsman as a mage and the mage as a swordsman, so I started a playthrough with the 2-player option enabled, toggled all of the optional challenges on, and set the game to the hardest difficulty, and I've spent a couple hundred hours proving them as wrong as I can. The fact that I've been able to beat many of the hardest bosses this way -- using summons, wacky equipment loadouts, consumables, and the good ol' noggin -- is a testament to the game's depth and richness of strategic combat.

<3 this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121050235', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 7524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7317, 'last_played': 1689920890}
review:
An incredible turn-based RPG with great combat, a world that's interesting and fun to explore, is filled with a great amount of equally great content, and has tons of replay value. I think it's one of the best games the genre has ever gotten.
Also, you don't need to play the previous games to know what's going on, it's a soft reboot.

author: {'steamid': '76561199135234911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 8906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8105, 'last_played': 1708708946}
review:
今天废话不多，咱直接开始评测
—————————————画面—————————————
游戏由于是使用flash制作，显然不能对其画质与特效做太高的估计，无论角色还是背景都不可避免的带有锯齿，但游戏却没有因此显得粗糙，相反，较低的美术成本使作者有了更多的精力去打磨人物的动作——长剑巨斧的劈砍张力十足，秘术法阵的绘制细致入微，弓箭枪械的射击自然灵活，流畅多变的招式触动着玩家的神经，部分技能还有精心制作的演出动画；无论角色还是敌人都有自己专属的一套表情，生命较低会变得鼻青脸肿，受到治疗会展露笑颜，获得胜利时会欢呼雀跃。。。地图中种种细节更是让人惊讶不已，河流中的交缠的漩涡，丛林间飘落的树叶，极地上飞扬的雪花，加上鸟居、神殿、堡垒等极富特色的景观，本作更像是一个小巧玲珑的艺术品。
—————————————剧情——————————————
本作的剧情彻底的跳出了所谓的“角色扮演”，没有苦大仇深的主角，没有天降萌妹的套路，没有矫揉造作的滥情，取而代之的是让人忍俊不禁的插科打诨。本作中所谓的“剧情主线”寥寥几句就能概括，但是文本量却不逊于一部短篇小说，你可能会好奇为什么会有这么多的文字内容。。。
没错，游戏剧情的大部分内容都是主角团队的吐槽和玩梗，遇见敌人要对它的外貌评头论足，击败它之后还要评“头”论“足”，看看它身上的哪个部位最好吃；使用技能会对这个技能的创意指手画脚，被打到和退场都会表示自己的不满，甚至发表一些有违公序良俗的“暴论”，有事没事还会进行知识科普或是打小算盘。。。角色间的交流也始终充满欢快的氛围，他们甚至知道自己是游戏中的人物，会和屏幕前的玩家说话！
—————————————操作——————————————
本作的游戏类型是非常传统的rpg，但是实际游玩起来的感受却十分舒适，全然没有某些作品里那些繁杂刁钻的条条框框。玩家在探索阶段时，可以在地图中自由走动，触发各类对话调查宝藏等。本作地图类似于塞尔达传说的早期作品，一张完整的世界地图分为若干个较小的地图单元，玩家在经过单元格的边界时才会切换地图显示。玩家可以在地图中自由走动，并不会有让人不胜其烦的地雷战，反倒是经常会发现一些诸如密道，宝藏这样的惊喜。绝大多数的战斗都要玩家手动触发，也不必担心莫名其妙地陷入苦战；游戏还针对不同玩家提供了两种操作方式，想要轻松找到隐藏地点的玩家可以使用鼠标来移动，这种操作方式可以直接帮助你找到密道；探索欲强烈的玩家也可以使用没有提示的键盘。在战斗阶段，玩家同样能获得流畅的游戏体验。本作的战斗采用的是标准的回合制，每场战斗都是我方所有成员先进行攻击，随后敌方按照从上到下的顺序进行行动。UI的设计简明扼要，玩家和敌人的属性可以随时查看，同时还有“常用技能”的功能，让玩家更加方便地选择行动。
—————————————战斗——————————————
要说最能展现制作组用心的地方，还属游戏中的怪物设定。本作中有着216种的敌人——这可不是什么“换个颜色就是新敌人”的噱头，游戏中每一种敌人都经过了精心的设计，无论是能力还是外观都各有特色。本作中的216种敌人被分为了若干“类别”，如此考究详尽的设定堪比现实生活中的科研图鉴，难怪本作能获得steam青睐之光的垂青了。
说来也有趣，作为正统的RPG，实际上剧情在EBF中是比较稀薄的部分，不同于大多数RPG，EBF的剧情简单而且直白，而本身的乐趣也并不在于多么复杂的剧情，游戏中大量的吐槽和neta才是精髓所在。但是这并不代表EBF5的文本量少，大量让人会心一笑的对话平铺在各种NPC和战斗中，使用不同的技能也会触发各种人物的对话，大大降低了回合制战斗带来的枯燥感。
—————————————总结——————————————
就如其名，史诗幻想。
最佳flash游戏，它当之无愧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198074203860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5746, 'last_played': 1685752527}
review:
Excellent RPG.  There were improvements made in many areas.  Several key issues with the 4th game have been fixed that bugged me forever

It felt like there was never really a reason to use elemental skills in the 4th game, because non elemental skills were valuable in every situation, and most elemental skills did only SOME of their damage as elemental, making them less useful.  Blasting enemies with star shower, judgement, legend, and swift strike(with matt having a non elemental weapon) always seemed like the quickest way to murder anything.  This has been fixed in the 5th game.  Elemental skills (almost) always do more of their damage as elemental damage, making them more situational(which is a good thing).  In addition, the multi target and single target spells have mostly been combined into a dual version, where you can choose between 2 options, though each character has a unique flavor of multitarget(anna's arrows can be shot, randomly hitting different targets, natalie is traditional AOE, and lance's damage can either be centered on one enemy(with others taking some splash) or traditional AOE.

Another gripe was with boss battles.  There was a major issue with sustainability for boss battles in the 4th game, as your SP only lasts for so long.  With the sharpen skill and a cooldown flair, you can increase the duration of your good status effects for 3 turns every 3 turns.  fantastic!

Other nice changes include:
less waves of enemies in one battle.  this is both a pro and con.  pro because it makes the game less of a slog, and a con because it's usually much less worth wasting turns buffing up in battle.

There is a skill that gives (almost) every single good status effect in the game(except morale, for some reason?).  There's now more than just 1 way to get an hp buff on your party(orange juice is no longer the only option, there's a limit break, some summons, etc.)

Status effects(and I think buffs as well, though I don't remember) now apply to active party members.... AND backup party members.  This makes it easier than it ever has been to justify switching party members out instead of reviving dead ones(though it's still not really just a stop and swap, skill equips and actual equips are still mostly tied to characters)

From the 3 boss battles I bothered to play on epic difficulty(the cyclops, the tank, and telperion), it would appear that the boss battles have been significantly toned down in difficulty, which is a godsend, because EBF4 had some nonsense boss battles(rafflesia and godcat in particular were DAMN difficult on epic difficulty), though your mileage may vary.

There's a battle arena, where you go solo with each character through 10 battles.  This is pretty fun, reminiscent of "The Legend of Legaia", where there's a similar concept.   It was executed there a little better though, IMO.  The only thing that makes that challenge doable at all is the "gives x status when defending", which means you can get yourself some regen, bless, and autolife statuses, along with whatever you get from your armor whenever you defend.  I think there are some balancing issues here though.  I thought matt's and natalie's arenas were pretty easy, anna's was less so, and nolegs/lance's were TOO hard, especially lance's match with the three "kill us in 3 turns or we explode enemies".  I only blundered my way through that one with 4 extra turns courtesy of equips, and 2 limit breaks, which is a little silly.


This is not all good news though, there are definite things that are worse:
The way you acquire summons is like pokemon: you weaken them in battle, then throw your box at them.  This is interesting.... but was ALWAYS my least favorite and frustrating part of pokemon.  I HATE that this is a thing, because if you hate it like I do, too bad, it's pretty much integral to winning.  If you ignore summons, you miss out on the most important skills in the game.  party buffs include things like: morale, regen, good luck, brave, and bless.  These are invaluable as hell.  Sure, there are options to make foes surrender easier, and it's mainly a problem with boss enemies, but it's a pretty BIG problem with boss enemies.  if, for example, I failed to capture telporion in the initial fight, I'd need to first wait until the end of the game to get a retry, and I'd also have to fight 2 bosses in a row before him.  If I accidentally kill him?  OH WELL, guess I'm fighting those 2 bosses again.  The summons capture problem is made even worse by forging.  There are some(MANY) equip upgrades that require releasing your summons in order to upgrade equips.  Why couldn't you just make it so you're required to have the summon, but NOT expend it to upgrade equips?

There are too many status effects in this game, straight up.  literally several dozen status effects.  but why though?  why so many status effects?

some equipment gives you a status effect or a buff when you defend.  but why?  Why is this a thing?  some of these equips are the best in their category(or damn near it), and there's literally dozens of pieces of equipment that do this. but why though?

Why are the optional dungeons scattered around the map?  yeah, I need to backtrack some anyway, but it was much more convenient in the 4th game, where battle mountain was it's own area.  This is annoying.

There were changes to the way buffs/debuffs/dispel/bless works.  in the previous game, buffs and debuffs were more "sticky".  if an enemy had a buff of +70 evade, and you used bind, it'd drop it to 20.  Now, if an enemy has that same buff and you use bind, it drops it ALL the way down to -50.  This is a pro and a con, but I VERY much liked it when buffs were stickier, and I liked it because of the way bless worked in EBF4.  If you had bless, you were untouchable.  Every status effect including dispel only took 1 stack of bless from you when it hit.  In EBF5, every status effect takes a stack off bless, but death takes 2, and dispel takes a whopping 3.  Now, your buffs DON'T stick, and being dispelled is easier than ever.  This is dumb, and I hate it.  One of the worst changes, IMO.  EBF4 was pretty hard on epic, so it's not like you were invincible with it's mechanics, it was a proper challenge, but here it just feels like the odds are VERY stacked against you.

The music is worse in this game.  I'm sorry phrynna, you have some real bangers here(the theme for lance's castle, the theme for the paper boss in the library, the ice area theme are pretty good), but the replacement for "fallen blood"(the dark boss theme in the previous game), the replacement for "jump into battle" (the enemy/boss rush theme from the previous game) are both pretty awful.  there's a music track that plays in some battles (mostly the first few, though it plays quite often from then on through the grassy plains area) is truly awful, with ear splitting bass that's way too loud.  The music that plays when you're fighting new party members, the music that plays in the greenwood library are both truly terrible as well, I hate them both with a passion.

In conclusion: if you liked the previous game, this one is a no brainer.  It's pretty damn good, though unlike the 4th game, I have no interest at all in a new game+ run or a custom game of any sort, unfortunately.  The game is too big, and it's gotten too complex(there's more armor, MANY more flairs, more equips, WAY, WAY more skills, and WAY, WAY more status effects and an additional party member to potentially take into account), there are too many moving pieces for you to sus out good strategies, equips and such quick enough to not be incredibly frustrated.

Good game, but a little frustrating at times.  I'll definitely replay it at some point, but not for a good long while.  I'm about to replay the 4th game though, which I think is pretty timeless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276634938', 'num_games_owned': 10153, 'num_reviews': 1500, 'playtime_forever': 4216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4216, 'last_played': 1702385467}
review:
[h1] 赞美Pi
EDF... 不对EBF牛比
小心他要发射激
第 七 天 堂 我好了 [/h1]

若干年前的一个暑假，我通过东方认识到了《弹幕天堂2》这款游戏，接触到了EBF系列。然后在某小游戏网站上玩到了EBF4。现在两作都已经补票。这个暑假偶然看到EBF5，立即买了下来，果然还是熟悉的味道，还是熟悉的感觉：
太开心啦，这才是我想要的rpg游戏！
说一下为什么喜欢本作。首先，氛围很欢乐。主角团不是那种苦大仇深的人，一路冒险上总是伴随着各种玩笑，轻松愉快的感觉。作者Matt是真的懂rpg，不仅知道怎么设计关卡，而且该吐的槽作者还都帮你吐了。
再说一下解谜要素。经典的推箱子，滑冰面，一笔画，本作一样不落。而且其中有一部分颇有难度。至少我玩起来是很开心的。难的解谜也都不是必做内容，不用担心因为卡在解谜而卡关。隐藏宝箱也为旅行增添了趣味。
然后是rpg使人沉浸的一大经典要素——成长。肝度不高，我玩的普通难度基本不需要练级。但是我还是能感觉到自己操控主角们成长的喜悦。拿攻击力来说，刚开始只能打50不到伤害，在冒险的路上主角们一点点变强，最后分分钟超过10万，那叫一个爽啊，玩过一些经典rpg的都懂。
我对ebf5的游玩不深，所以关于战斗系统不敢说太多。就我现在的了解而言，ebf的战斗可以变出各种花样，但是也都
好懂。目前正在争取攻克史诗难度。

[spoiler] [b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2961002364] 🔥点击传送门🔥 [/url] [/b] [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198351668590', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 1152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1654255943}
review:
전통적인 턴제 JRPG 게임이다. 레벨디자인이 꽤 잘되어있다.
약간의 퍼즐, 수집요소, 성장요소, 보스전까지 JRPG의 정석을 구현해 놓은 게임.

그런데 가장 중요한 캐릭터가 매력적이지 않고 스토리가 (다른 JRPG게임과 비교해도) 유치하다.
이게 가장 중요한 장르인데..

왜 평가가 압도적으로 긍정적일까? 5편까지 나온 장수 게임이니 고정팬층이 있는 것일까?
비추천

review:

Loaded with absurd amounts of secrets,optional content,challenges and secret bosses who enjoy kicking you in the balls as any standout jrpg oughta be i consider it a must play for any long time newgrounds enjoyer or just a fan of the turn based genre in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198822907711', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 2966, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1485, 'last_played': 1691010525}
review:
I wasn't feeling good a few days ago, was a little depressed.
I got this from the Yogscast Christmas Jingle Jam Charity Bundle/Collection, donated money to charity & got this & a ton more games - so now I decided to give it a shot.

And by Godcat, it blew me away.
This game is a perfect blend of family-friendly & maturity, suitable for kids or adults.
I love that this is the fifth game in the EPF series, but there's no requirement to play the first 4, so you're not missing out on anything, save a few references.

Combat is fun, explosive & crunchy, did have to grind a couple times, but I didn't care.
Music is lovely.
Characters are perfectly written with each having their own personality that bounces off each other.
And what's really lovely of the developer is the inclusion of fan-art in a museum, with the characters commenting on them.

10/10, highly recommend for anyone looking for something new & different, or anyone who's a fan of turn-based combat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198813104988', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2492, 'last_played': 1709063585}
review:
If you like great RPGs with great combat, interesting monsters, powerful feeling abilities and great characters, you've hit the jackpot. EBF5 takes the personality dial and cranks it up to 12, it's fun and hella enjoyable from hour 1 to 41 especially with the on and off dialogue between characters, as someone who's played every EBF game from the 3rd to 5th the series has only gotten better over the years and I want you to know that you can trust this developer, Matt Roszak, to deliver in terms of undeniably enjoyable exeriences

Enough gushing though, how does this game hold up?
Well, with 5 playable characters, the ability to capture just about any enemy and boss in the game to use as a summon, a plethora of status effects and things that can happen in battle to stir up combat, and the pure strength of your own character's abilities, you are very unlikely to leave the world of EBF disappointed. The fights are challenging even when you're in the higher levels, and the droves of optional content are sure to justify possible hour lengths that possibly go into the hundreds, not even counting the challenges, cheats, and self imposed awfulness you can put onto yourself AND the ability to play through the game twice with all your favorite weapons, armors and skills in a well worth it New Game + mode

If you like RPGs, you will doubtingly LOVE the absolute SHIT out of EBF1 through EBF5
If you decide to buy this game, please also buy The Epic Battle Fantasy Collection, Epic Battle Fantasy 4 and Epic Battle Fantasy 3

As a long time follower of this series, these games are TO DIE FOR

author: {'steamid': '76561199073939434', 'num_games_owned': 16, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2063, 'last_played': 1685829109}

author: {'steamid': '76561198123680285', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 4165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4072, 'last_played': 1682246347}
review:
最初發現是網頁遊戲，玩的還是4代，雖然前幾代也沒玩過，
但真心覺得這系列回合制RPG戰鬥非常有特色。

其中兩點:
1.掃描跟逃跑幾乎是遊戲的核心，不要覺得逃跑可恥，
這叫做戰略性撤退，逃跑並沒有任何懲罰。
2.屬性抗性堆疊到超過100%的話，受傷反而會變成治療。
不得不說這設計很特別，非常適合喜歡謀略的玩家，可以事先規劃要配上什麼裝備來攻略。

遊戲中還有很多秘密、寶藏、小遊戲、成就......等，非常的耐玩。
順帶一提，如果要解全成就，建議多存檔，而且要直接最高難度開局。

最高難度下，雖然敵人強度200%，但只要裝備和技能正確的搭配還是可以隨便過! 
(有時候為了抓怪還得怕不小心打死)

全程都圍繞在觀察敵人的元素抗性和異常抵抗，
最推薦的異常是「病毒」，只要敵人不是毒素免疫或者毒傷治療，
全隊配戴100%毒素異常抵抗(不是元素抵抗)，給隨便一個敵人上病毒後，基本上就隨便過了。
因為病毒的特性，層數只會增加不會減少(層數越高傷害越高)，
還會傳給戰場上所有單位，難怪新冠會......嗯，沒事。
第二推薦的異常是「虛弱」和「疲勞」，敵人攻防會一直降，
然後敵人身上掛著一大堆的異常，看著就莫名的舒服。

結論...總之異常狀態能上的全上就對了，我要成為異常王! (誤

review: 这个游戏是真的好玩，它也是一个我的童年回忆童年的时候我是玩第一代和第二代，现在有第四代和第五代所以我觉得这个游戏是真的很值得买来玩它也有很多副本等着我们去挑战，这个游戏它主要是探险主线任务和支线然后要打怪最重要是看敌人的元素弱点是什么，它也可以训练我们的想法和脑力怎样解决麻烦总之它是值得买就对了！

review: Es un juego que al mi parecer es muy divertido, su jugabilidad es buena y entretenida. Lo que más me ha gustado han sido las referencias e interacciones entre los personajes. En general es un juego muy amplio y completo para darte muchas horas de diversión.

author: {'steamid': '76561199062574076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8798, 'last_played': 1698812546}
review:
Muy Buen Desarrollo De Historia.
Muy Buenas Dinamicas Y Secretos.
Te Adentra En La Trama Y Te Envuelve Con Lo Que Sucede.
Gran Variedad De Objetos.
Se Puede Ajustar La Dificultad Y Preferencias A Lo Que Le Guste Al Jugador.
Tiene Suficiente Contenido Y Partidas Alternas Con Las Que Te Puedes Entretener Muchas Horas.
Dialogos Y Chistes Muy Divertidos Y Graciosos.
Exelente Banda Sonora (Phyrnna)
Buen Uso No Exagerado De La Roptura De La Cuarta Pared.

Su Contra Es Que No Cuenta Con Un Sexto Juego Aun.

En Resumen, Si Vale La Pena Comprarlo Y Donar Para Futuros Proyectos De Matt Roszak.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145362609', 'num_games_owned': 2126, 'num_reviews': 230, 'playtime_forever': 2472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1190, 'last_played': 1683241999}
review:
Не играл в прошлые части данной игры...и сейчас очень жалею))
Очень крутая сага, забавный копирайт, который действительно не надоедает и его приятно читать
Игра захватывает тем, что хочется найти все секреты и открыть все чертовы сундуки) 
Весьма большое количество шмоток, талисманов, монстров и, конечно же, абилок)
Графика в игре тоже очень приятная
Короче чувствует, что игра сделана с душой. Именно поэтому вдвойне приятно наблюдать, что у нее крайне положительные оценки
Вроде слышал, что эту игру делал чуть ли не один человек в соло (Мэтт?) - дикий респект!

review: This game is great. Everything from the combat to the satirical humor was enjoyable. using the games numerous status effects to optimize strategy in various fights is a blast and make some fights act almost like puzzles on higher difficulties. an over all fantastic experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047701594', 'num_games_owned': 1373, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 12460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2634, 'last_played': 1699314638}
review: I cant believe i never reviewed this game. The mechanics are more in-depth than they have any right to be in a good way. It's challenging but still lets you feel really powerful, especially when you manage to capture bosses. The music tracks are some of the best in any game i ever played and still listen to them on a regular basis, and even got friends to at least listen to those even if they didn't want to play. Overall even as a bit of a joke game in places, its fleshed out and has to be one of my favorite RPGs of all time, and that goes for a lot of things made by them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198863237526', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 5317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4499, 'last_played': 1679223027}
review:
全成就通关纪念，这是我为数不多想拿全成就的游戏，怎么说呢，我不是重度的回合制rpg游戏玩家，仅仅只是玩过零轨和宝可梦这种游戏，这游戏是我打完很多动作冒险游戏之后想调和口味而选择入坑的一款回合制rpg游戏。一开始在技能和人员没解锁的时候心态有些浮躁而放库里吃灰，但是等到我电子阳痿想找一些不那么累的回合制游戏的时候，我重新打开了这款游戏，重新静下心来慢慢品味这款游戏，当然这款游戏在一开始我想直接普通难度通关就算了，发现感觉还挺难打的，一度怀疑自己是不是哪里出错了，看了攻略才明白有各种打法可以直接快速击杀史诗难度的boss，顺便还能解锁成就，小怪什么的直接简单难度快速通关收集就行了，这游戏的关键精髓在于如何利用各种负面状态来打败史诗级的boss。
       那为什么这么一款flash游戏能吸引我去肝全成就呢？说实话后期我是打的有点腻了，支线的各种车轮战都不想打了，想快点通关，但是我在促销的时候想找其他的替代品发现没啥RPG可以替代这款游戏，不同的好评如潮的回合制RPG游戏都有各自我个人不喜欢的缺点，干脆就继续把这游戏肝完算了。
       来说说这游戏的优点，说实话看看这游戏的特点简介就知道了，基本都有，1.量大管饱的流程长度，主线和支线并且全收集加起来起码要80个小时左右吧，2.非常丰富的敌人和战斗系统，这里敌人同一种类还有不同的形态，像冰淇淋史莱姆一样，不仅仅只是换个颜色，还有点区别，有时候我还以为是新的品种，这里面还有200多种敌人可以被你捕获在战斗中辅助你，战斗的技能和状态也非常丰富，还有各种状态组合产生出更高的伤害反应，主角5人组也不是固定的职业，不同的装备和技能搭配往往都可以充当输出手，辅助和奶妈。3.不错的人设和没有苦大仇深的剧情，也没有又臭又长的对话，我很喜欢主角团在战斗过程中互相吐槽的台词，并且主角也会跟屏幕前的你进行互动，而且在最后的好结局中互帮互助的生活也是很美好的一个结局。4.这游戏包含了巨量的梗，详情可以在打完游戏后自己去搜搜到底包含哪些梗，如果你是一名资深的游戏玩家应该在自己游玩过程中发现很多有趣的地方。5.可以随时随地的存档，没有限制，这就玩的我非常舒服。6.没有暗雷机制，怪都是站在那里，你想打就去摸他，不想打就走开，没有太多强制战斗的地方，除非有些路线和宝箱会堵你路之外，基本打完就不会再堵你路了。7.随时随地更换难度，想受苦就受苦，想爽玩就爽玩，头目战的话史诗难度才能解锁成就，这游戏某些boss或者精英怪初见其实难度颇高，如果觉得普通难度都有点高的话，可以升级自己的装备看看装备的词条和抗性，以及敌人弱哪些状态来制定作战计划会打的轻松一点，也可以看看攻略视频速杀boss，对游戏的理解也有一定的帮助。8.bgm很好听，有平缓的也有很燃的，很难想象这是一款flash游戏的配乐
        说一下缺点：1：装备方面，有些隐藏太丧心病狂了，不看攻略真的找不到地方（注，可以开个作弊宝箱寻宝机，也不影响成就，真要找不到了就看看攻略）2：装备的强化系统会随着强化等级提高不仅提升属性，还解锁一些强力词条，前期新人不知道哪些装备能快速找来，也不知道屯哪些资源来升级解锁，我在前期真的差一些资源解锁一些刚boss的词条的时候，真的有些绝望，好在最后头目车轮战能把成就解锁回来。
       其他方面：1：解密太难，但是可以看攻略。2：怪太难抓了，其实可以把难度调低捕获，而且捕获概率跟自己的状态和敌方状态有关，包括自己强化的越高，敌人削弱的越高，好像减回避是最高捕获的，一般抓个绿毛虫用一下它的技能减回避，然后打残血基本小怪都能捕获到，再不行给自己上个好运，穿个加捕获的装备，调低难度都能抓到。
      最后没有6代真的很可惜，这真的是flash游戏的余晖，喜欢回合制RPG游戏的玩家一定不要错过这款游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198940662662', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3935, 'last_played': 1704605949}

author: {'steamid': '76561199069329745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11069, 'last_played': 1678420110}
review: Basically one of the best niche RPGs I've ever played. There's some bias speaking since I've found EBF4 as a kid and its made an impression on me ever since. I think its combat is unique enough and while not having too much depth the statuses really encourage experimentation just to see what the game would let you get away with. And nowadays meta humors pretty overdone, playing on tropes and deconstructing them happens a good amount, personally I think its got its charm but if that's not what you like completely understandable. I ended up getting every achievement and for those who care, there aren't any real egregious ones out of the bunch. You might just need a guide for some of them though. Overall I genuinely love this game for what it is right now and can't wait for any future titles.

author: {'steamid': '76561199082546539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 13514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 316, 'playtime_at_review': 11033, 'last_played': 1712167600}
review:
This game has gripped me for over 7 days of total playtime. It has witty dialogue, vibrant animations, great graphics quality options, and best of all, amazing gameplay.

The combat system is one of the most diverse and mechanically deep that I've ever seen, rivaling that of Pokémon, even. 

It's difficulty can easily be changed, though after you start playing on Epic, you'll find that it's the only difficulty you'll want to play. You can make it even harder with challenges.

It comes with tons of replayability options, such as changing enemies in many locations, and changing what most Equipment does! And there's even options to randomize Equipment locations, if that's what you want.

Only complaint is that some battles can be a slog. Even more if you don't equip stuff to deal with the ~4 wave battles.

You're doing yourself a disservice if you DON'T get this game, it's well worth the price.

9/10 - As close to perfection as most would consider possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017328426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 3791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1849, 'last_played': 1679864293}
review:
Although I would recommend this game it has two MAJOR flaws which ruined the experience for me:

- Nearly everyone is white. It's 2023, we shouldn't have to be pointing out that this game is not representative of all the people who play it. There are some minor black NPCs you encounter, and maybe one or two Asian characters, but none of the main characters you encounter are anything but very very white. I know this game is making fun of the tropes that often appear in RPGs, but that doesn't mean it needs to be one of them. 
- I am fed up of the oversexualisation of female characters. Again, I know that it's supposed to be making fun of these tropes, but the fact that it has 'boob physics', and the fact that the female characters end up not liking each other because one has big boobs just is exhausting and made me really not want to play this for a while. Also, if you use the female mage's main special abilities you see her basically naked. I wanted to use this spell a lot as I generally play defensively, and every time I used the spell I was reminded of how oversexualised female characters are. And honestly I am just sick of it.


Apart from those two, I quite liked the game. The ability to see what battles you are going to have and that you can run away consistently is great. Also, the music and graphics are nice. The forging of items and collecting hidden chests, definitely appeals to the completionist in me and it was fun levelling some of the more random items too. 

Generally I liked this game, which is why I am recommending it. But I really really hope that the two negatives I mentioned above get fixed for the next game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089261511', 'num_games_owned': 8, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4814, 'last_played': 1680554809}
review:
On the surface level, it's just a good old traditional turn-based rpg with a bunch of exploring. But even if that's "all" it is, it does that very thing incredibly well. There are a bunch of secrets in the overworld to find and the battle is pretty straightforward, but somehow let's you play in so many different ways with a bunch of different strategies. And on the higher difficulties, being creative with these strategies and learning the mechanics is essential.
But most of all, the story, while simple and goofy, feels very wholesome, especially for us who grew up with the series
