author: {'steamid': '76561198025734501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 7157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6412, 'last_played': 1585728454}
review:
The first game I played from the EBF series was 3, when it was still played in a browser. I liked it due to how it's a deconstruction of RPG's and video games in general but it is still a well-made and balanced game in itself. The next entries in the series continued the trend, mostly expanding on the same concepts. Lots of fourth-wall breaks, shout-outs and references to other games, and sometimes almost outright copyright infringements with just one letter starred out but still everyone knows what they mean. It's so cute but still so serious at the same time. The series tends to play safe and not change too much so the core elements are the same, with a few new things or tweaks thrown in. For EBF5 the biggest change is ditching the mana system for a cooldown-based system. You also get 5 characters this time and only 3 can be on the battlefield at the same time, while each of them has their own strengths and weaknesses, so switching between them and correctly allocating gear is important. There is a large selection of weapons, hats, armors and flairs to choose from so you have some wiggle room to pick one that fits your style even when you are constrained to stack up on offensive/defensive stats for a certain element or status condition. For example I prefer to stack lots if items that give between-turns healing, as well as summons to do damage without using up a character's turn, plus giving the Haste status which is essentially free turns for your characters. There is a good balance of easy and difficult battles, fetch quests and a bit of farming for gold or levels, but generally it's not too grindy. And especially for the bonus dungeons, there is no point in grinding for exp since the enemies scale to your level.
Story is okay, it's kind of a reboot from the previous entries (but there is an explanation for why), but it's just an average RPG plot of starting out doing small things and eventually working your way up to the big bad that is planning to destroy the world (which is an actual game mechanic!). But as already mentioned, what makes it good is the large amount of funny quotes, fourth-wall breaks and references.
The music in this game is awesome. EBF4 had completely forgettable music, especially after losing the "Wings" battle theme which I think is an example of how seamlessly the music can fit into the theme of being both a parody of a game but also being serious in its own mechanics. In contrast EBF5's music is much greater in terms of artistic perfection. There are now different battle themes for different environments, providing more variety. The overworld themes are also nice, starting from a calm beach theme and progressing to more serious themes towards the end of the game. It is possible to listen to cameo soundracks from the earlier games via the radios spread out through the world, and after the v2 update even "Wings" makes a comeback in the simulation battles (which are a big nostalgia bomb themselves).
One thing I'm a bit sour about is the monster capture mechanic. Almost every monster in the game can be captured, and those that can't be are clearly indicated so you don't waste your time. Also it's much less luck-based than Pokémon, so you have to alter your battle strategy to avoid killing the enemy but at the same time also stack on the debuffs to make it vulnerable to caputre, especially for bosses where your options are quite limited due to the resistances they have. This is a refreshing change of pace compared to just blindily spamming your strongest skill at everything. The urge to "catch 'em all" is hard to resist. However, the sad part comes once they are captured. You can use every capture as a summon, but this is severely limited due to how summons work. Due to the large amount of different summons, it's impossible to remember each and every one of them. They have various elements, attack power and special effects (or buffs if that's the case), so probably there is one for every situation you may be in, but you can only "equip" a limited amount of them and can't change in battle, so you will probably stick to the few memorable ones, such as the putrid worm with its massive evade debuff or the Flybots that can invert buffs on enemies including bosses. But then you run into the SP mechanic. You need SP to use summons, and you can only get SP by killing enemies. The balance in your maximum SP, the power of each summon, and the amount of SP per kill is just so off that you are almost always better off using your characters' skills that already synergize with their battle style rather than the summons that are just randomly thrown in. Summons that have low enough SP cost to use several times per battle are also weak so there is no point in using them over your characters' skills (except the niche ones I mentioned above). The strong ones use so much SP that you can use them only once in several battles, making them "Too Awesome to Use". So in the end I only used summons to ... capture other monsters, with the very occasional exception of some boss battles, such as using the viking monolith to haste all my characters so I have enough turns to finish off all heads of the Hydras such that they don't respawn.
If you liked the previous EBFs or like RPGs in general then you will enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330749266', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3930, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2985, 'last_played': 1706026491}
review:
「讓EBF帶你找回到以前玩網頁Flash遊戲的樂趣！」

從小接觸網頁遊戲時就有玩過EBF系列了，當時什麼都不懂的我單純只是隨便玩玩而已（笑）。當時被作者所繪製出相當流暢的戰鬥畫面以及豐富多彩的怪物形象給吸引住，如今出到5代當然要納入收藏庫中呢～

Epic Battle Fantasy 5（中譯：史詩戰鬥幻想5）為回合制RPG戰鬥遊戲，繼承前代了的大地圖機制，且依舊是那無厘頭搞笑充滿樂趣（咦？）的線性故事。過程中總是可以看到Matt一行人一直拿笑話、網路迷因嘲諷遊戲機制、RPG戰鬥、怪物形象、任務系統等等，即便翻成中文版，它的本土化的梗依舊滿滿。

戰鬥過程誠意十足，許許多多的獨特角色技能、屬性狀態機制、裝備系統、以及相當多的怪物種類（還可以捕捉）造就大量的可玩性，讓玩家也不會因RPG遊戲的詬病（打怪＞練等＞打王）而感到疲憊，甚至搭配著Phyrnna所作的優質背景音樂，讓戰鬥也能熱血起來，代入感十足！

遊戲問題依舊是Flash在運算動畫過程中造成卡頓問題，電腦好壞決定遊戲卡頓程度（好至輕微，壞至頻繁），導致必須要降畫質才能順暢進行遊戲（降畫質很痛苦，會看到圖形滿滿的鋸齒）。
個人認為這不能歸咎作者的優化問題，而是Flash動畫運算機制過於繁雜，導致作者想製作更順暢、更豐富的技能動畫時，被Flash狠狠地砸了品質。

撇除卡頓問題外，個人仍然很推薦此款遊戲，儘管是回味童年玩網頁Flash遊戲的樂趣，還是第一次接觸Flash類型遊戲的玩家們，相信它一樣可以給你留下相當不錯的遊玩體驗。

（題外話：其實之前就有寫此遊戲的評論了，但基於對遊戲很有愛就重寫了一篇了XD。作者正在著手將EBF5移至手機平台上，目前已在測試階段了，推出後可以購買支持下作者呢～）

author: {'steamid': '76561198365475154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2910, 'last_played': 1590859199}
review:
I never thought EBF5 was going to top its predecessors by such a large margin ever since EBF4 came out.
I was wrong. 
I was very, very, wrong.
And so, here's my review:
[h] 1) Airstrike bad. [/h]
2) Lance is best girl.
3) Capture system is great.
4) Hydras are cancer.
5) SNEKS ARE CANCER.
6) WORLD IS AWESOME.
7) Go play the game, prepare to be amazed, and always ship [spoiler] Lanna. [/spoiler]

review: I've been a huge fan of the EBF series, especially EBF4, but this game is so much more interesting and unique. It's such a simple, funny and amazing game. It's one of the best turn-based RPG games out there. Definitely worth a try if you are into fantasy and turn-based rpgs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055947488', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 13550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9657, 'last_played': 1699214796}
review:
Très bon petit jeu de rôle avec des combats au tour par tour. La progression se fait surtout en trouvant les objets qui permettent de franchir certains obstacles, mais en difficulté épique, le niveau des adversaires n'est pas négligeable.
Un humour décalé, avec des références au fait que vous êtes en train de jouer à un jeu de la part des personnages... à vous de voir si c'est votre style.
Une grosse dizaine d'heures de jeu pour finir l'aventure, plus si vous voulez tous les secrets.

review: With all the updates, bug fixes, and friendly community interactions by Matt (Discord, Facebook) this game is really fun to play and is worth the money. When it was first released yeah sure it had serious problems but over time they were fixed. Overall it's a very fun game, it makes players think twice about what to use, the environments are stunning to look at, the character banter throughout the game is memorable, and the animations are nice to look at as the same can be said about the gear you can acquire, you can see the level of detail and thought put into the game and don't forget the beautiful soundtrack. I highly recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198327027806', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2095, 'last_played': 1635692698}
review:
一开始大概是小学的时候在某小游戏网站看到了ebf2和3，年轻的我瞬间就被这款rpg（娜塔莉的r量）吸引了。
那个时候着实没什么通关的耐心，时隔这么久得知了ebf出了5还上了steam就果断买下来了（其实是看了api视频才知道）
玩起来真是越来越上头，废话⑧多说，ebf天下第一！

author: {'steamid': '76561198089882088', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5899, 'last_played': 1697569385}
review:
The game beat my expectations as a fan of the series already, and the latest update really kicked it up a notch.

Honestly, most things are perfect. I love the art style, the turn-based battle mechanics, the balancing work, and the strategy. The difficulty is well-matched, and the game features content filters and translation for those who'd prefer so. It is a cartoon, but its humor and dialogues are all-the-same well-designed, and careful not to be insensitive. What really makes this game is the small things: equipment- or player-specific dialogue, and small changes in appearance due to various scenarios, etc. Truly, it's a well-designed indie game, having taken full advantage of experience from previous games in the series.

Frankly, I can only spot two annoyances I have with the game. Firstly, I just want more! More equipment, more status effects, or more interesting scenarios to wrap my head around and make a strategy for. Secondly, the music isn't quite as enthralling as the last game, but don't get me wrong that it's still a masterpiece (I still bought the album from the composer: check out Phyrnna, she's legendary!). Do not that it might just be my own reminiscence getting the better of me.

Also, the developer is super nice! Navigate yourself to the game's Discord, it's very hospitable.

TLDR: Please, if you're into indie games with humor, and like turn-based battle mechanics with a decent amount of strategy, give this game a shot. The game really nails most things about its genre. Kudos to both the composer, Phyrnna, and the developer, Matt Roszak!

author: {'steamid': '76561198345038822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 14217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 954, 'playtime_at_review': 4866, 'last_played': 1712287637}
review:
Game has had a lot of updates since launch, and is honestly massive considering everything but the music is made by one guy. One casual playthrough is easily 20 hours. A completionist playthrough is more like 60. If you've ever played another game in the series, you know what kind of humor and quality to expect. If not, then EBF3 is free and a perfectly reasonable entry point.

This is sort of the last bastion of Flash games, so anyone nostalgic for that would love this kind of game.

review: Smooth graphics, very pleasing to the eye. Of course the story is really entertaining as with the rest of the series. I just love the game, wish it lasted forever. If you liked the earlier games, you will definitely like this one. Replace like with love in the previous line. author: {'steamid': '76561198446427929', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4281, 'last_played': 1669132478}
review: 毫不夸张的说小学的时候就接触到了这款作品，当时是在4399里，一个叫幻想大战的游戏吸引了我，游戏的内容很简单，只有短短的几关，几只猫和一只骑着史莱姆的小猫，打完就没了。但是它里面炫酷的魔法设定让我意犹未尽，某一天在无聊翻找的时候发现了ebf4，也就是它的第四代，Phyrnna动听的音乐和matt炫酷的游戏设定简直就像天作之合，当时matt好像面临毕业要找工作，所以想到那可能就是最后一代ebf，禁不住有些遗憾，没想到时隔多年五代应运而生，现在已经全成就了，虽然全成就对于这款游戏并不算什么，但是它代表了我对这个游戏的喜爱。没错它作为一个回合制的flash游戏，本身并不算特别特别的出众，但作为我的童年，它是一个史诗，一个属于玛特，娜塔莉，兰斯，安娜，没腿，以及你和我的史诗。如果你是ebf系列老粉，或是喜欢回合制游戏的新人，那么这款游戏绝对值得入手，也绝对值这个钱。当然没有钱的话，作者也上传了免费版，除了少了一些额外的支线关卡，你也能体验到这个史诗幻想。

author: {'steamid': '76561198271417360', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2868, 'last_played': 1649607877}
review:
As you might know, there is a free flash version of this game to try out, if you like turn based RPGs but aren't sure whether the steam version is worth your money.
The game plays similarly to the previous game EBF4, being about the hero collecting party members, fighting foes and collecting treasure along the way towards saving the world.
The combat in this game is better balanced than before, with the replacement of MP by cool-downs being a large improvement so I found myself using a greater variety of the characters' abilities. The way buffs and debuffs work incentivises swapping party members mid-battle, so the sensible approach in this game is to make sure every party member is well equipped and that abilities are distributed among all party members.
Definitely more challenging than the previous game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095087238', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 13994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5694, 'last_played': 1706638924}
review:
This game makes me feel extreme nostalgia. I've enjoyed this series for a very long time (long before I should have been allowed to play such games) and it really takes me back. The music aswell, is very memorable and makes me feel  warm. 

Epic Battle Fantasy will be a part of me forever and it's good that way. I wish more people knew this series so they could understand why I like this, why I waited and closely watched the process of this game's creation on kupo's website. I love this, that's all. 

Thanks Matt. Your work makes me feel good. 

P.S. 
I would probably never have gotten back into this series and EBF5 before hearing about a giveaway for EBF4, and winning it too. Again, thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198415361902', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 965, 'last_played': 1677395436}
review:
作者一开始应该是为了致敬FinalFantasy，现在看来，EBF真的超越了单单neta和致敬的范畴，无论是战斗系统还是画风，都不输于当下的各种游戏，陪我们走过这么久的EBF竟然还是个flash游戏，希望有更多人能了解到这款五脏俱全的游戏（目前看来很多trpg甚至都没法超过EBF，惊了......EBF的抗性系统和多种异常要素搭配可谓绝了，这些搭配让玩家在Epic这个数值怪难度下依然能通关，把trpg打怪对症下药的特点发挥到极致）
而且游戏的战斗界面做的小而精良，流畅的技能衔接和动画让玩家不会无聊，更别说p姐一人制作的超棒bgm

author: {'steamid': '76561198040927570', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 10710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7574, 'last_played': 1665056105}
review:
This is just one of my favourite games of all time!!!!

However it's a little hard to recommend it to people less familiar with internet's history and culture. Some of the dialogue and humour is a little aged, a little awkward or a little out of place. I'd recommend unchecking the mature setting to get rid of some REAL terrible stuff I wouldn't want anyone to experience.

That being said, being able to play this game with a grain of salt sprinkled on the dialogue box still makes this an amaaaazing game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970685560', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2339, 'last_played': 1582471326}
review:
Good, simple, basic fun Final Fantasy style turn based game with no real complexity.
very similar to EBF3 and EBF4

should be very simple for anyone to just jump into.

I Minmaxed a little, which removed all difficulty and made completing the game a little tedious, since every encounter was just steamrollered.  
My main complaint is the game seems to lack any real difficulty. 
hit targets weak to Element X with Element X and your finished.  
Additionally group autorevive, defence ignore skills and attacks that group heal are standard in some of the hero's kit!  making it possible to yolo through encounters where your hero's get 1 shot with ease.
Bonus area's that are supposed to scale with my level, didn't seem to add any additional challenge.

I would have liked some additional mechanics for the 5th version of basically the same game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029615366', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 668, 'last_played': 1550167104}
review:
There's nothing too deep here but what is here is excellent.  It's a light RPG that doesn't take itself seriously and that does a great job at making the core elements strong enough that it doesn't get immediately boring like so many other casual games.

It's a combat focused game and the combat is fun - which is the bottom line.  It's turn-based combat, with enough strategic depth to make you pay attention and keep you honest (and entertained thru many similar battles), but not requiring a degree in RPG to deal.

Quirky but effective UI (quirky but effective is how you could describe this whole game), enough of inventory and loot to keep you hungry, some lite upgrade/other systems to add a little flavor.

The dialog/story are humorous (depending on your tastes) and ties things together but it's not a game one plays for rich and deep story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068221166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2647, 'last_played': 1681097181}
review: Jogo EBF desde o primeiro, pelos sites de jogos online em flash e posso afirmar que a franquia só evoluiu! Esse quinto jogo tá enorme! Tem muita coisa pra fazer, tá tudo muito bem feito, dá pra perceber o carinho do desenvolvedor com o projeto. Os mapas estão cheios de easter eggs e referências, os equipamentos e feitiços são bem variados e agora com a ultima atualização o jogo fico muito personalizável, finalmente posso controlar somente um personagem! Era algo que eu queria desde o primeiro, pois assim você pode investir tudo em um personagem e as batalhas ficam muito mais rápidas e desafiadoras! O sistema de invocações também está incrível, você pode se especializar em ser um "mestre pokemon" capturando dezenas de monstros! Até o sistema de cartas foi implementado, que dá um gostinho nostálgico de Ragnarok Online. To ansioso pelo próximo!!

review: Love the game. The artwork and animations are, well... epic. The soundtrack is probably one of my favorites from any video game, ever. There's so much content that I've managed to keep one game save alive for almost 90 hours and still haven't beaten the final boss. Most of all, I'm a huge fan of how in-touch with the community the developer is: incorporating fan-art and ideas as a main aspect of the game at times. 10/10, would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068506136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 6325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4444, 'last_played': 1702252215}
review: Recieved it with a discount from a coupon from purchasing Epic Battle Fantasy 4 before the release of this. It's a unique and classic take on RPG games. Combat follows standard old RPG styled games. You take a turn, then once your party's done, your enemies take their turns. Love the animations and references. There's a lot to discover, but I won't spoil any of it. Purchasing it on steam unlocks the "Deluxe" features, which are extra areas that don't give EXP, but can give powerful boss enemy variants as possible summons, extra gear that's really useful, and, my favorite, loving fanart of the game series and characters. Music discussion time: Phyrnna is the artist. Subscribe to her on everything. She deserves the love for all the music she's worked on here. If you aren't going through the deluxe areas, then I recommend looking up "A Breeze From Home" for the vocal version for probably the best track in this game. Besides that track, the music all fits their proper themes, which is great for a game to have. Would recommend it to anyone who doesn't have tons of time often but wants a quick, "Pick me up" game when they have 5-10 minutes to do a few fights and make progress.

author: {'steamid': '76561198969427058', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 28136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7964, 'last_played': 1699228499}
review:
Jogo maneiro, peguei no "bundle" com mais 2 jogos, e definitivamente, esse é o melhor dentre eles, tanto por ser um dos últimos jogos lançados pelo DEV.
Arte é incrível, apesar do meu computador arregar um pouco em algumas animações como: as dos especiais, que também me surpreenderam, não sendo tão repetitivos, e alguns até mudam, e podem ser realocados de personagem (Habilidades comuns também contam). Outra coisa que também gostei foi a música (Feita por Phyrnna), que me deixou no clima das "boss battles", além de usar algumas para relaxar. A história do jogo, nem só quem jogou os jogos anteriores vão conseguir entender, mas tem referencia que "só os de verdade sabem", isso que chamo de bom "game desing". 
No final, nota: 10/10

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198091130425', 'num_games_owned': 2883, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 2364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1585353189}
review:
Imagine if Oldschool Final Fantasy, Pokemon and South Park: The Stick of Truth had a baby.
The combat is phenomenal, the art is beautiful, the humor catches you off guard with pop culture references, 4th wall breaks, sudden dark moments and metacommentary about societal issues.
This really is a hidden Indie Gem and deserves way more attention than it currently gets.

review:
One of the funniest games I've ever played. I've been a fan of the franchise for a long time and the quality has been improved at every new release.
Best qualities of the game: 
- the tongue-in-the-cheek humor with the various references to the gaming culture
- relevant customization choices, making each battle entertaining
- attention to details and to community from the developers (v2 is awesome, btw, really love the new changes)

Highly recommended both for casual and for hardcore fans of the classic JRPGs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136711582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1555, 'last_played': 1675808058}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007950075', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6658, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5882, 'last_played': 1608956570}
review:
Easily the best game in the series. Fun characters and dialogue with a very classic and nostalgic turn based combat system that is very simple early on while providing complexity and challenge at a regular pace throughout the game. The sheer number of collectibles from the weapons and armor to the various monsters to capture provides several hours of hunting, puzzle solving, and boss fights. 

The best part for me though was medal hunting. I enjoy a challenge in my RPGs and the boss fights on epic difficulty provided just that. Overcoming the super bosses was some of the most fun I've had in an RPG in a long time. 

The 2.0 update as well added in a fresh new way to play the game with custom mods and the cheats & challenges menu allowing you to play a new run with weapons and armor having different stats and abilities and monster encounters being different throughout the world. Mixing and matching the cheats and challenges for an ideal play through has also been a treat allowing me to make the game more difficult while also providing some nifty conveniences to spice up battle. 

The game itself can be played for free from a number of places including the developer's website but I cannot recommend buying the game enough if only for the challenge dungeons and additional bosses. Well worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198736388084', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2968, 'last_played': 1645868074}

review:
되게 재밌는 RPG게임입니다
안 해보셨다면 한 번 해보는 것을 추천드립니다.
다회차 플레이도 지원하고 (달라지는 건 적은 것 같지만)
아이템 모으고 업적 달성하는 재미도 쏠쏠합니다.
난이도도 조절이 가능하고 여러 캐릭터들을 속성에 맞게 아이템과 스킬을 써가면서 싸우는 재밌는 게임입니다.

review:

Funny storyline, plenty of skills and combos, challenging if playing on the top dificulty for the fans of the genre.
I would wait for a sale if you want to buy it, or if like me you love the genre, then buy it.
Not sure if you will like it or not? Go to Kongregate website and test it out for free (A big chunk of the game isnt available this way, but you can complete the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058644382', 'num_games_owned': 666, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 5109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4031, 'last_played': 1582333655}
review:
Un de mes RPG tour par tour favoris , tout simplement.

L'histoire est bonne avec une tonne d'humour, les musiques classiques mais efficace.
Graphisme 2D de qualité, et une bonne diversité des décors / ennemis.

Le gameplay est top, on joue sur les elements et stuff pour des combats epic. La quasi totalité des ennemis affronté peut etre capturé pour apres servir d'invocation. De nombreuses capacité pour chaques perso; tout plein de stuff, la méteo; tout ça donne acces a une foule de combo en tout genre et pour tous les gouts. 

Le jeu est traduit dans plein de langues, possibilité de modifier la difficulté a n'importe quel moment. Et avec  la derniere grosse mise a jour, encore plus de possibilité de customisation de la partie. De quoi occuper des plusieurs dizaine d'heure n'importe qui et des centaines d'heures les plus acharnés. Bourré de reference qui raviront les gamers.

Amateur de rpg, jetés vous dessus !

author: {'steamid': '76561198046276102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1981, 'last_played': 1595879778}
review: It's another great sequel to an awesome turn-based RPG that has lots of has work and love put in to it. The characters are fun, the interactions are goofy and light-hearted, and some enemies are so cute you feel bad for smashing them. With the devs paying careful attention to detail with many high quality content updates, your want for more content from the EBF series will be quenched.

author: {'steamid': '76561198930595190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9570, 'last_played': 1682401609}
review: As a completionist, I love this game. I think what I like most about it, that a lot of other RPGs don't have, is that everything is fully respecable, so even if you're going in blind with the intent to get 100% completion, you never need to worry about making decisions you'll regret later, and you can tailor your strategy for each boss. There's a variety of equips so party members can be set up for attacking, tanking, status, buffs, debuffs, or whatever else. Shared skills can be unlearned and relearned by different PCs at no cost. Each type of permanent stat booster is usable on only one PC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044213916', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 9144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4104, 'last_played': 1688075279}
review:
Absolutely a treat for long time fans of this wacky series or RPGS. Especially built for people who love a good JRPG but think they could use a good ribbing here and there. 

It's a ton of fun with plenty of customization options, interesting enemies, and fun ways to play. Just be aware that if you try to beat this game 100 percent, you may want to consult a guild just so you don't miss anything important right off the bat and regret it for the rest of the run. Trust me, for the best time, go through once completely blind and don't try to get and do everything, and come back a second go around at a higher difficulty and then try to complete the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123117364', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2687, 'last_played': 1709749638}
review:
A laid back Final Fantasy experience with a lot of content with jokes here and there, that can get *hard* at times, but in my opinion it's best experienced playing on the hardest difficulty, otherwise it's too easy
You can still play this If you haven't played any of the previous titles it won't have any effect on the story other then "I understood that reference". If you enjoyed this one  you should give 3 and 4 a go since they are alike in gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198352868243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 10008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6557, 'last_played': 1704743937}
review:
[100% Achievements]
I've played this series since i was a literal child, I started with EBF3 and somehow managed to slide through the game on normal being like 9 and dumb. Now here I am over 100 hours (with many more to be played) *almost* completely in love with Epic Battle Fantasy 5. 

The game features an incredibly strategic battle system based on taking down and capturing a variety of foes by customizing your characters elemental resistances, attributes, skill sets, summons etc. before battles then stacking buffs upon debuffs and statuses, creating massive damage combos to tear through the often high HP of all who oppose your blood lust. The new cooldown system replaces MP entirely and forces you to think about the usage and timing of your moves in battle. Summons are also a new system that allows you to capture an enemy or even boss and call for it in battles using SP for a specified effect. There is so much customization and variability to how you  go about winning battles, even on epic! It helps make the experience feel so unique to other "jrpgs" of its kind. I'd push anyone into a real challenge to try out epic difficulty as it makes the strategy so much more rewarding. 

The game's art is really great and has cute chibi drawn sprites and tiles on the overworld and more detailed full-bodied sprites and environments in battle. It may take a while but its hard not to be captivated by Matt Roszak's art and the same could be said for Phyrnna's music which initially fits into a genre seems off for a jrpg but grows on you very quickly.

The story is about what you would expect being decent with a light fanservice to long time fans as 5 sort of takes a light reboot to the series with the story having nothing to do with past games. This time the already great, iconic cast have seen slight personality changes that really makes the team stick. Beware the writing is very hit or miss depending on if you are into meta/juvenile humor or not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393349677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1386, 'last_played': 1668115531}

review: 10/10 would seduce a fascist regime leader while destroying his tank with a wooly mammoth again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353573538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 3999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2341, 'last_played': 1585479003}
review:
A solid RPG that hits just about every sweet spot.

The game itself is not grindy, at least not that much. I only did a little bit of grinding at the very end and that's because I felt like it, not because I had to. Level ups are rare, but extremely rewarding ("+20 health? HAH! How about +2000 health!"). EXP is awarded based on the difficulty of the fight rather than the area, so the harder fights are more rewarding. The way exp scales makes it easy to catch up, but hard to get ahead. Generally, if you do about half of the "optional" combats you'll pretty much be fine, so long as you strategize.

Point 2, no random encounter system! As any RPG fan knows, random encounter systems are terrible. They constantly harass you when moving through low level areas, surprise you when you are in critical condition, and make grinding take longer. In EBF5, the monsters appear in the world, and block the way. Only a few monsters block the path forward, with a majority "guarding" chests or secret passages. Monsters blocking main paths will never respawn, but any monster that isn't obstructing the way to another area will come back as soon as you leave the screen, which allows for easy farming.

Point 3, Strategy! I've never been much for strategy, especially in pseudo-RPGs like Pokemon. The battles rarely last long enough to make that +whateveritis% effect worth taking a turn to use, and taking a turn to gain +50% damage for two turns is just ridiculous. Fortunately, EBF5 has long enough battles and potent enough buffs to make it worth it (most of the time). While most typical battle strategy often comes down to "use the right element of damage", but bosses force you to change around who is equipping what in an effort to deal more damage and resist incoming attacks.

Fortunately, you can change equipment mid-battle, although it costs a turn. What doesn't cost a turn, though, is swapping party members! You can switch any of your 3 frontliners with any of your 2 backups (provided the frontliners still have an action to take) for free. Heroes can also act in any order, and they always go first. No managing speed stats here.

The game is partially self-aware, making jokes about NPCs and various game elements. There is some mature content, mostly in the form of swearing and mature jokes, but there is also a recurring picture of "scantily clad anime girls" that will likely show up a lot since it is tied to the best buff skill in the game. Fortunately, all mature content can be disabled via the mature content filters.

The game also has "challenge areas", which are mainly one small portion of the map and all the optional dungeons. Challenge areas scale to your party level, which means they are always a challenge (go figure). There are many secrets to discover (at my last count there are two secret dungeons with their own secret bosses), and an observant player will likely discover all kinds of hidden chests and loot.

There's tons of achievements to go for, for those who are interested in that sort of thing. Achievements range from catching monsters to beating bosses on the highest difficulty to doing some secret things in secret places. All in all, a solid RPG experience.

review: 简单有趣，这四个字是对本作的最好形容，战斗可以随时逃跑，即使是boss战。难度适当的解密，随时随地的存档，所有怪物都可以捕捉，可以随时走开烦人的对话。数不清的梗，主角恰倒好处打破第四面墙的对话，一切一切都体现着作者的用心，马上要涨价了，也不怎么打折，快买吧，很久没有游戏玩的这么舒坦了，再见吧！从头而降的魔王，街角冒出的尖刀，不需要步步小心提心掉的的战斗，只享受最纯粹的乐趣

author: {'steamid': '76561198067583973', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 8116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4727, 'last_played': 1622307662}
review:
Dans un premier temps, un grand merci a toute l'équipe qui nous a offert le 5eme épisode de cette saga que j'ai connu très jeune (vers les 10-12 ans) avec le premier, qui soit dit en passent je n'ai jamais réussi T~T, et qui est devenue l'une de mes saga préférer du jeux vidéo, le jeux a des personnage à la fois drôle, haut en couleur et attachant, et dispose d'un humour que j'apprécie énormément qui vas des blague vaseuse j'jusqu’au grand "Adieu 4éme mur, on t'aimait bien" en passent pas l'humour sur le sexe. Relativement dynamique, je trouve, pour un jeu tour par tour, les dessin et animation sont superbement réussi et nous immerge totalement dans ce monde à la fois plaint de secret enchanteur et sombre, voir troublant. Je recommande fortement ce jeu et ces prédécesseurs qui savent jouer de leur propre réglé et réalité pour nous donner à la fois de l'amusement et beaucoup, BEAUCOUP, de rire et situation cocasse.
PS : Attention aux Nazis

author: {'steamid': '76561198066371443', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2191, 'last_played': 1666466688}
review: I used to watch this series way back when it was a flash animation on Newgrounds. I'm pleasantly surprised that as a game series, it's still a fun time. I think the thing that resonates the most with me is the creator's clear love and bias for Final Fantasy, Pokémon, and other JRPG's of the 90's. This game draws a ton of references and game mechanics from those series, as well as old school turn-based combat. I highly recommend this game for anyone craving a nostalgic JRPG experience.

review: I have played all of the other EBF games, and this one is by far the best. I have not beaten it yet, but my experiences thus far have been amazing. Also this paid version of the game is very much worth it. There are more items, and dialogue to go with some of those items, more areas with stories of their own, and some really cool bosses. If you are on the fence about getting this game, I'd say it is well worth both your money and time.

review: It really revolutionizes the genre, and has a lot of callbacks and lore to it. And there are some really cool 4th wall breaks. Even if you haven't played the previous games, this is still a really great game. And all the bonus content in the Steam version is a nice touch. It was worth the cost, 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200671349', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5101, 'last_played': 1655190632}
review:
普通难度初见一遍+史诗难度刷成就一遍+V2定制模式新档刷全成就完毕
超好玩就完事了b(￣▽￣)d

不过翻译有点问题，简中里面勇敢和高扬免疫减益写反了：
勇敢应该是免疫攻击减益（物攻魔攻）
高扬则免疫防御减益（物防魔防）
除此之外还有一些不像是有意为之的错别字，不过不影响游戏体验。

游戏中有不少让人会心一笑的地方[spoiler]，笑点比较奇怪的我看着“带带机器人”的名字和卡片介绍笑了半分钟_(:з)∠)_[/spoiler]

史诗难度提供了适当的挑战，只要用心打，全成就问题不大，还有作弊与挑战选项供有需要的人使用，宝箱寻探机和经验平分极大的提升了本强迫症的游戏体验www全成就之后在大画廊最后开放的房间里调查某个书架会添加一些额外的作弊选项，不要错过哦233

[spoiler]等哪天我把二周目打一遍，把最终boss抓了，我就圆满了[/spoiler]

review:

engancha muy facilmente por su estilo artistico que no es muy pulido, pero resulta agradable y algo retro.
En lo jugable no defrauda como RPG, con buenos jefes, minijefes, exploracion intuitiva y una waifu con muchos cosplays XD.
98% recomendado si buscan una experiencia graciosa y con gran jugabilidad.

review: Been a fan of the EBF series since the first one, this game is well worth the $15 price tag (soon to be $20, but with the content added for $5 it's honestly a steal). You get so much content for such a small price, especially if you're a fan of turn based RPG's. The vast amount of skills, equips, summons, animations this game has so much for those who've been with the franchise and for newcomers the 5th game is a great starting point. I couldn't be happier with how this game has been made and I look forward to any future projects Matt Roszak comes out with!

author: {'steamid': '76561198411558030', 'num_games_owned': 236, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 20157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 720, 'playtime_at_review': 7696, 'last_played': 1711781409}
review:
Honestly, what is there to say about this game which hasn't already been said? This game series is one of the most nostalgia inducing for me, with the second entry being one of my first forays into RPGs and the third being my first game that I actually tried to 100% (didn't do it at the time, but that's besides the point.) So when the 4th game came out I immediately dropped everything and went to play it. Some 40 hours later I had beaten it, and immediately turned around and went to go do it again. 

My point here is that the games stir memories for me and hold a special place in my heart, so when I saw number five, my wallet was open before I even knew that I had done so. And as you can tell from my record, I greatly enjoyed it. And still enjoy it. The game is fun and fairly easy to get into and keep playing, the graphics and art are beautiful, and the music is amazing as ever. Naturally the comedy is on point and the Easter Eggs are clever. And of course, the Characters have good chemistry with each other and their banter and conversations are funny and makes sense given their characterisations. Of course, the story is mostly just fine. Really nothing that special about it aside from the fact that it is a full reboot of the series up until 4, which makes sense since it's hard to raise the stakes much above [spoiler]killing, well, defeating God in combat[/spoiler]. So all things considered, it was a smart move, even though it somewhat disappointed since I had been looking forwards to seeing how the characters' relationship(s) with each other would develop. 

But the game isn't perfect and I do have a few gripes with it. I kinda dislike how they removed MP from the game, since it kinda doesn't give you much reason to not use your most powerful abilities (cooldowns really aren't that much of a balancing factor, and honestly just get kinda annoying.) And I have a few other misc gripes, though I can't really put them to words exactly. But none of this detracts from the game really. 

Anyways, that all said, the game is awesome and definitely the best in the series, and definitely has the most content to offer. As close to perfection as the series has gotten, and that's saying a lot. All in all, play this game if you like RPGs, Turn Based combat, or satirical takes on various games and the industry occasionally. 

tl;dr Amazing game, well worth the price of admission.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316422440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8067, 'last_played': 1646580484}
review:
AMO esse jogo!! Desde que eu era pequeno acompanho essa saga e agora posso apoiar financeiramente. É nítida a evolução a cada jogo e é muito bom poder acompanhar tudo. Deixando de lado um  pouco a mamação... é um otimo RPG com muitos equipamentos, habilidades e boa progressão, a historia não é aquelas coisas mas interage bem com os personagens criando situações divertidas, por sinal, os personagens são o grande pilar para se divertir o jogo todo, ver eles interagindo entre eles, com os NPCs ou com o cenário é a melhor coisa do jogo.
 
Obg pela atenção e perdoem a simplicidade da análise é a minha primeira e só estou fazendo por gostar muito do jogo. 
obs: Lance é o melhor

author: {'steamid': '76561197997456071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4779, 'last_played': 1696404958}
review:
Let's put things like the humor, or the graphics aside: EBF5 is a really solid rpg with a focus on fighting, with a lot of gameplay customization. Weapons, gear sets and accessories that give unique effects each that you can mix and match, a catalog of spells and limit breaks that you can freely asign to your characters to customize their ability kit to whatever you need, a summon system tied to a monster capture system, where you can capture pretty much any mob and boss (around 200), each one with a unique ability.

A recent update added a lot of extra content to do, like a solo arena, a lot of new mobs (and summons), additional challenge bosses, a whole bunch of new accessories, abilities and limit breaks. The update also added randomizer options when starting a run, that change the stats of mobs and gear, loot placement, etc. along with "cheats and challenges" that let you make the game easier or harder in specific ways beyond the difficulty settings (like allowing mobs to counterattack, or removing some elemental weaknesses from enemies).

Point is: it really is worth giving a chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044726396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 8827, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3938, 'last_played': 1699756629}
review:
The game wears its influences on its sleeve and does so quite humorously. The combat is like a JRPG, so do keep that in mind. There is enough enemy variety and player customization to keep things interesting. Epic is a real challenge, especially if you try to catch every boss. The developer has been supporting and updating the game since launch, so it still has bits and bobs to find in store. If you have played any of the Epic Battle Fantasy games and even remotely liked them. there is no reason to not pick this up. 
I will concede if you are not a fan of 2000's and 2010's game culture and the more unfortunate parts of it, it will not be the game for you. I.e. a bit of weeb culture and jiggly physics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116098129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8204, 'last_played': 1588804948}
review: I've been following the Epic Battle Fantasy series since the 3rd installment due to the old-school RPG elements. I love the aspect that I can upgrade the characters to my personal play-style and the characters themselves have such great character development & dialogue. The meme of Frye from Futurama throwing out money with the caption "just take my money" is 120% accurate with Matt Roszak and his amazing games. I have been away from gaming for about a year and a half and returned to steam to see that EBF5 has a massive update that I'm super pumped to see the new content. So, the creator also doesn't just release games and forget about them, he continues to make improvements (if possible, somehow seeing as how to me the game was flawless from day 1).

author: {'steamid': '76561198238957578', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 9085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5886, 'last_played': 1692322623}
review: Made a game and game series just 100 times better with new features.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035446732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 76048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35700, 'last_played': 1703398872}
review:
It might seem like just another turn-based RPG, but this one is anything but typical. The removal of mana in favor of a cooldown-based skill system is a huge bonus that makes combat way more interesting than just "spam one skill until you run out of mana." There are a bunch of other features that when combined with the huge amount of enemies make every fight seem unique. 

The only things I could think might turn someone off is that it's very lighthearted and rarely takes itself seriously. There are also quite a few pop culture references. Personally I like it, but if you're looking for some grandiose epic then this isn't it.

tl;dr Very good RPG with unique battle mechanics and fun writing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305156005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 2682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1126, 'last_played': 1658766637}
review:
游戏设计很不错, 很爽快, 玩起来一点也不纠结.
1. 属性强化每个角色分开, 不用纠结给谁吃.
2. 经验SP全队得, 不用纠结该谁上场.
3. 战斗中换人秒换, 不用纠结要不要浪费一次出手机会.
不过唯一纠结的地方在于极限技能有点鸡肋, 不加觉得不保险, 加了极限技能就会缺点数加小技能, 导致会更需要极限技能救场.
bgm好听. 画风可爱. 梗多欢乐多.

review:
Um RPG de turno de excelente qualidade, o qual você conta com personagens carismáticos, boa animação ,otimas BGMs, batalha épicas , diversos equipamentos e habilidades variadas. Peca um pouco na história, pois o jogo rompe com a série (Os jogos 1,2,3 e 4 possuem uma linearidade, que é rompida no 5 e justificada no fim do jogo).
Outro motivo de gostar desse jogo: ABOBORAS são seus inimigos mais fortes XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198044806737', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 3597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1678103249}
review: Epic Battle Fantasy isn't a series of games. It's an institution. It's the 2000s made manifest. It's a cultural moment, forever captured in a stylish, fun, unique RPG. It's a labour of love unlike anything else, with a developer who's been reaching out to and servicing his community for almost twenty years. Paying for these games, which are freely available elsewhere isn't paying for a product; it's supporting art.

author: {'steamid': '76561198843244411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3470, 'last_played': 1596195468}
review:
ターン制RPG。操作はマウスでやるとしやすい。（隠しの宝箱見つけやすいため）
様々なネタが仕込まれていて、わかるとにやりとできる。
バトルは高難度になるにつれてデバフとバフ、装備の効果が重要になるので考えながら戦うので戦闘は単調にはなりにくい。雑魚戦でも油断すると負けるぞ！
魅力的なのはモンスターを捕獲出来て、使えること。もちろんボスも捕獲可能！

ステージはパズル要素もたくさんあり宝箱コンプはなかなか難しい。

実績は高難度ボス突破やコンプなどやりこみ要素もしっかり！

author: {'steamid': '76561198145421262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 852, 'last_played': 1581092311}

author: {'steamid': '76561198338743743', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 8331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4835, 'last_played': 1708873182}
review:
This is a great game. It has a thrilling story, a dark sense of humor, an extremely well made soundtrack, a fun, well made Battlesystem with a lot of different strategies, as well as a huge variety of enemys and bosses which you can even capture and use during your next battles.  
The game and the DLC are definitely worth their money!

review:
优点:
-丰富的武器种类
-元素相加的加倍伤害
-极限技的娜塔莉的福利
-宝可梦式的抓捕系统
-很多游戏的梗，以及陈年旧梗
-技能的多样化以及输出的多样化
缺点:
-有很多材料不太好打
-徽章如果不看介绍很容易错过
-队友得扫描才能进入图鉴里面，如果忘了就会少一个队友的图鉴
-不用鼠标有很多地方不去滑动不知道是否有隐藏物品，一直拿鼠标会很累

总的来说可以打8分，是一款很不错的小品级游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198044445879', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 5422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4244, 'last_played': 1625919077}
review:
EBF5 is the game I would reccommend to anyone looking for the textbook example of great JRPG experience. My one reccomendation for them would be to crank the difficulty up to Epic first thing in the game: this is one of the few games I know of that keeps the hardest difficulty still incredibly fair towards the player. Instead of playing a number game of when you've grinded enough to kill the next boss, you have to plan, strategize, look for resources and even lose several times to the same battle to get a gist of which attacks you can afford to take and which you have to protect against. 
With five characters and dozens of skills, I cannot name a single one of them that didn't feel essential at some point in the game: especially in the endgame, fighting becomes all about picking the best counter to an enemy's pattern. And the fact you could find a unique weapon, armor or accessory anywhere keeps you looking everywhere to increase your chances to have the right gear for important battles.

This is even more relevant in the side areas, where no amount of level grinding will make battles easier for you. You WILL try and fail several times against the mega bosses in Epic mode. And the payoff of finally getting the pattern down, making the perfect strategy and winning knowing you were given no intrinsic advatage and it was all thanks to wits and experience is one of the greatest satisfactions a game can ever give you.

That's it for the gameplay, but it would be an injustice not to mention the game's aesthetic. The graphics are simple and charming and it's surprising how little they had to change from the original flash games. The music is a great mix of classical RPG tropes and more modern beats. The plot and lore aren't the game's main focus but they manage to give the main characters their own charm. All in all it's a must play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009381250', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 9710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 2073, 'last_played': 1712280289}
review: This game is amazing. Definitely worth the money I paid for deluxe. The flash game is very good, but when you get deluxe, you get access to so much more content. Multiple optional dungeons, new items, and more. I also love how the extra dungeons feels like it's actually a part of the game, and how it's worked into NPC dialogue. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198108802863', 'num_games_owned': 1544, 'num_reviews': 250, 'playtime_forever': 4820, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4534, 'last_played': 1639835547}
review:
75小时史诗难度全成就全收集通关撒花
本作不仅游戏性十足，玩起来非常上瘾，而且充满了大量有意思的沙雕梗，令人不禁会心一笑。如果你是回合制rpg的爱好者，那么就买吧，绝对值得。
战斗方面其实比较简单，普通难度几乎无脑莽就行了，所以建议调整到史诗难度，否则很容易陷入无聊。
攻击的时候注意敌人弱点，合理利用debuff可以造成巨大的伤害。因此小队配置方面，只需要4个防御和回复拉满的负责治疗加buff和debuff的肉盾工具人，以及一个唯一大腿就可以轻松刷boss了。甚至面对没有毒免火免的boss，比如丢人的猫树，你可以5个人都防御拉满，只需要给boss上毒上燃烧之后，等他自己死掉就可以了。
史诗难度负责输出的队友防御太低基本每回合都会死。如果死后再复活，buff会清空，如果提前挂上复活buff，死后自动复活，之前上的buff不会消失；以及高昂状态可以高于半血的时候保持一击不死，利用好这两点就可以轻松愉快的吊打史诗难度boss了。
你甚至可以尝试秒杀最终boss，先减魔抗，然后上虚弱，最后一回合工具人一号兰斯开核弹上踉跄，娜塔莉防御（穿防御加80魔攻的装备），工具人二号队友让娜塔莉再来一次，娜塔莉开极限技黑洞。差不多可以把大半血的boss直接秒杀23333

review: If you're a fan of turn-based RPGs, this is one of the best I've played, and I highly recommend it. It doesn't have any of the combat gimmicks that most of its kindred have (no quick-time events when you attack, for instance,) but it's got great strategic depth, a charming and funny storyline, and lots of weapons, armor, and other goodies to collect throughout. Matt's been making this series for a long time, and each new installment tops the others, with this being no exception.

review: I was incredibly hyped for this game to finish but now that the game is done I'm disappointed. I enjoyed ebf4 but the cooldown system in this game really fucks me over. I'm not sure if it's just me or that the game seems drawn out. Some animations seem to take longer than it should and now that skills have a cooldown, battles seem to take forever waiting for skills to come up and animations to finish. Overall I just want the mp to come back ;-; and for Matt to have windslash not Nolegs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044555219', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4185, 'last_played': 1651892309}
review:
Really fun turn-based RPG game. As with the past games, it's a good balance of accessibility/complexity. The game might look simple and cheesy, but once you get into you realize it's not. There's a ton of monsters, items, skills and weapons to go through so the game always feels fresh. There's also a LOT of secrets/puzzles that break up the combat and give the game an extra layer of depth.

Also you don't have to have played the past games to enjoy it all. That holds true for the story as well, you just won't get some references.

Also Lance did nothing wrong.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072861675', 'num_games_owned': 717, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 2870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2870, 'last_played': 1576509148}
review:
Simplesmente EPICO!

Um ótimo RPG de turno, recomendo demais essa franquia para quem quer se introduzir a Rpg's de turno! Cada personagem tem sua caracteristica unica, muitas referências a outros jogos, muitas piadas e frases durante a batalha, deixam a gameplay muito mais interessante. As animações são impecáveis, músicas ÉPICAS, inimigos variados, e muita diversão nesse jogo.

O sistema de batalha é igual aos outros jogos da franquia mudando pouquissimas coisas, como por exemplo a introdução de clima, a remoção da mana, mudança de nomes de algumas habilidades e algumas animações, retirou alguns inimigos dos jogos anteriores e foi introduzido novos, também é possivel jogar com o SemPés que ajuda bastante nas batalhas. Possui muitos equipamentos e habilidades, algumas quests paralelas e puzzles te distraem bem, não são enjoativas e complexas demais para se fazer.

O que me chateou no game foi que a franquia toda seguia uma ordem +/- cronológica, e nesse quinto jogo, o criador [spoiler] Matt Roszak [/spoiler] cagou para a história e refez novamente com uma outra linha temporal, tudo bem que dá a se entender na batalha final, porém acredito que poderia ter feito algo melhor do que simplesmente recriar a história.

CONTUDO.
É um jogo TOP!

author: {'steamid': '76561198145551601', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 12215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6152, 'last_played': 1708402157}
review: บอกได้คำเดียวว่า"คุ้ม" ส่วนตัวเป็นแฟนเกมติดตามเกมนี้มาตั้งแต่ภาค 3 จนถึงภาค 5 ถึงแม้ว่าเกมจะออกมานานแล้วแต่ผู้พัฒนายังใส่ใจผู้เล่นโดยการอัพเดตเกมให้อย่างต่อเนื่องและที่สำคัญคือมันอัพเดตฟรี

author: {'steamid': '76561198090500948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5195, 'last_played': 1689019196}
review:
Wears its inspiration on its sleeve, but somehow captures and distills everything that made its source material fun while filtering out all the slog that plagues the genre. Not afraid of tropes and references, but still manages to feel fun and silly rather than tired and cliché. The developer keeps hinting that he put fun before balance, but somehow the balance came out right-side-up anyway.

For a game that doesn't often go out of its way to cement its own identity, the director clearly had his own vision. All his decisions seem to follow the argument "because it would be fun," and never "because it's an RPG."

review: It's very much worth the amount paid. Normally I don't like when games call back to older installments, but here it's absolutely perfect, especially as this is pretty much supposed to be the last EBF game. So, buy it. Do. It.

author: {'steamid': '76561198859973675', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4505, 'last_played': 1577634780}
review:
Nunca esperaba que saliera la quinta entrega..pero aun asi..para los fanaticos de este juego..nos siguen sorprendiendo. El juego brinda muchas horas de entretenimiento. El mapa es bastante grande lo que te permite explorar muchas zonas (Incluso las que estan ocultas y cada uno presenta un desafio dfiferente.) Los enemigos estan bastante bien logrados y la animacion es excelente. Otro plus que le agregan al juego y que no podia faltar, es el humor que tiene..para que el juego no solo sea serio y de accion.
La musica es bastante buena, la dificultad a medida que se avanza es cada vez mas complicado.
Asique si te gusta los juegos por turnos y de Aventura con una buena historia, ¡ ESTE ES TU JUEGO !

author: {'steamid': '76561198167460183', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 12147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7539, 'last_played': 1582700612}
review:
Best game of the whole series. The game has made it possible for players to switch out difficulties at any time and that's a great feature that i think everybody likes. The summon feature is definitely a mini rip-off pokemon style but man its amazing to use. Strategizing with these new features whether its collecting AP or EXP, is really an intensive process that is SUPER fun to get into. The bosses in this are really hard and challenging which i think everybody can appreciate, and using the knowledge of combo, critical and elemental hits and bonuses can really inspire people to think ahead.

And veterans can appreciate the "Epic" difficulties challenges as they are next to impossible to achieve unless some deep thinking is done, examples are the dreaded arcade boss rush and mega boss rush medals. Completing these achievements actually gives the player the feeling of "achieving something".

So, tl:dr, this game contains so many references to other stuff and alot of nice colour combinations, pleasing to the eye, great artworks and style, with a great story and rpg structure. Highly recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198155425250', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7070, 'last_played': 1602866876}
review:
Alors ... Que dire ? Il y a tellement de choses à dire ...
Il est, selon moi, à la limite de la perfection. Et encore, c'est encore en développement ! Non, les combats, comme pour le troisième et quatrième opus sont très accrocheurs, d'autant que les musiques qui nous accompagnent sont assez ... ''immersives'' et donnent donc d'avantage envie d'y jouer. Je suis un grand fan de ce jeu, comme pour le 1er/2ème/3ème/4ème Opus ainsi que les dérivés (Bullet heavens, etc). J'aimerais en dire d'avantage mais bon, je ne voudrais pas vous spoil donc je ne continuerai pas. CEPENDANT, jeune joueur, je te le recommande grandement !

author: {'steamid': '76561198289723098', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 7148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4765, 'last_played': 1630343144}
review:
Controls are kind of clunky and have small problems regarding path finding. Other than that, I can say that the game, for its price, is worth it. You get a lot of fun and if you are the one dude who wants to complete the achievements (133 in total), this game worth many tries, trials and errors, and all that. Imagine this as EBF 2 or 3, with more enemies, loot, and weapons for you to collect and use.

Verdict: Get it. It's worth the nostalgia and the 7th Heaven if you're a hardcore fan of these types of flash games back in the day. Though sometimes you had to pray to the RNGesus, but all in all, the game's fair and balanced to the core. Consider buying when it's on sale, but at full price, I think it's fair enough. And also, new contents are keep coming.

A little advice:
Never underestimate the Glitch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198808813901', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1702643091}
review:
Honestly one of the best RPG games I've ever played.

It gives me old Flash game vibes, and it's pretty decent one in collection of Flash Games. I played the entire series of EBF, it's very nice overall, and I heard the developer will get the old games to Steam, so it's time to be a nonlifer and finish all of them again!

Seriously though, this worth my money. I was waiting for EBF5 for a long time after EBF4 was over, I kept playing and playing and this got released? Hell yeah, it was time to buy this game.

It features alot of things, bosses, equipments, even a bestiary! It has cards too!

'm sayin, this is one of the games you should play once in your lifetime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041691805', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4305, 'last_played': 1583081695}
review:
An amazing and stylistically appealing strategic RPG which provides dozens of hours of challenging and varied content, also accompanied by an amazing soundtrack.
If you go for 100% completion you're gonna find a lot of things to accomplish here.
The game is also getting a new update soon, and I'm very excited to play the new content.
Have been following the series since the third game, which absolutely blew my mind when it was first released, and I am very happy for how far everything has come.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324006281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 18422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4857, 'last_played': 1625286038}
review: 非常好玩的一款游戏，里面的五个主角每个人都性格鲜明且独特，想一想五个好朋友在一起完成一场史诗般的冒险是一件多么令人羡慕的事情啊。游戏的bgm也非常好听，在家中温馨的感觉，打boss时激烈且震撼的场面以及面对最终boss时的危机感，全部都记忆犹新，让人回味无穷。游戏的战斗机智也是独出一格，和大多数回合制游戏不同，它去除了角色固定的攻击顺序，让整场战斗更加的附有战略性，打败敌人的方式更加花样性。没玩过前几代史诗幻想是我的一个遗憾，但我会逐渐把前面的几作给补完。愿作者可以一直把这个史诗般的故事讲下去。

author: {'steamid': '76561198077622055', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 8953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5267, 'last_played': 1686408471}
review:
I absolutely love this game as it has almost everything I loved from EBF4. The biggest thing is the complete revamp of the combat system. Equipment having more resistance buffs makes it more fun to experiment with different setups and the AI being smarter on higher difficulties makes it more of a strategy game than you'd think. As always Phyrnna absolutely killed the soundtrack for the game. There was only one occurence where I muted the game and had another song playing on the side [spoiler] and that was during the battle against god. The song in itself isn't bad but personally it didn't fit as a battle theme [/spoiler]

The final boss also gave me massive fps drops but it's easily fixed by not playing in fullscreen.

The only negative thing i have about this game is that [spoiler] the evil copies of the characters were hard as it was and then they got buffed as they apparently were too easy? I've tried for an insane amount of time to beat/capture them on epic but after the nerf its borderline impossible with Matt and completely impossible for Nat and Anna. [/spoiler]

Rant over, 

It's a fantastic game and it's sad that it doesn't have as much recognision as it should have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151081758', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 11177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5183, 'last_played': 1677730462}
review:
A fun and humorous RPG. Featuring five interesting playable characters on their quest to save the world. Use powerful skills, destructive limit breaks, and even other enemies to defeat or capture your opponents. Difficulty can be changed at any time outside of battle to give you your preferred level of challenge. V.2 comes with many improvements and expanded content.

I Loved the game. The biggest change to this game over others in the series is a switch to cooldowns instead of a mana system. I believe that this leads to much more variety in battle and more interesting gameplay, encouraging use of the backup characters. I've gotten so much out of this game and I haven't even finished the main story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198433260876', 'num_games_owned': 13, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2630, 'last_played': 1688517222}
review:
This game is awesome, it's the pinnacle of so many years of work and nostalgia, and it is great. I started the series with EBF3, it was my first real game, and i loved EVERYTHING about it, but back then, I didn't know english at all, and i struggled really hard. I think this game is one of the reasons i became good at english (well, kinda). Honestly, i'm posting that after the v2.0 release, but these words were within me from the very beginning, when i started EBF3 for the first time.
I am looking forward to maybe be able to battle against the bosses of the older games, Akron, Zombie Goku, Godcats (without spoiling, i hope...) with the new mechanics.
The music is also one of the greatest parts of the ENTIRE GAME SERIES! Phyrnna, you got an incredible job done with the music, and i'm glad i'm able to listen to it. My favorites being Divine Madness, Organ Jaws, Chase, Under my skin, and obviously, A Breeze From Home w TroisNyx, when i first heard it, during a very, VERY special battle (not spoiling you out here :p), it made me cry tears of joy and nostalgia. Estavius is also fantastic.
Matt, Ronja, Phyrnna, you've done an incredible job keeping the charm, the nostalgia of the series, and i'm glad i play it.
With love, from France, au revoir!

author: {'steamid': '76561198863488803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7818, 'last_played': 1577371181}
review:
从三代起就开始追，每一代都相当有意思

=====================================分割线
时隔两年，决定完善一下这篇评测。
该游戏系列从一代一直延伸到目前的五代，游戏开发史已经有十年以上，也是很多小游戏玩家或多或少接触过的一款游戏，还可能是不少人的童年回忆。
我不是游戏测评员，对游戏的一些定义不清楚，只能说出这款游戏属于RPG式游戏，但给我的感觉是非常舒适的，推荐喜欢RPG的玩家试一试这款游戏。
画风就像宣传片和商店截图所显示的一样，作者Matt本人擅长的可爱又不失结构感的卡通画风，搭配游戏里同样是由作者设计的背景环境，并不会让人感觉到违和，如果沉下心来，也能够找到融入感。
剧情上看的话，一路走下来，matt富有想象力同时又有合理性的脑洞，会将你尽快的带入游戏的世界观中，以及游戏中作者会设置各种对玩家的充满诙谐的调侃或对话，让玩家在剧情体验中充满乐趣。具体内容建议自己游玩得到体会，同时剧情和前面的系列也是连贯的（1、2、3、4、5代，但1、2代未在steam上架，想探索前代剧情的玩家可以从3代开始玩），有一套游戏自己的世界观。
游戏机制的设置上，RPG游戏应有的装备系统、技能系统、属性系统、战利品系统、任务系统等（不太了解RPG游戏设计，所以说几个游戏中确实存在的），几乎都被作者考虑进去并调试成了一套合理的体验系统。游戏并没有抛弃装备的游戏进程适用性，装备随玩家收集或购买的材料升级后具有比前一级更好的属性，而材料的种类也随着区域的探索增多才能增多，不会出现前期能直接升满级的情况，也就是每一件装备有可能很早就能得到，但它会随着装备的升级，属性的提升而能继续使用，没有前中后期的区分。同时，对一些BOSS战，特殊战，也要稍微动脑想一想对装备进行合理的搭配，不同的装备搭配会有不同的属性，有的可能非常适用于一场特殊战，玩家不能将一砍到底的战法用于所有的战斗，有一些地方需要考虑到战法，也丰富了游戏的可玩性。不过游戏中设置了不同的难度并可以随时切换，无论是想动脑挑战自己的玩家，还是想一路快速杀过看剧情的玩家都可以轻松满足。
音乐方面也是一个亮点，EBF系列的御用音乐家将它做的很到位，她的音乐有自己的独特风格，搭配游戏的画风与场景，会有身临其境般的感觉。
游戏的细节也非常到位，一些NPC或地图场景，或战斗......很多方面都能体现出来。同时作者在自己开发的早期游戏中是有加入自己在设计时的原画的，包括游戏场景，敌方图鉴，还画过pokemon，幻想生物一类的，可以看到matt的爱好挺广泛的，还出现过不少其他作品角色的彩蛋。也显得作者的诚意很足，是真正在游戏上花了心思设计出的作品。
我认为它能给大多数玩家带来愉快心情和良好的体验，也许玩上一会儿，就能带来一段好心情。推荐尝试。

author: {'steamid': '76561198123445724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 6018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5914, 'last_played': 1640968631}
review:
If you aren't familiar with the series already, I recommend trying out EBF4 first to make sure you like the overall playing style of the game.

Definitely worth the buy if you enjoyed EBF4! A great continuation of the series, expanding upon the tagging out feature EBF4 introduced, as well as some of the series lore. I don't really like the new 'pet' capturing feature (mainly due to the low SP point cap), but it is still useful. I preferred EBF4's MP system to EBF5's move cooldown system, but the game isn't any less enjoyable because of the changes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122249783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 7313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5389, 'last_played': 1615029012}
review:
A great game that sticks to the roots of the series from way back on flash in browsers. With version 2 now in the beta, I'm very happy that at least one of the games I'm waiting on has gotten its update. 
Pros:
+5 idiots to choose from to fight with (3 at a given time or less with version 2)
+NoLegs is the 5th idiot: for those who don't know, he's been with the group at least since the 3rd game
+Humor: I refer to the main characters as idiots for good reason, and there's a ton of jokes throughout
+RPG Strategy: Set up various status effects to decimate your enemies, or risk letting them do so to you
+Diversity: exclusive to version 2, change the location of foes, weather, equips, and basically change up the way you play the entire game

Cons
-the free version has an NPC telling his boss he can't enter his own dungeon, worth playing free version just for that
-MP is gone, I'm used to this feature in every other rpg I play, and I didn't see it as something that needed to go

TLDR: Great game overall, 9/10
Also recommend 3 and 4 to learn more about the idiots

author: {'steamid': '76561198373110658', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2300, 'last_played': 1653275114}
review:
玩过最棒的回合制rpg之一，海量的解谜和收集要素简直就是收集控的狂欢，解谜有难有易，不会让人束手无策，也绝不会感到无聊，剧情有趣，在无数闹着玩的梗中拯救一个世界，几乎每一个地点每一次战斗，都能发现新的惊喜，这些都是制作人对这款游戏用心的体现。
这款游戏实在是太棒了，我简直感觉它就是回合制rpg的范本，如果一定要鸡蛋里挑骨头，那它的画风，回合制玩法不是每个人的菜，还有全成就的难度可能就是它唯三的“缺点”，如果你不在意这三点，还喜欢rpg，那它一定能在你心中占据一个“神作”的位置。

author: {'steamid': '76561198106944730', 'num_games_owned': 1136, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 938, 'last_played': 1700802369}
review: This is a wonderful and humorous game for anyone who is a fan of JRPGs. It has some of the most fun and masterful turn-based combat I have ever played. The game tackles both the challenge-killing strategy of spamming powerful moves and the inconvenience of mana management by implementing a cool-down system instead. The ability to switch out party members mid-battle and curate a list of summons from captured foes gives a level of flexibility not found in other JRPGs, and the wide assortment of equipment in the game rewards planning for enemy encounters, especially on higher difficulties. The challenge can be tailored to any skill level, and the new 2.0 update (in beta as of writing) provides players with even more ways to customize the difficulty and challenge to an even greater degree. There is so much to sink one's teeth into with this game, and I highly recommend it to anybody who likes turn-based combat and lighthearted games that don't take themselves overly seriously.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146596977', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3007, 'last_played': 1581919370}

author: {'steamid': '76561198046814890', 'num_games_owned': 713, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1929, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1929, 'last_played': 1647404879}
review:
Starting out as a browser flash game, the Epic Battle Fantasy series has been around for quite a long time. And like a fine wine, it has only improved with age. Each entry in the series has been far and above the previous, and the 5th is no exception. A fun, challenging RPG with a metric fuck-ton of stuff to do. The currently in-beta 2.0 update even includes a baked-in randomizer for new games, which is an awesome option to see a dev put it, and adds tons more replayability.

If you enjoy classic RPGs like FF or Chrono Trigger, EBF5 is a must-play title.

review:
This is an absolute gem of a game. Since EBF3 the game has been great, but this time around, you just have to give it to the dev (Matt). The game has the perfect amount of tropes and homages without feeling like a simple way to pander to nostalgia.

It's classic retro gaming at this finest, the best of the modern and the best of the classic side by side.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017592284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 21544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9603, 'last_played': 1703635618}
review: Simple enough to pickup and play, complex enough to strategize for a variety of tactics on every encounter.  It's a good culmination of it's history and thensome, touching a few real world issues while leaning on gaming meta humor.  Something for every kleptomaniac; easter eggs abound, plenty of secrets to find, quests to fetch, and an armory to collect.  Difficulty can be changed about any time though epic is where the challenge comes from, backtracking puzzlers and a handful of optional dungeons that are worth the effort to complete of course.  It does have manual saves so be sure to use it if you plan on multiple unique playthroughs, as automatic saves with every screen transition but only the most recent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198928232090', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1223, 'last_played': 1576925579}
review:
无意之间在steam上发现了此游戏，进行了二十小时的游玩后，深切的意识到自己遇到宝贝了。
这是我接触的此系列的第一款游戏，从中体会到制作者的深切用心，几百M大小的游戏却让人如同遇见RPG大作一般让人无法自拔。

 正如游戏的介绍所说，这是一款充满了趣味的游戏，无论是整体还是细节都是如此。
游戏内容在复杂与简介上实现了统一，达到了‘丰富’的目标，例如：

1、角色拥有可以升级的技能，但是除了每位角色拥有的固定技能外，可以做npc任务获得新技能，这些新技能可以向装备一样给不同的角色装备，想换个人用就可以换，如此一来，技能的使用搭配既丰富又方便。
2、角色能够获得大量装备，装备可以通过素材升级，素材非常容易获得，打一会儿后打开装备界面看看那个素材够了可以升级，点一点就可以了。
3、抓住敌人为自己所用，这个玩法非常有趣，玩家甚至可以捕获一些明显是boss的角色（学会堆debuff就不会很难），这些敌人可以当成是额外的技能，在之后的战斗中可能会有大用处。
4、非常多值得探索的东西，有些成就解锁的方式令人意想不到，简单的解谜要素，隐藏的宝箱，都值得深入挖掘。
5、我最近对回合制游戏感到疲软，因为RPG回合制游戏往往要重复烦躁无趣的流程，而游戏中角色在战斗中会经常吐槽敌人，还会对彼此的技能吐槽，五个被戏称为“画残了的二次元角色”的主角在丰富的台词与互动下变得令人喜爱，生动活泼。
6、马特和娜姐这对CP我锁了，然后官方说这是官配，好！！！

我还没有通关，因为我得知了二周目不能完成史诗难度的成就，打算重新来过，在此，我诚心向大家推荐这款游戏，既然这是一款小品级的游戏，那在我看来应该是春晚小品级的吧（笑），好的游戏比比皆是，但是我们能发现并真正玩到的可能不多，而这一款《史诗战斗幻想5》大家不妨来试一试，或许满足不了所有人的口味，但是绝对能让您觉得物超所值。

author: {'steamid': '76561198096339075', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5930, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2757, 'last_played': 1684943864}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 5,por donde comienzo...

Para empezar vuelve a la antigua formula de turn based combat,cosa que hoy en dia es poco comun y se agradece mucho.
Tambien tiene una dificultad constante que puedes ajustar,no te interesa el gameplay o los logros y solo quieres la historia? O prefieres un desafio que te hara farmear un monton para ganar? Ambos son posibles
Los personajes son tan carismaticos como siempre y en lugar de simplemente unirse de una como en juegos anteriores (EBF3 y 4) los desbloqueas mientras juegas.
Hablando de desbloquear,el sistema de habilidades es de los mejores que vi en bastante tiempo,dandote la opcion de elegir que mejorar u obtener dependiendo de lo que necesites es genial.

En resumen,un gran juego con muchisimo que disfrutar (que encima sigue siendo actualizado) por lo que lo recomiendo para todos

author: {'steamid': '76561197976081787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 3750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2337, 'last_played': 1599079379}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 5 (EBF5) is your standard turn based RPG. Well, not so much.. It is a standard RPG but it is much deeper than that.

As the story goes, there are monoliths that have shown up in the world and it is your job to figure out why. The main story is pretty basic and flimsy. However the fun of this game is in the actual journey. The developer has spent a lot of time adding conversations and subtle details to just about every aspect of the game. You will be in a boss battle literally having a comical conversation about how ugly they are or how one of your characters died prematurely.

Honestly the writing in this game is quite hilarious. When the 4th game came to Steam I picked it up and had fun. Then the 3rd game came out (It is also free) in which I definitely picked it up and had a blast again. After a long wait this game came out and did not disappoint.

You will start out with 2 characters and build your team up to 5. Each character his their own skillsets that will make them more or less effective against certain creatures. Your equipment will help enhance or change some of the effects making it possible to build a kicking team. Add on the fact that you have 3 main fighters and can bring in the others any time during your turn makes this a very interesting game.

So with all that firepower at your disposal, the game is not going to make the fights easy. The locations have status effects, there are instant death attacks, multiple waves of enemies, and lots of status effects! Honestly that last part you will definitely need to know to survive. If a the enemy is wet hit them with lightning for extra damage. But be warned, if they may absorb the attack and actually gain life... Know your enemies

There is no voice acting but the music is always interesting and meld well with the environments.

The game is highly detailed but is no way state of the art. The game goes for a more chibi style that is comical yet detailed. As your characters take damage they expressions change. Even the enemies have this. Do not let the comical style fool you, the game is very artistically detailed.

 One of the newest additions to this game is the pokemon style capture system. In the game you can capture enemies and most bosses. However this will not be easy.

Last thing to point out. Due to the developers choice of engine, the game does not have native controller support. You are keyboard and mouse for this one. Bit of a shame but the game is still definitely worth playing.

If you loved 3 and 4 you will definitely enjoy this one. EBF5 is bigger, badder, and quite hard-er...
