review: A charismatic and polished expansion on everything the previous games in the series did right. A vibrant, visually interesting style, combined with stunning music from Phyrnna, creates an amazing, fun atmosphere. The mechanics of EBF4 are developed upon, alongside engaging new additions that constantly keep gameplay fresh. Huge build customisation, superb overworld-design, and a heap of strategy make this a game to remember.

review: if you haven't played the Epic Battle Fantasy series then 5 is the best one to jump into, though I couldn't recommend the others enough. The game honestly oozes charm and humor the entire way through. The turned based combat system is simple enough to understand as well. Also theres nothing stopping you from running from a fight as you don't lose anything at all. So starting a fight, scanning the enemies, and running away to equip better gear for the battle is encouraged.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277551435', 'num_games_owned': 409, 'num_reviews': 224, 'playtime_forever': 1414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1414, 'last_played': 1575019762}
review:
Juegazo. RPG de la vieja escuela increíble.
PROS: - Humor y referencias a otros juegos apoteósicos.
           - Jugabilidad sencilla pero entretenida.
           - Dificultad y profundidad para todos los gustos.
           - Gráficos discretos pero llenos de detalles y cariño.
           - Historia principal larga (23 horas), multitud de secretos y rejugable.
           - Traducción al castellano magistral, de las mejores que he visto.
CONTRAS: - Sin soporte para 21:9.

author: {'steamid': '76561198979160092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1129, 'last_played': 1661957663}
review: I have been a long time fan, and this is the best in a long line of great games. It starts a little slow to teach you the basics which is great if you are a newcomer, but a tad tedious if you have played before although it is still appreciated as a lot of mechanics work very differently from EBF4 such as debuffs, and certain elements. It's a bit disappointing that the enemies in newgame+ aren't leveled to you, but if I remember that may be fixed in the update that is coming soon. I can't think of anything else bad to say about the game. The skills and elements combo great with each other, the enemies and combat is as amazing as always, if you like turn based RPG games I would strongly recommend this game. It has been and remains one of my favorite game series of all time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264434835', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 16350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1693591204}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055450921', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3144, 'last_played': 1553288752}
review: I think at the end of the day what I liked most about this game is that it's Fun, Pure and Simple. EBF5, it's not out to get you, it's not trying to ruin your day with it's challenges, It's an easy game to get along with.  The dialog is funny, the combat system is is strait forward, easy enough to understand, and is always willing to remind what does what if you forgot without,  has plenty of customized options that you can even change in battle, and lets you start the fight when your good and ready (i.e no random encounters). I've been a fan of the series for a while, and it's absolutely worth a look.

review: Well Nate has done it again. EBF 5 is everything 4 was and then some. It's got the wacky cast, the meta jokes, the goofy/horrifying easter eggs, a story to love and even better gameplay than the previous title. So if you're a fan of the series or just like turn-based rpgs in general then this game is heavily recommended

review: Very fun and quirky game, decent improvement over its predecessor and miles ahead of 3, though the past three games are better than the first two entries by far.

author: {'steamid': '76561198815062505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3716, 'last_played': 1553800668}
review:
我的評論基本上就跟遊戲說明文一樣（因為我們翻的）
優點：
有趣動腦的機關（戰鬥、場景小謎題）
多樣化技能
抓寶系統
各式福利（如果你吃這一味的話）
趣味對話小彩蛋（如果能全部觸發，我會很高興的）
做人要公平
缺點：
並沒有峰迴路轉的狗血劇情（？！）
簡單來說
這是一款十分好玩的回合制RPG小品
如果對繁中的翻譯有任何問題，可以在我這裡留言
或者是在Discord
我或者其他人都會樂意一起討論

author: {'steamid': '76561198166070948', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 6440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4954, 'last_played': 1582699499}
review:
As rude and crude as the character's dialogue goes (I swear, it's only stuff 12 year-olds would find amusing) this game (and it' s predecessors) are beloved by many a fan.

I highly recommending buying this game, as well as at least checking out the soundtrack. There's a reason it's had so many sequels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083126755', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3599, 'last_played': 1596364454}
review:
I've always loved the series, since its first flash browser games.
Then the third came out, and it was amazing.
Then the fourth came out, and I didn't think it could be that much better.
And now, after years, the fifth came out.
And oh boy, it definitely did not disappoint.
I personally like JRPGs, but not all of them give me the feeling that a game like these does.
Each and every dialogue is fun and doesn't feel forced or repetitive, the mechanics are simple yet complex enough to be challenging when needed, and I just love the gameplay and characters.
If you ever read this review, Matt, thanks for all the great times you gave me and many other people.
Keep up the good work!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010042078', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2905, 'last_played': 1584271240}
review:
It`s a guilty pleasure. Can`t wait to v2 
What`s more underrated than this game is the dev himself.
No mysterious teasers, akward years of silence or promisses who went dry.  If he is making a Game you can expect a short update every couple days or so on his HP or some live signs otherwise.

Even when developmet struggles and he need some days away from the project. Its something relateble i miss in anymous big teams. 

The Game itself is great and  i got anything anticipated from it but everyone is a critic so here is mine.
I love the classical RPG turn based formula so many series dismiss these days but the game is 90% fightig and a little mixed up rules like a position fight where the chars got chess like position on the field to gain stance boni, alternate  settings like a defend a village or a vehicle from some hords, or some little sim element where you can use your treasure to improve your base, hideout would help agains this little repetitive feeling i got sometimes. And perhaps 1-2 Minigames  just for destraction.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111413915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 8033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4608, 'last_played': 1680554508}
review:
I've really enjoyed this series. I really enjoy turn-based combat but after so many years of rpgs it's rare to find new games that use this kind of combat in fun ways. I love the meta-humor and the in-jokes that have evolved over the course of these games. I'm sad that it seems like Matt wants to stop making them, but I get it, and EBF5 is certainly a worthy conclusion.

My only complaint is that I can never even get close to 100%ing these games because the post-game challenges are just SO hard. But I appreciate that stupid difficulty is some people's thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097833963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1717, 'last_played': 1544924483}
review:
Je ne me lasse toujours pas de cette série d'épic battle fantasy !

Le jeu est Fun, avec beaucoup d'humour, la DA version "dessin/mangas" continue de nous faire rêver.
Les personnages sont attachants, l'histoire elle ben euh je vous laisserai en juger xD

Points Fort : 

- Humour
- Plusieurs personnages jouable
- Une multitude de compétences
- les collectables
- Durée de vie

Point Faible : 

- Pas vraiment de rejouabilité 

Coup de coeur <3 : L'ost de ce jeu est une pure merveille

author: {'steamid': '76561198152995616', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3290, 'last_played': 1574945500}
review:
The price is a mite steep for so short a game, but it has a lot of charm.

+++++++fantastic music (seriously, I find myself changing zone just to get my favourite tracks)
+++good design overall
++good ergonomics
++nice storyline
++badges (steam and in-game) are challenging but not impossible to obtain
---zero replayability. Besides the badges and an increasingly powerful team there's not much more you can get from a second run. Still the developer promised changes with a future update, so don't take it for granted yet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198835398146', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 685, 'last_played': 1662717876}
review:
首先，这部作品加了中文，当然，还是要感谢大佬的努力
其次，剧情延续了前几部的特点，因为没通关，不便细说
战斗系统延续了前一部的特色，捉宠系统还是很有意思的
游戏细节分给满分，玩梗吐槽一如既往的欢乐

缺点也不是说没有，一是游戏内成就与steam成就有时不同步，二是手动存档有时失效，三是全屏开了有时不能还原到窗口化

整体上我给9.8/10，喜欢的可以全价入，等个打折也可以

review: I have followed this game series since it started up and i had always loved each new installment. EBF5 is no exception with and incredible amount of things to do and how you play is up to you making multiple playthroughs or switching up you play style mid save possible. The battling is quite possibly the most attractive turn based rpg i have played to watch, the animations and art is amazing along with the funny character interaction. I love this game to bits and i recommend it to anyone who loves an old style inspired turn based rpg.

author: {'steamid': '76561198205083443', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 5097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4744, 'last_played': 1630582675}
review: 개인적으론 이 게임엔 보스 몬스터 포획 빼곤 2회차 이후면 노가다가 문제 없는 듯하다. 캐릭터 레벨을 너무 올리면 초중반에 왔던 맵의 몹들이 약한 공격에도 한번에 골로 가버려서 포획이 어려위진 지는 거 같다. 근데 개인적일지 모르지만 이 게임을 하면서 포획한 몹들 한 번도 사용하지 않고(장비템으로 나오는 몹은 포획한 몹이라 할 수 없기 때문에 제외) 클리어한 게 포켓몬스터 7세대 작품하면서 Z크리스탈을 한 번도 사용하지 않은 거랑 비슷한 듯.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032130615', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 12232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5277, 'last_played': 1673738969}
review: Epic Battle Fantasy 5: a game similar to Final Fantasy both in gameplay and in series length.  You walk around the overworld looking for secrets, completing quests, and solving puzzles mainly by poking around where you're not supposed to be.  Battles are turn-based and mostly consist of equipping the elemental weapon strong against your foes while equipping armor resistant to whatever element they're throwing at you.  It's pretty straight forward, with some neat interactions between different status effects.  Most likely, you already know if this game is the game for you or not just from that description alone, but personally, I've enjoyed the heck out of this game and would say it is the best one in the series so far.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097013065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 8725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5671, 'last_played': 1625781854}
review:
Buen sistema de combate por turnos con bastante profundidad, el cambio de mana a un sistema de cooldowns lo hacen probablemente el mejor de la saga. La historio actúa como una especie de "soft reset" con lo que si no has jugado a los anteriores tampoco te pierdes mucho.

Por si fuera poco en un par de meses van a meter una actualización GRATIS añadiendo más modos de juego, retos y logros, prácticamente doblando el contenido que trae de base. En serio, si te molan los juegos de rol merece bastante la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059176600', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2859, 'last_played': 1585857678}
review:
Pour ceux qui ont jouer aux autre EBF :
le 5 est mieux que les autres go le prendre.

Pour les autres :
Si vous avez jouer aux final fantasy ou aux autres jeux de ce genre n'hesitez pas et prenez le.
Pour les nouveaux, ce jeu peut être très soft comme très dur selon la difficulté que vous choisissez ( AI basic en facile mais qui exploite les vulnérabilités éllémentaires de vos perso en epic ) il peut donc convenir à tous même aux plus petit ( fille de 8 ans a bien kiffer le jeu ) surtout avec les options "familly friendly" disponible.


Pour la trad FR, j'ai ballader sur le discord offi lors des traduction et à part ptete deux erreur que j'ai vu ( contresens et oublie de mot ) la trad garde bien la personnalité des perso et c'est plus que décent ( même ce qui est jeu de mots etc.. sont bien ammenés )

author: {'steamid': '76561198384481405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3788, 'last_played': 1623345263}
review: Really good turn based combat, satisfying both in mechanics and effects. The cooldown system is a vast improvement over MP in previous games, as then it was really easy to just spam the highest level spells, this allows for much more complexity in battle, but, really just feels better and more satisfying. Honestly I just consider it an all around improvement over 4, if you like turn based combat in the style of older RPGs but with better QoL, I would say to give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069772227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3952, 'last_played': 1579374170}
review:
A very fun RPG, I enjoy the dialouge between the heroes, commenting on practically everything, from new attacks to new encounters, it gives the characters a bit of extra life to them. 

Also, the turned based gameplay is nicely balaenced, making the game pretty easy to pick up but hard to master.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037649701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 909, 'last_played': 1644168357}
review: Started playing Epic Battle Fantasy/EBF since EBF2 on kongregate. Really fun and cute game, lots of puns, can be grind-y if you want or easy, without losing storyline or enjoyment, just set difficulty to 50% or 25%. No bugs, no getting-stuck, no where-tf-is-that-quest-place-omg because of helpful map. Developer is clearly experienced (since EBF1 yo), you don't need to play the earlier versions to enjoy the lore (although it helps). Like, just buy it, seriously. I would even if I don't play the game to support the dev.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359467079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12167, 'last_played': 1574788104}
review:
Ce jeux est juste merveilleux , on peut retrouver tout ce qu'on peut aimer dans un rpg : 
- De la difficulté et du challenge 
- des tonnes de secrets
- une aventure non linéaire 
Et j'en passe 
L'aventure peut se finir en une 40aines dheures de jeux , auquelles nous pouvons rajouter facilement le double  afin de finir le jeux a 100% ( toutes les médailles , tout les coffres , équipement  , secrets , monstres capturables , donjons optionels etc ) 
A la différence de ses prédécesseurs , il est impossible de débloquer de nouveaux succés en mode new game + . Ce qui nous oblige a terminer le jeux a 100% lors de notre premier essaie ou bien en recommençant une ou plusieurs partie suivant les joueurs. 
J'attends avec impatience la version 2.0 du jeux , qui devrait selon moi rendre ce jeux encore plus parfait qu'il ne l'est déjà.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117711292', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 6823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5611, 'last_played': 1709118434}
review:
说实话，当年在小游戏网上玩的1，2代几乎是我童年接触的最早的RPG了（虽然只有战斗流程，全程打猫）。
后续3，4代也是小游戏网玩的，5代整好补个票。
为数不多能让我主动最高难度挑战的游戏，想当初5代刚发售不久和瓦尔哈拉坦克熬夜6小时恶斗。
听着激昂的bgm，跟形形色色Boss进行着史诗级的战斗，角色们大吐苦水，互相吐槽的快乐，各种梗玩得飞起才是这游戏的特色。
无需深度解读却让人难以忘怀的剧情与人物形象，连各类RPG大厂都学不来的沉浸感，依旧让我流连忘返。
所以......
什么时候把更新更完，然后6代给我整一个啊！！！（自埋）

author: {'steamid': '76561198850692528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1160, 'last_played': 1574137169}
review:
不知是因为jprg评分普遍高还是情怀的原因，这作的评分高的让人看不懂. 看了眼隔壁一个挺老的jrpg CHRONO TRIGGER那个被人誉为史上第一JRPG的游戏也不过78的好评.于是我就趁打折的时候试了下这游戏，但很可惜epic battle fantasy并没有让我打通关的动力
[h1][b]Epic?[/b][/h1]
这游戏的故事有那么种强行为了恶搞而恶搞但一点都不有趣的感觉.男主马特一个在家玩游戏的死宅不知出于何种目的就决定出去冒险，又刚好遇上了明明是猫神的但就是要捡马特家门口垃圾吃的没腿，不知道为什么得还是打了一架。旅途接着继续，之后在市场上捡垃圾的时候碰到了个把家钥匙放在箱子里碰瓷的奇葩娜塔莎，随后又不恤人言地打了一架。接着三人不知出于什么目的继续游荡，在见面就很没有常识地被纳粹头子兰斯的坦克车压过之后全员屁事儿都没有但队里的奇葩（都是奇葩但这里特指娜塔莎）因为美貌便被掳走了。接着，在去拯救娜塔莎的路上又碰到了个听不懂人说话的玩意儿安娜，众人就理所应当地又打了一架，打完之后安娜就更理所应当地加入了队伍。在法西斯分子没怎么反抗的情况下很轻易地解决了兰斯和他的坦克车，在成功解救娜塔莎之后，法西斯头子兰斯也顺理成章地洗白了，什么人肉炸弹，核武器，种族歧视，动物武器化，抓女人当后宫，放火烧别人的家等等等等都是为了Greater Good，那就是拯救世界。真的是小黄再世也不敢这么直白地洗纳粹,写这部分的编剧真是有纳粹宣传部长的英姿，之后纳粹头子兰斯也相当顺理成章地加入了队伍一起拯救世界。后面打到波塞冬就没有打下去了所以之后的剧情我也就不得而知了
[h1][b]Fantasy?[/b][/h1]
可能是因为我的幽默感太过低俗了吧，整个游戏的笑话我硬是没觉得有那么一处有趣的地方。常言说：”幽默源于智慧，粗鄙源于邪恶“，我这种整天阴阳怪气不好好说话的恶人怎会理解像“我的卵巢刚才爆炸了”这种明智而又诙谐的对白，是吧？这游戏用了大量的梗，而大量我指的是处处都是梗，那种恨不得每个怪物每个招式都有梗非常用力的样子。依我鄙见，玩梗不是不行，但一部优秀的作品不能光玩梗，它还要创作属于自己的，有趣的梗，不然一个游戏就像用完就扔的厕纸一样玩完就被人遗忘。我并不是说一个游戏一定要有梗才能被人们记住，依靠过硬的游戏质量也是可以达到这样的效果的，但很可惜，这部游戏并不具备这个特征
[h1][b]Battle?[/b][/h1]
为了更好地体验这个备受称赞的jrpg的战斗系统是多么的出色，于是我就开始了史诗难度的游戏。前期战斗还算挺有趣的吧，虽然大部分战斗还是宝箱前面带怪这种烂俗的遭遇方式，但宝箱里的奖励还算新奇，而且战斗种多样的属性以及异常状态，再用属性或者状态攻击亦或是战前换装来对症下药，还是有那么点策略的成就感的。但从中期开始，整个游戏就像变了个样，玩过一段时间之后突然觉悟宝箱里的东西全是商店里可以买的废料，偶尔有那么几个新奇的装备还是那种“武器就带个属性攻击和属性攻击加强，防具带个属性攻击加强还有抗性，然后再看情况要不要加个触发率极低而且触发了什么用都没有的技能”让我来设计能搞出百来个都不重样的无趣装备。战斗中所有的怪都带一堆的抗性，是个怪都能秒人，有的精英怪不仅不吃异常状态还能群秒（特指维京石碑），这时候战斗方式就变得相当固定了，一个人来防守配合装备的标靶和复活来吸引火力，剩下两人输出，有人倒了就咖啡复活，这样无趣的战斗要不断地重复无数次。
[h1][b]Five[/b][/h1]
本作的主角人数刚好是五人（从目前的游戏过程和商店封面来看），但这五人的性格都异常平淡直白，可怜的对白质量以及数量都支撑不起形象生动的角色。先是唯一指定肉盾马特，刚好和这游戏的开放商以及发行商同名，应该是某个人把自己做成了人物吧。马特：是个宅男，性格急躁静不下心，很喜欢吃东西和摇滚。没腿：猫神兼捡垃圾的，本游戏唯一笑点来源。娜塔莎：性格N/a。安娜：同娜塔莎。兰斯：中二病（这五个人都有点但这个最严重），幻想自己有后宫的纳粹头子。五个主角都是这个破样子那配角自然是提都不提的，给的支线任务就是几句话打发走玩家，然后收集了东西再给奖励这种滥竽充数单纯凑数量的任务

[b]依我愚见，该游戏完全可以改成像Extremely boring fantasy这种更符合游戏内容的名字，求求你们这么多打好评把我骗来的告诉我这个画面像是上世纪老古董的游戏除了音乐和解谜还有什么可取之处？[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198129546327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14017, 'last_played': 1655650845}
review: Been playing EBF since I was a child, this is by far the most satisfying and complete RPG experience I've ever played, the character, charisma and self-awareness of the game just makes it too fun to put down:  The story respects its predecessors while going in a new direction that's both logical and full of laughs, not to mention the improvements to content and gameplay that feels overwhelming to take in.  Put in 233+ hours, will do it again for EBF5 Ver 2.0.  Buy this game now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079343250', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 8982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4310, 'last_played': 1691538392}
review:
Not to kinkshame anyone but I really don't get Mat's fetish for colored tile puzzles.

That aside, this is easily the best in the series. I've been following the EBF games since shortly after the release of 2, playing each game as it came out, and as I developed higher standards for RPGs the games continued to exceed them. When I was just looking through pre release stuff, in particular the battle system demo, I was skeptical about the change from standard MP to cooldowns for abilities, but I feel like it makes everything flow a lot better, and avoids the issue of Lance being very mana intensive and burning out quickly.

Even without the series pedigree this is an amazing and very silly game, taking itself just seriously enough to tell a somewhat compelling story, even if that story isn't anything too out of the ordinary for a JRPG. Just a ragtag band of missfits (and a 'reformed' villain) attempting to save the world because the power went out in the first party member's house, forcing him to go outside.

Overall, a high recommendation from me for fans of fun, silly adventures who are looking for something new to sink their teeth into. Oh, and don't worry if you haven't played the previous games, this game is a soft reboot so you don't need to know the stories of the other games to enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393844606', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 9487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6045, 'last_played': 1640518168}
review:
Un rpg sencillo y entretenido, poniendo mucho enfasis en las resistencias y los estados, pues cada pequeño extra en el juego puede salvarte la vida( o arruinartela).

El juego empieza muy lento, consigues un poco de equipamiento, habilidades, subes de nivel, aumentas algunos parametros, y te haces la idea de como va el juego. Una vez consigues a todos los personajes, el juego abre muchas posibilidades de combate.

Puedes combinar habilidades de agua con hielo y trueno para aumentar el daño, o aplicar estados que ademas de aumentar el daño recibido les aplicas reducciones de atributos, ofensivas o defensivas al mismo tiempo.

Tambien puedes jugar a la defensiva, muy util si te atreves con la dificultad epica, el juego no es super dificil en este modo, pero si puede dar la vuelta a la situacion en algunos momentos, jugar con mucho hp y varias resistencias puede salvarte en muchas ocasiones.

No se si este es el ultimo juego de la saga, espero que no, pero lo que si se es que si quieres un juego rpg simple y divertido, este juego no te fallara.

review: I've been waiting for this game for a while. The music is really good, the Characters have their own personality and You don't need to play the other games to understand this one. This is like if Final Fantasy had a pokemon Mechanic and all and every enemy was able to be scanned and had a weakness. You need to level up your gear and you have the oportunity to escape battle, reassess your strategy and Try again! It's very beginer friendly and If you're into hardcore turn based RPG you could set limits like "One shotting enemies" or other stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198390726325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 5891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1784, 'last_played': 1575989235}
review:
这是一款轻松愉快 欢乐中又带综合质量和游戏体验优秀的RPG游戏 想休息一下的话 就来玩这个游戏吧
不管在那都可以存档的舒服+各种有意思的梗+前作的梗+穿插的解密（其实这个很正常）
画风给你的感觉就是卡通画风 它不是很好的画风 但是是最舒服的画风
以上 我个人觉得是很好玩的 神作
(题外话：
1：每个装备都有画上头像 特别是女主的必杀 基本每个衣服都画了一幅立绘~呵呵  
2：全程史诗难度通关更有感觉 配合怪物的能力切换武器和衣服）
游戏介绍完了 来说说这个游戏的注意点吧
1：所有抓不到的怪物都会在血条上方标有红色方块，其余的最好初见就抓到，不小心打死了就逃跑或读档，因为你不知道它们能不能刷新
2：抓住的怪物不能累加，因此无论你抓了多少次，消耗怪物强化武器或交任务都会直接导致失去该怪物
3：Matt偷东西的技能可以有效地调整怪的血量方便捕捉（红色箱子图标的不能抓
4：绿色毛毛虫和没腿猫巫毒是抓怪神宠（给你上个-速BUFF）
5:将没(美）腿猫的属性连斩技能用在血最少的敌人身上，如果所有敌人都能被一击秒杀 那就可以达到5连杀
6：除了史诗难度击杀BOSS有成就外，高难度游戏没什么收益（但是可以玩的更有感觉）
7：四次收队友战都能劝降且有成就，没腿猫需要在开局用水史莱姆摸他一下，娜塔莉需要我方全体有可爱buff，安娜需要打残并堆debuff，兰斯需要砸掉坦克再放个第七天堂
8：遇到冰石碑一定要抓 技能：能让我方全体多行动一次，除去召唤消耗就是多行动两次，而且可以累加
9：应该不算要点？独眼巨人约顿的自称是第三人称
10：换队友不耗回合 养成勤换队友释放适当技能的习惯
11：刚开始出去的时候 骚扰一个鸭子 可以得到一个东西
12：欢迎去用用恐吓技能233

author: {'steamid': '76561198814679688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1937, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1902, 'last_played': 1607201465}
review:
Nie lubię jRPG, ale ta gra jest tak dobrze zrobiona i ma tyle contentu, że daję jej okejkę i polecam :D

-Możesz zdać grę na pałę nie oglądając się za skarbami i spokojnie dasz radę
-A jak będziesz mieć problemy to w każdej chwili możesz zmniejszyć poziom trudności
-Zwiększyć też możesz w każdej chwili
-Możesz grindować statystyki postaci ile dusza zapragnie
-A jak nie wiesz do końca jak to poradniki są w internecie
-I Autor gry doskonale zdaje sobie sprawę że poradniki do gry są w internecie i co jakiś czas daje o tym znać :D
-Pełno opcjonalnych instancji za które dostajemy nagrody
-Galeria
-Jako że nie lubię jRPG to na pewno więcej niż połowa gagów jest dla mnie niezrozumiała, ale jak lubisz jRPG to na pewno znajdziesz pełno nawiązań
-Autor ciągle rozwija grę

author: {'steamid': '76561198877575379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 600, 'last_played': 1699905597}
review:
Es muy buen juego, realmente uno de mis rpg favoritos, un juego que tiene un gran contenido, tiene jefes que sin duda pondrán a prueba tus habilidades, calabozos opcionales que traen consigo muy buenas recompensas
una historia muy buena y entretenida, sobre todo si has jugado los demás juegos, es muy recomendable, me gustó la temática de capturar enemigos, incluyendo jefes y usarlos como invocación, realmente un juego que vale la pena tener.
PD: La música del juego también es muy buena, me parece que Phyrnna hace un buen trabajo respecto a eso

author: {'steamid': '76561198100769355', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1675, 'last_played': 1641543030}
review:
Genuinely one of the best RPGs I've played in a long fucking time. The only complaint I could really formulate after beating it is that if you want to get every treasure you even see (let alone a lot of the ones you don't), it can get a bit grindy, at times; however, the game is exceptional at scaling to what the player wants to do. For example, the final boss actually gets harder depending on how many medals you get and how many of the optional bosses you kill, so if you don't care about checking under every rock and so on, the final boss will be far more manageable than if you actually do.

The game has so many features I'd kill for in other games, too. For one, I honestly feel this is one of very few games (outside of, say, Pokemon) that really give you the ability to actually exploit elemental weaknesses in enemies due to the game's design. For two, I really love how abilities are balanced by cooldowns and not mana, so it doesn't turn into quite that bad of a resource management problem as having a straight MP system. I love how your characters heal just by standing around between battles. I love the extremely large number of weird status and weather effects!

Can't recommend it enough. It was a great time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971562414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1598757273}
review: At first I wasn't interested in this game because of the bright, cartoony graphics, but actually it is an amusing and well designed RPG with plenty of humor.  Don't let the appearance fool you.  There are a ton of fun combat animations and special attacks and monster varieties.  The characters have an incredible variety of dialogue related to the abilities they use including their opinions on their allies moves, etc.  There is a lot of thoughtful design here wrapped in the overly bright packaging so it is worth giving a try.

review: This game was a great addition to the series, I spent years waiting for it. I like the added strategy with the cooldowns instead of MP, so the big moves couldn't be repeated if you just had enough MP to use for the battle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198275484318', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 18035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6795, 'last_played': 1691429196}
review:
EBF 5 ist wie seine 2 Vorgänger ein Spaß machendes Rpg Game. 

Das neue Cooldown System statt Mana war zwar ein wenig komisch am Anfang, wenn man die Anderen teile lange gespielt hat, doch es war trotzdem ein gutes System. Unter anderem hat dieses System aus gemacht das man nicht jede Runde mit Natt Heilung spammen konnte und viele Flächenschaden wie Bomben die in allen 3 Spielen immer hohen Schaden machten. 

Das neu "Pokemon" System war großartig! Nicht nur das das Spiel ein wenig realistischer wurde das Gegner auch aus Angst fliehen, sondern sie waren auch gut im Kampf zu gebrauchen.

Die neuen Status Effekte, die man wiederum durch die Pets auslösen kann, sind sehr gut um aus Situationen raus zu kommen, Combos auf zu bauen oder sie zu verstärken.

Die Erneuerung das in vielen Gebieten es Wetter Effekte gibt kann auch öfters den Kampf umdrehen wenn der Gegner sich durch den Regen komplett heilt. 

Im großen und ganzen hat es mir viel Spaß gemacht und ich würde mich immer auf den nächsten Teil freuen oder eine ähnliche Story mit anderen Charaktern :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198329023834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 24667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1667906515}
review:
Enfin !! Enfin la suite !! Découverte il y a quelques jours en démo. sur Kongregate... ensuite j'ai trouvé la version gratuite sur le site du créateur... et finalement j'ai craqué pour la version complète ! que d'énigmes (que je ne réussis souvent pas, étant comme Matt, un peu brutasse. :P), et de combats, d'équipements, Monstres, etc. Les nouveautés rajoutent encore plus de plaisir (capture de Monstres, nouvelles façon d'utiliser les Compétences, rajout de Pad'pat dans l'équipe, etc.).
Un jeu complet, à explorer avec diverses difficultés, pendant... des jours ! :D

I would recommend this game to all my friends so they can see how great this game can be.

I played the earlier games as a kid on cites like Kongregate and Armorgames, and while they were good, this is a brilliant capstone to an excellent game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353987465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2516, 'last_played': 1684180976}
review: EBF5 é um jogo muito divertido, tem uma animação boa e diálogos com um senso de humor bom, eu sou um grande fan de EBF e agradeço ao Matt Roszak por trazer jogos tão excelentes. Eu recomendo muito esse jogo e também recomendo os outros EBF (2, 3 e 4), infelizmente tem alguns momentos do jogo que vai deixar você bem entediado como as lutas que se tornam repetitivas em um certo momento, porém as lutas concede muito uma nostalgia, pois o estilo dele lembra jogos de estrategia antigos como Final Fantasy, Pokemon e Earthbound onde a luta ocorre entre turnos e isso é algo que os jogos de hoje em dia não possuem muito, vale a pena gastar o seu dinheiro nesse jogo se você for uma pessoa paciente, pois as lutas ocupam bastante o tempo, estou ansioso para o próximo jogo do Matt, as vezes eu me pergunto "será que vai ter o EBF6?"

review: This franchise has been a favorite of mine to play growing up with flash, so I knew immediately when the fifth game was announced that I would be the first in line to buy it! Since release, the creator has added lots of new content and replayability into the mix, and they've also been hard at work to port the game and the rest of the franchise to various platforms. The franchise has paved the road to an incredible experience down to the minute detail being polished and improved upon with every new installment. I can't think of anything more deserving of a labor of love award than that really.

review:
Been following Matts work for years and this is his best game yet, which says a lot because the last few ones have been amazing as well. It's got enemy variety, replay value, a bunch of secrets, a great artsyle, and copious amounts of swords. There's really no reason not to pick it up, espiecially at such a low price point.

It good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123291385', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 5759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4462, 'last_played': 1696426808}
review:
prefacing this with the knowledge that i played the everloving SHIT out of the previous two installments, and this entire series resonates with me in a way that only nostalgia can.
anyway!
EBF5 is a fun, goofy, slightly crude parody of classic RPGs with so much charm that it nearly killed me on impact. somehow i'm emotionally attached to these characters, even though half of them are dirtbags. combat is surprisingly in depth, as is the story. took me about ~20-30 hours to beat, and the rest of my playtime is just trying to get every achievement that my grubby little hands can take hold of.
also, one of your party members is a cat, so obviously it's game of the year.

author: {'steamid': '76561198396981630', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1577615524}
review: 超 好 玩！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198048994755', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1591425743}
review:
I only got the game today, but I'm already loving every bit of it. It has a lot of the same art and style, but it's evident that Matt's only getting better and better.
 The system design is stellar, and improves on ideas already established in previous games. Without spoiling too much, the implementation of optional skills is great, and I was wowed with the updates to the skill leveling. I have mixed feelings about the update to the stat boost items, it's simplicity being what i both love and hate about it. Monster Catching annoys me a lot, not because it's bad, but because I'm a compulsive collector, and this is an easy time sink for me, on top of the fact i'm going to 100% the game already, and I appreciate you putting more content in for crazy completionists like me out there.
 The art doesn't look professional in the slightest, but is still full of the same old charm I fell in love with from his previous projects, and the animations have a lot more personality now too. I'm also a fan of the icon updates too. I also love the new weapon designs so far, they're cool as heck.
 (EDIT): I just finished the game and the story was okay. It still possesses the same quirkiness as previous projects but the real attraction was the character writing moreso than the story, and I felt a little let down at the fourth wall breakage being a central plot point(funny considering my chosen username is Just Monika). Otherwise I feel the writing needs a bit more work. I realize it's a bit much to ask for someone to make decent comedy and build serious moments masterfully in their writing, but I don't remember much about the story and what I do remember about the story leaves a lot more questions or rather roughly takes me out of it. Personally I think next time you should look at a longer form story, with NPC involvement in the main quest, and if you're gonna continue having the fourth wall play a major part in the story, maybe look towards building the character's relationships with the player more. I feel those are the fixes for the biggest problems i personally had with the story, and honestly, despite it maybe seeming like i'm a little down on it, I still think the main characters and their writing are still great and are integral to the charm of the game, it wouldn't be nearly as good without them. (EDIT/)
 All in all this game is worth the buy. I got it as an early birthday gift from a friend, but even if he didn't I would've gotten it for myself. If you read this Matt, you're on a roll. Keep up the good work!

review:
What can I say? It`s EBF so fricking unique. You really don`t find any turn based games like this anymore.
If you like turn based combat and don`t mind anime-ish/cartoonish art it`s a must buy.
 
(Tip, use the 1.5 beta for now as I had a lot of difficulty beating the endgame bosses on easy difficulty. The 1.5 beta stops buffing enemies after you`ve reached level 36 I was fighting the last boss at level 50-something and it`s HARD)

author: {'steamid': '76561198216749463', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 3542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2204, 'last_played': 1701465550}

author: {'steamid': '76561198241036348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3858, 'last_played': 1694399364}
review:
必须给好评
1 主线：主线的剧情里线索清晰，就算是没有玩过前作的人也可以了解（当然你玩过的话可以GET更多的梗）。时不时的出现的对话里也有很多能让人会心一笑的梗。主线时长适当，不会让你玩太久审美疲劳，也不会因为流程太短不尽兴。
2 难度：默认的难度下，可以说所有的战斗都是难度适中，不会让玩家卡关。最高难度下打BOSS的奖章适合RPG发烧友挑战，这里提一点，如果是二周目想达成最高难度刷BOSS的成就，可以在打BOSS之前把难度调到最低，方便速刷小怪。
3 画面：非常卡通的风格，也是这个系列的传统。战斗时候主角们的小动作，怪物的受伤动画都很有意思。对于一款用flash做的游戏来说，几乎是最高水平了。
4 支线：这游戏的支线有蛮多条的，除了四个很明显的副本之外，还有一些藏得很深的小支线（有些甚至有点吓人，但是没关系，没有直接的恐怖画面），如果你有对找隐藏彩蛋感兴趣，这游戏很适合你。
总而言之 这款游戏很适合对传统RPG感兴趣的玩家，或者是用于直播。

author: {'steamid': '76561198128926965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1693585043}
review:
To be put simply: EBF5 is wonderful game that is aware of the good and bad JRPG tropes. It's a game that's greatly improved from it's predecessors in every way. EBF5 is a game that makes me question how single developers can some times be so much thoughtful in their approach to making games, which in turn end up being more entertaining than some triple A games.

Matt, if you see this, i hope you realise that you deserve all the praise you've received thus far for your series because the great amount of effort and passion you put in shows!

author: {'steamid': '76561198020912008', 'num_games_owned': 761, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2831, 'last_played': 1641424171}
review:
One of the best Indie RPGs out there, for what started out as a Free Flash game turned into a series that is loved by lots of people.
I put so many hours into this franchise, both in and out of Steam.
This game is the epitome of Epic Battle Fantasy, everything here feels perfected and well thought out.
Filled with easter eggs, references to other games and pop culture, this game will surely make you laugh or at least chuckle.

As of the writing of this review the Game Creator, Matt Roszak, has announced a "Version 2.0" update that will bring even more content to the game.
So if you are reading this after that is released enjoy the extra content!

author: {'steamid': '76561198106191107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 6858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2412, 'last_played': 1678780137}
review:
ต้องเล่น! จบนะ
Gameplay : 10/10 วางแผนผลัดกันโจมตี ใช้สกิล สนุกมากกกกกก ภาคนี้ระบบเกมดีขึ้นมากๆๆๆ เอาข้อดีข้อเสียภาคก่อนๆมาปรับจนสมบูรณ์
Story : 10/10 จริงๆถ้ามุมมองคนทั่วไปอาจเฉยๆ แต่ด้วยความที่ผมชอบแนวแฟนตาซี มันเหมือนเราดู Anime ซีรีย์นึงเต็มๆ
Performance : 5/10 ทำไมมันกระตุกโคตรๆเลยก็ไม่รู้5555 พอปรับ low ภาพก็ pixel ดูแตกๆเลย เลยทนเล่น Medium มีกระตุกเล็กน้อย
Soundtrack : 10000/10000 ผมให้เป็นเกมเพลงประกอบยอดเยี่ยมอันดับ 1 ในใจตลอดกาล ชอบเพลง Return of the snow queen ที่สุด
Price : 10/10 คุ้มค่ามาก ไม่แพงเลย เทียบกับความสนุกที่ได้ ซื้อมาเล่นเลยยย(เล่นภาค 3 แล้ว 4 ก่อนก็ได้นะ)

author: {'steamid': '76561198401174690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3367, 'last_played': 1697924330}
review:
After growing up with this series starting from EBF 2, I just felt like I had to guy this game. It brought back so much memories with its dumb jokes, and its regular quirky cast, but do not think the RPG aspect of it is not as comparable as it's jokes. While some jokes do not always hit certain people, the many different spells, limit breaks and with the added addition of being able to capture enemies makes its battles refreshing even on the 5 installment. It has a great difficulty curve, although some bosses can be unfair at times, the challenge is never unbeatable and leaves you feeling accomplished after finding the one secret boss and taking another 2 hours to beat it on the hardest difficulty. One day I will grow older, and may find stray away from this amazing game because I will have been too caught in my own life. Yet I will always remember this series for engaging my younger years. Thank you for making this game, truly.

Also new free update, is coming. I cannot wait to replay the game again, and waste another 50 hours!

author: {'steamid': '76561198865230207', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 3759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1705452062}
review:
[h1]轻松有趣的搞笑冒险书——评《Epic Battle Fantasy 5》[/h1]
在RPG荒的时候时朋友推荐起这款游戏，又早就听闻了EBF系列在欧美的名声，于是尝试了一下此款游戏，随手小评
总的来说，这款游戏给我的体验就是：[b]一款轻松愉快、欢乐风趣，同时综合质量和游戏体验优秀的RPG游戏[/b]，如果你暂时对大型游戏感到疲劳，又想尝试一下风格幽默风趣的轻松休闲型RPG，这款游戏是你的不二选择
[h1]剧情/文本[/h1]
《EBF5》不同于前几部，剧情与前几部的关联性不大，可以算是故事重新开始，所以无须担心前几部没玩会不会影响剧情。事实上，EBF系列作为RPG游戏剧情性却非常低，整部游戏的剧情可以说几乎没有存在感，寥寥数句就可总结。作为RPG忠实玩家，我认为剧情也是RPG体验重要组成部分，所以主线、支线剧情过于直白算是本游戏的小小遗憾。
但令人意外的是，剧情如此之少，本游戏的文本量却完全不少，在探险和战斗过程中充斥着主角团对各种场景、敌人、技能、状态的吐槽，其中玩了不少捏他和梗，尤其是战斗中每一种行动/技能/敌人/状态/道具使用/效果五位主角都有自己不同的吐槽方式，这点让战斗变得十分欢乐，看着每个人自己的小算盘、有意思的吐槽、对战场形势指指点点的确是本游戏非常有特色的亮点。
[h1]画面/美术[/h1]
由于本游戏是flash制作，画面自然也达不到多少高度。但是作品风趣幽默的画风和美术风格却也是一大亮点，主角们不同装备下的不同造型、各种行动的动作、必杀技时的各种捏他，以及本作170多种敌人不同的技能动作、攻击手段设计的非常有特色的，让整款游戏能一直在风趣幽默的氛围下进行[spoiler]除了某个故意吓人的技能[/spoiler]，同时场景地图迷宫的绘制也非常卡通化，非常有特色。
[h1]机制/数值/节奏[/h1]
作为尤其喜爱RPG的玩家，我可以说这款游戏是我近年来见过最有意思的“回合制RPG游戏”。谈到战斗机制，回合制RPG游戏是老玩家的美好回忆，但是现在大多RPG游戏已经放弃了回合制这种不容易有趣的模式。而近年来的回合制RPG的战斗机制我都不是很满意（这里点名DQ11、P5、400旅人、超次元游戏、萌豚工作室等游戏，我不是说这些游戏不好，而是它们的战斗机制过于简单，策略性和趣味性都不高），而《EBF5》的战斗机制却给我带来不少惊喜，取消MP槽和更换人物回合数惩罚，同时有些怪物可以攻击到后备队员的设定让我第一次感到了这游戏是5人在战斗而不是3人战斗2人后备看戏，同时多种多样的属性和状态以及场景天气的变化让本来简单单调的回合制也变得不那么无聊，再佐以大量吐槽，让其他游戏里最无聊的刷刷刷战斗变成这个游戏最有意思的地方。
难度数值方面，从最简单难度到最困难难度我都进行了尝试，可以说本游戏的数值曲线和平衡做得较好，最简单难度随便凹技能和最高难度需要有逻辑性的规划非常符合不同玩家层次，同时难度提升后AI也变得更“聪明”，会联手攻击、互相辅助、捡软柿子捏，这点设计也很不错。而且本作的装备各有各的用处，有的时候战斗中更换装备也是一种游戏策略，并不像传统游戏需要不断更换新的装备这点也很不错。不过数值也不是完全没问题，道具补给量太多，即使是最高难度下打到最后补给仍然远远富余，而且虽然游戏等级数值非常平滑但后期数据不够精细，伤害和回复比例规划不够合理。最大的问题恐怕是在没有MP的限制下，每个技能（算上冷却）的价值不够平衡（不过说实话这要平衡真的很难，游戏数据已经设计的很不错了）。
游戏的节奏总体很好，怪物大多都是挡宝箱的，如果没有全收集强迫症的话其实游戏节奏体验很好，副本的动态等级也少了传统RPG“刷怪打副本”的反复麻烦（但是游戏副本总体难度比主线大不少，而打完回报有点少这也是个小问题），一路通关没有问题。而对于愿意肝的玩家，游戏的宠物捕捉/多种多样的装备/支线任务/隐藏图/成就以及最后的BOSS RUSH的确给了玩家玩更多时间的理由（而且本人全收集后感觉也没有那么肝啦……就是到游戏后期会稍微有点疲惫）
同时本作各种游戏的机关谜题也为游戏增添了不少益智性，绝大多数谜题都是简单想想或仔细思考就能解决的（至少我解完所有谜题没看过攻略），解谜的过程也非常有成就感。
[h1]音乐[/h1]
[spoiler]吹爆我Phyrrna女神好吧[/spoiler]本作音乐大体是继承了前作的曲调，但即使这样我觉得音乐风格“非常RPG”，基本上所有的场景曲和战斗曲都非常好听，配合上主角们的风趣动作与诙谐吐槽，真可谓轻松休闲之极。
总体而言，这款游戏我是非常推荐朋友们一玩的，作为独立游戏人的Matt从自己做着玩到作品大有名气、特别在欧美圈广受好评的经历的确也给我们游戏人一些启示，也许你做的游戏画面引擎不及那些大厂游戏，但只要开创自己的风格，用心做好游戏一样会获得成功

author: {'steamid': '76561198129092757', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 18394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17009, 'last_played': 1709440623}
review: Something about this game always gets me to come back. I've fully completed this 40h adventure like 6 times at this point + some other runs, and the combat never gets old for me. Lots of potential for builds, combos and much, much more. Playing on the hardest difficulty is always a treat for me since I get to theorycraft a lot when making builds. All the extra content is tough (as it should be), tons of gimmick bosses too to spice up the adventure. The metroidvania-like exploring when it comes to getting new key items and such along the way brings a lot of reason to go back to older areas to both get new loot and find more exciting encounters. Not to mention the great OST, tons and TONS of references to pretty much everything ever, and just a fun story to follow, it just becomes one of the best games I think I've played, even if it's very corny for what it is. Pretty sure the dev has a free version to play somewhere on the internet, he really wants anyone to play the game itself even if he gets less profit from it, they lack the extra content though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082875938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 3776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2696, 'last_played': 1570371896}
review:
Davvero un gran bel gioco, con dei personaggi divertenti ed una trama gradevole, una giusta alternanza tra combattimenti, esplorazione (con misteri di vario tipo), tattica, evoluzione dei personaggi e del loro equipaggiamento e tanto altro.
Molto lungo ed articolato, ho impiegato più di 40 ore per finirlo in modalità normale e con diversi intermezzi divertenti sia dentro che fuori i combattimenti, ma rimangono ancora tante cose da fare e puzzle da risolvere.
Carina, in combattimento, la possibilità di far entrare "dalla panchina" i giocatori al posto di quelli impegnati in prima linea, il tutto con un'azione gratuita e la possibilità di catturare gli avversari (boss compresi) e di utilizzarli nelle successive battaglie.
Se vi piacciono i combattimenti a turni ed un po di simpatia questo gioco fa per voi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268635703', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 9994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4074, 'last_played': 1604593873}
review:
Als jemand der die komplette Epic Battle Fantasy Reihe gespielt hat, [Gut beim 1. Teil habe ich den Endboss nicht besiegt, aber das Spiel war nicht gut gebalanced und so, also lasst mich:( ] kann ich nur sagen; Die Spiele sind so liebevoll gemacht worden und machen echt viel Spaß. Jeder Teil ab dem es eine offene Welt gab, ist einfach nur traumhaft von der Musik, der Gestaltung der Welt und der Charaktere, den Dialogen, den Erkundungsmöglichkeiten und dem generellen Gameplay.

Im 5. Teil der Reihe wird zu dem bekannten Features, noch so vieles hinzugefügt. Man kann Gegner verschonen und fangen, auf der Karte Markierungen setzen, da die Welt recht groß und reich bestückt ist, neue Statuseffekte hinzufügen wie zum Beispiel; Lieblich, Schwer, Glück oder Pech. Es wurde komplett auf Mana verzichtet und stattdessen wird mit Cooldowns gearbeitet, was ziemlich gut gelungen ist und längere Kämpfe so dann nicht zu nervig macht. Und wer übertriebene Gewalt, Obszönität oder ''Fan-Service'' nicht mag, kann diese sogar ausschalten. So sollte sich keiner mehr beschweren können.

Ich hatte echt viel Vergnügen mit diesem Spiel und ich habe noch nicht alles erreicht. Die Musikstücke passen wunderbar zu den Begebenheiten, einige Animationen wurden nochmal aufgehübscht, die Bosskämpfe sind fordernd aber nicht unfair, (sofern du nicht auf ''Einfach'' spielst) die Welt ist voller Schätze und Geheimnissen, Bonusinhalte gibt es in Hülle und Fülle und dieser Teil hat, finde ich, die beste Story der Reihe.

Ein äußerst gelungenes RPG welches ich nur zu gerne Empfehlen kann.

PS: Schert euch nicht um die Morsecodes, ich saß wie blöd an ihnen, das sind nur Memes.
PPS: Lasst eure Dateien nicht korrumpieren. ;D

author: {'steamid': '76561198835865453', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1383, 'last_played': 1675577824}

author: {'steamid': '76561198052125808', 'num_games_owned': 1125, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 1586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1581, 'last_played': 1583269205}
review:
Dieses Review wird zwar in keinster Weise objektiv sein, denn ich verfolge Epic Battle Fantasy schon seit es das erste Mal auf Newgrounds aufgeploppt ist, aber ich werde mir trotzdem Mühe geben. Ich habe jeden Teil der Serie gespielt - Bullet Heaven 1+2 und Adventure Story einbezogen, denn ich mag den Stil der Spiele und die Figuren sind mir ziemlich ans Herz gewachsen. 

Matt Roszak gehört zu den Wenigen, die es schaffen, eine ernste Geschichte zu erzählen und die in einen Kokon aus Klamauk einzuspinnen, sodass sie fast komplett darin untergeht. Das ist in meinen Augen überhaupt nichts Schlechtes! Die Charaktere von EBF sind sich mal mehr und mal weniger darüber im Klaren, dass sie Videospielfiguren sind und nutzen das voll aus. In der ganzen Welt sind sie bekannt als die Typen, die einfach in dein Haus kommen und sich das Zeug mitnehmen, was sie brauchen. Im Vordergrund stehen auch nicht die Weltuntergangsszenarios, die meistens vor sich hinplätschern, sondern die fünf Hauptfiguren und ihre Interaktionen untereinander. Ich glaube, das macht mir das Spiel so sympathisch, denn die Dialoge sind nicht nur gut geschrieben, sondern auch hervorragend übersetzt.

Dieses Mal ist alles ein klein wenig anders, denn aus Gründen, die ich hier nicht verraten möchte, wurde alles in den Status Quo zurückversetzt. Matt lernt NoLegs und Natalie aufs Neue kennen, Lance ist plötzlich wieder ein Anführer mit einer eher rechten Gesinnung und Anna möchte auch wieder von zuhause abgeholt werden. Nachdem die Party wieder zusammengeführt wurde, beginnt EBF-typisch die Quest zur Rettung der Welt. Genaueres zum Plot sage ich nicht und möchte nur anfügen, dass am Ende alles Sinn gemacht hat.

Gameplaytechnisch hat sich eine ganze Ecke was getan, denn EBF verzichtet völlig auf das aus den Vorgängern bekannte MP-System und setzt auf eine Cooldownmechanik. Das heißt, dass Skills nach jeder Nutzung einige Runden lang nicht eingesetzt werden können. Diesen Cooldown kann man im Kampf mit Verbrauchsgegenständen verkürzen oder durch den Besuch einer Schleimkatze zurücksetzen. Das bringt ein wenig frischen Wind in das schon angestaubte Kampfsystem, das, ganz wie die Vorgänger, sehr zahlenlastig ist. Sind die Schadensnummern am Anfang noch im nachvollziehbaren Bereich, schnellen diese innerhalb weniger Spielstunden enorm in die Höhe. Zum Ende des Spiels ist es möglich, Schaden im Millionenbereich zu verursachen. Die dahinterliegende Mathematik versuche ich nicht mal im Ansatz zu verstehen, sondern verlasse mich auf mein Gefühl, das mich schon durch die Vorgänger gelotst hat: In jedem Gebiet gibt es ein, zwei dominante Schwächen, die alle Gegner haben. Dementsprechend rüstet man seine Party mit Items aus, die potenziell den meisten Schaden beim Feind verursachen und das hereinkommende Unheil reduzieren, wobei die Umgebung große Hinweise auf das gibt, was zu erwarten ist. So weiß ich, dass ich in einer Schneelandschaft dicke Kleidung anziehe, um meine Gruppe gegen Kälteschaden zu rüsten, während ich ihnen brennende Waffen in die Hand drücke. Da oben drauf kommt das neu eingeführte Wettersystem, welches das Schlachtfeld beeinflusst - leider fällt dieses Feature nie groß auf, da die Wettereffekte das Kampfgeschehen nur unmaßgeblich beeinflussen. Manchmal fällt ne Bombe vom Himmel. Eine laue Brise weht und bufft Freund und Feind. Netter Ansatz, aber in der Umsetzung noch nicht ganz ausgereift, wie ich finde. Nicht gefallen hat mir, dass die Charaktere zu großen Teilen die selben Skills wie im Vorgänger hat, wodurch es mir vorkam, als würde ich einen vom Hauptspiel gelösten DLC spielen. Schön fand ich es, dass NoLegs endlich ein spielbarer Charakter geworden ist, der die Gruppe sinnvoll ergänzt hat.

Ein zweites neues Feature ist das Fangen von Monstern, die damit die Summons der vorherigen Teile ersetzt haben. Abseits einiger Achievements fand ich das System eher öde. Man prügelt einen Mob auf niedrige HP und wirft eine Kiste nach ihm. Super. Klar, man kann damit auch die Bosse fangen, allerdings macht es die Mechanik auch nicht spannender. Bis auf wenige Beispiele sind die meisten Viecher eher sinnlos - wenn man Glück hat, braucht man sie für eine Quest, ansonsten geraten die Gefangenen schnell in Vergessenheit. 

Es ist schon eine Weile her, dass ich EBF4 gespielt habe, aber ich habe das unbestimmte Gefühl, dass bei den Rätseln ordentlich abgebaut wurde. Ich glaube mich daran zu erinnern, dass ich im Vorgänger öfter vor Kopfnüssen gestanden habe, als im Nachfolger. Kann sein, dass die meisten Rätsel in die optionalen Dungeons verlagert worden sind, denn da hat die Dichte an Hirnfutter wieder ordentlich zugenommen. In der Hauptwelt war ich leider hauptsächlich damit beschäftigt, von A nach B zu laufen, um irgendwelche MacGuffins von Podesten zu nehmen. Kleinere Rätsel hier und da haben hauptsächlich dazu gedient, mir Zugang zu Kisten zu verschaffen, von denen es erneut einen ganzen Arsch voll gibt.

Trotz der Meckerei hat mir Epic Battle Fantasy 5 gut gefallen. Die Dialoge haben mir Spaß bereitet, der Humor hat für mich gut funktioniert. Musikalisch ist das Ding wieder ganz groß und der Bonuscontent dürfte Hardcorespieler (zu denen ich mich nicht zähle) eine ganze Weile bei der Stange halten, selbst wenn das Hauptspiel bereits abgeschlossen ist. Die Bonusdungeons und die optionalen Schwierigkeitsgrade werden dafür sorgen, dass jeder die Herausforderung bekommt, die er erwartet - mir hat Normal schon völlig ausgereicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038619727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2114, 'last_played': 1567811896}

author: {'steamid': '76561197995417364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 6188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3822, 'last_played': 1568612899}
review:
This game is a joy. Hilarious, charming and light-hearted but has a combat system with depth that rivals many "serious" RPGs. 

The author has added tons of bonus dungeons that are tough and require maximizing resist, element and debuff choices. Your average filthy casual will never need to take it that far on normal difficulty, but if you play on Hard or Epic, the depth and challenge ramp up superbly without it ever feeling "cheap".

What I also love is there's no gameplay mechanics, like random encounters, to drag out length. (okay, there's a few, but so few they won't bother you). Progression never feels grindy. 

Crafting items and upgrading of spells is pretty standard, and if that's your focus there's better out there. I tend to find overly complex crafting systems cumbersome, but to each their own. EBF 5 is simple and that's more my style.

All in all, EBF 5 is a near perfect indie game. It's what an indie game should be: it expresses the creator's vision clearly. It never has a "designed by committee" feeling. It never feels like the humor went through five layers of marketing approval. And you always feel like you got way more than you paid for, not like the dev is trying to squeeze every nickel out of your pocket via upgrades and DLC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079597946', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2545, 'last_played': 1709112473}
review:
When the only complaints I have is that the jokes are slightly less funny and have less punch then Epic Battle Fantasy 3 and that I don't really like the main menu, you know it's a great time. 10 out of 10, hands down amazing, fun, and never seems to get boring unless you decide to grind. (Which you'll never need to do)

You can play on easy or normal difficulties without much trouble except for maybe a boss fight if you're new.
The highest difficulty is challenging but fair. No BS to artificially inflate the difficulty.
Simple to learn, fun to master.
The new cooldown system is much less abusable then the Mana system in the last few games but is arguably less fun.
The capture system is simple and effective.
The final boss seems straight forward, but suddenly you find yourself in a existential crisis over the fate of more then just 1 reality.
Has just the right amount of Nukes and their magical equivalents. This game has the Gandhi Seal of Approval.

Once again Phynna has done great work on the soundtrack and I would pay for the sound track and more of her songs if I had spare money to do so. I'm hoping that one day Matt makes an EBF game using all of the best music from previous games.
I do wish 2 favorite songs from EBF3 (Sisters of Snow Decent - Lost and Forgotten) were included somewhere but the maker never reuses old songs (Though I love the fact that Estavius has gotten a remake in every game since 3. Always sounds great and is practically the theme song for the series at this point.)

Would Highly Recommend every game in the series and is probably my favorite game series of all time. If you don't normally like RPGs or Turn Based games you can play the free version on the creator's site (kupogames) or any other free gaming site to try before you buy. But it's well worth the cost.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143795332', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4689, 'last_played': 1711130586}

author: {'steamid': '76561198438121975', 'num_games_owned': 2321, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1567508894}
review:
10/10
+各种（战斗，养成）系统复杂有深度
+各种有意思的梗非常耐人寻味
+穿插其中恰到好处的解密
+画风卡通简单而不失真实
+存档方便灵活无bug
-节奏太慢，动画不能跳过，刷级不能自动挑战
我个人是不怎么喜欢类似日式rpg游戏的，但是这个游戏真的很优秀。希望对这类游戏有兴趣的玩家不要错过了，绝对物超所值。

author: {'steamid': '76561198416430881', 'num_games_owned': 123, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 5779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1783, 'last_played': 1654295104}
review: So lets start this with me saying i realy but realy love EBF series i got over 35h on EBF 3 and only 18h on EBF 4 wich il make even more since il be doing Epic re-run of the whole game. But lets say EBF 5 got the new feel of no MP in game and the fact you need play on turns is just interesting so if you fuck up one move you are done and thats what i like actualy. Lets say i am still going to spend hours in both EBF 4 and 5 since after both games will be done on epic il move one the hardest thing and that will be il do 100% run of EBF 3,4,5. Many can now ask "Why ?" well lets just say i realy love those games and they deserve my time. If you want to support Matt and Phyrnna consider buying the 4€ soundtrack DLC and even the EBF 3,4,5 the songs are amazing and the game is like drugs if you play it once you can't stop.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198026559664', 'num_games_owned': 576, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1562, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1281, 'last_played': 1570799278}
review:
I don't often leave reviews, but this game blew me away. At first I thought it was some shitty flash game ported onto Steam for some reason, but lo and behold, this is one of the best RPG games I've ever played, possibly the best. Combat in an RPG is the most important thing to me, and this game has the best battle system and mechanics that I have ever seen in an RPG, full stop. For that reason alone it deserves at least an 8/10.

But not only is the combat perfect, the puzzles are great, the writing is funny, the animations are great, the fanservice is great, the extra areas are cool, summons are cool, equipment is varied and plentiful even up to the endgame...just everything about this game is goddamn perfect. It is simply one of the best video games I have ever played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198949497368', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 994, 'last_played': 1566146008}
review:
习惯性好评。
前期玩得挺开心的，但是越玩越乏力。明明是普通难度却感觉很难。
后期遇到小怪第二批怪物先手，一人被集火就被秒了，救人拉起来再被对面打一套又是非死即残...不然就是遇到大象一屁股坐下去直接被秒...装备技能有升级，补品有吃的情况下我是不知道为什么会这样。
遇到boss就更难打，boss一招冲撞把三人打成残血，然后小怪补刀就必死了...

author: {'steamid': '76561198049966706', 'num_games_owned': 486, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 16462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5307, 'last_played': 1705151178}
review: If your not familiar with EBF series, I recommend grabbing the third, its free on steam and sites like Kongregate. The mana system is thrown out in this iteration and insteads opts for a cooldown system, it had taken some time to get used to after playing the last 2 games back to back, but doesn't become intrusive. The gameplay is easy to pick up and understand, but leaves room for mastery incase you want to fully stat yourself out. Plenty of puzzles in this game to give your brain a tease. Is a good game if you like hoarding, collecting, and catching everything within sight. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198016614557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1461, 'last_played': 1657381572}
review: 欢乐向传统回合制RPG。看起来非常一般，可玩性确出人意料的高。同时这个游戏的汉化水平之高让我一直以为是国产出品。 各种花式吐槽玩梗完全看不出翻译的痕迹。 除了flash制作有时会导致帧数降低以外没有发现其他缺点。强烈推荐并向作者致敬！

author: {'steamid': '76561198042382363', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 3576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3576, 'last_played': 1565625806}
review:

买游戏后，一口气玩到底。

author: {'steamid': '76561198973453559', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1817, 'last_played': 1575686922}
review:
游戏性非常优秀，玩得非常爽。
音乐很有特色。
画面比较一般（小团队制作，能够理解），剧情很一般。
游戏制作者很懂玩家，我玩起来觉得没有什么麻烦，因为能够随时切换难度，敌人属性在战斗中可以查看，能随时存档，战后补给几乎可以忽略。
大部分怪物（包括大部分BOSS）都能抓满足了我的收集癖。
看到有的评论说抓怪很困难，这是没掌握方法。
抓怪：需要提高抓怪概率的装备+抓怪方加幸运加命中+被抓的怪物减躲避上Debuff，
毛毛虫堪称抓怪神器。

author: {'steamid': '76561198817144914', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5288, 'last_played': 1676976672}
review: 小型游戏的巅峰

author: {'steamid': '76561198010914430', 'num_games_owned': 1629, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 17697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8558, 'last_played': 1656785336}
review:
＊同シリーズの過去作品も日本語対応をお願いします。これは切実なお願いです。＊

翻訳のデキがよくて、キャラクターごとの性格付けがはっきりと分かる。
アンナたちグリーンウッドの人々を、
いろんな方言のごった煮にしたのも素晴らしい。大好き。
ちょっとしたやりとりなのに、妙にしんみりしたり、
切り返しの妙でくすっときたり、
ここは本当に翻訳者の手柄。

さて、戦闘だけんども、
モンスターの属性に合わせて細かく装備やスキルを組み替えるのが、
楽しいと思えるか面倒くさいと思えるか・・・。
最適な装備で中ボスに挑んでも、バフ＆デバフ合戦や
超会心での即死があると、立て直すだけで時間がかかる。
結果的に長時間の戦闘を繰り返してじわじわ話をすすめていくので、
テンポだけ考えたらほうとうにかったるいし、精神的にも疲れる。
ただそれを補ってあまりあるほど、楽しめるように作られているし、
ちょっとした仕掛けがてんこもりで、飽きさせない。
あーつかれた。と思いつつも、次の日また起動している。そういうゲーム。

author: {'steamid': '76561198446463553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 14190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 4067, 'last_played': 1711856987}
review:
Es precioso, sigo diciendo lo mismo y supongo que no lo diré más si esa lápida con los sueños y esperanzas de que salga un EBF6 es real, pero de mientras, JUEGAZO.

Se sigue notando que es un juego que tiene mucho cariño, que hay ganas dentro de su desarrollo con todo el detalle que acostumbra a tener la saga en cada entrega.

Siendo sincero, me asustó mucho el inicio del juego ya que todos pierden sus recuerdos y es un empezar de 0 nuevamente sin que se conozcan los personajes de nada y no podía dejar de pensar en que me iba a disgustar muchísimo sabiendo lo cómico que es el grupo ya siendo medio cercano, pero sea como sea, es que es lo mismo, igual de divertidos, mantienen sus personalidades y con todo el dialogo extra y demás, hay HORAS de diversión sólo en los diálogos como es la saga que sí, es un juego, pero para mí, lo principal que caracteriza la saga ver una historia muy divertida con personajes muy queribles tanto de secundario como primario que ya tienes para elegir. Ya con la introducción de Sin Patas al equipo, de verdad creí que estaría de segundón, pero no ... ni R2D2 ni Pickachu, ni nada, SIN PATAS best personaje que no necesita hablar un idioma en concreto para ser de lo mejor que hay. (igualmente me agradaba más Scanbot que él #TeamScanbotEBF6)

El sistema de batalla, ya es perfecto en mi opinión, ya no está eso de tener 20 habilidades de nivel principiante para que puedas usar las de experto, ahora la desbloqueas y listo, no hay más requerimientos, dejando el sistema de habilidades más sencillo, intuitivo y cómodo con ese único cambio ... bueno, hay otro, pero, para más abajo.

El sonido es genial y cuenta con detalles pequeños, pero sumamente apreciables y que lo hacen mejor que la media. Más allá de los sonidos convencionales de cada habilidad, algo que me fascinó es el hecho de que depende de qué armadura lleves o la que lleve el enemigo siendo de roca, metal o lo que venga, será distinto el sonido al recibir un ataque, es poco, pero es un detalle que se aprecia y agradece para un juego con tanto cuidado y cariño.

La música de cada área, genial, quizás no sean muchos temas, pero seguramente tendrás una favorita

Los puzzles, cofres ocultos y demás detalles de mapeado para las zonas así como zonas ocultas, han mejorado muchísimo, se ve hermoso y más que nada los puzzles que son más desafiantes y peor para gente como yo con muy limitada capacidad mental que siendo sincero, el logro de desencriptador lo saqué de pura suerte, más nada. También cabe mencionar los escenarios con mensajes ocultos que a veces cambian sutilmente frente a ti y por más que sea un juego de humor y rpg ... da la sensación de que algo terrible va a pasar o de que un screamer va a saltar en algún momento, es raro sentir tensión en un juego así, pero es interesante cuanto menos sentir esa tensión en los escenarios oscuros, silenciosos y macabros en un juego de apariencia inocente y family friendly.

El dialogo ... wow, de verdad, gracias y mil gracias por más, sinceramente podría ser texto e imágenes de libro de cuentos antiguos como tiene de arte y ya pagaría por ello. 
La introducción de más texto a ese grupo de locos le vino genial, ya no sólo por batalla, ataques y cosas en el escenario, ahora es por el tipo de armas y armaduras que cada personaje lleve que desbloquea más conversaciones que valen la pena simplemente.

Ésta saga nunca fue de proponer desafíos a menos que uno lo quisiera, es más de una historia para pasarla bien con bromas y un pequeño problema para que tuviera sentido poder ver a estos personajes tan divertidos, pero se nota que entre las versiones malignas del 4 el nuevo diosgato y el antagonista principal, o vas bien equipado o te revolcarán por el piso de principio a fin y es de agradecer, aunque sea el típico jefe que intimida más por tener más puntos de vida que todos tus personajes juntos.

La de referencias que ya no son romper la 4°a sino que no existe ya, son muy buenas, desde el inicio con Matt hasta el la pelea final que ... bueno, digamos que la pasas en la mayor dificultad y ya uno se siente realizado, ni que decir con las copias de los personajes que eran nada en la entrega anterior, ahora es uno más detestable que el anterior y te juro que no me importa que sea lo que dislumbran como Dios o su música hermosa en la batalla, lo ahorcaría luego de muerto a esa cosa amarilla pos jefe abusivo final.

Ya del final ... bueno, ahora sabemos qué pasó con cada uno y la genial forma de volver a empezar el juego de forma tan esporádica, pero es bueno ver el final de cada uno con su vida luego de todo lo pasado, esa friendzone a Lance se veía venir desde su aparición.

Y ya hablando de lo ''malo'' porque siendo lo que es, es casi nulo a comparación de todo lo que engloba éste juegazo, no sé si en dificultades más altas o si sólo soy muy ciego, pero ... ¿qué pasó con el maná? digo, todo bien, pero aunque sea un detalle ínfimo, me extraña que quitasen eso o que quizás soy demasiado bruto para verlo y está ahí, pero me extraña sabiendo que algo de dificultad le daba al juego ya que había en el anterior los perros sagrados que robaban maná, no sé, sea como sea, es algo que falta, pero ni le suma ni le resta importancia. 

Ya por lo demás, nada, habilidades balanceadas, nuevos estatus buffeados y nerfeados, sonidos divertidos, humor aumentado, mismo filtro family friendly, mismos logros divertidos y mil cosas más además de una dificultad que a menos que quieras, es desafiante.
No sé qué venga en la expansión grande que se avecina, pero de algo estoy seguro ... ¿quieres una historia divertida con personajes geniales y un sistema de batalla que destroza a cualquier otro rpg en todo a un precio sumamente razonable sin DLC´S? compra, juega y disfruta que no vas a pensarte ni un segundo reembolsar semejante juego.

Hablando de la expansión que es eso, una expansión con todas las letras (por más que encarezca el juego un poco más, pero de forma totalmente justa) lo vuelvo a decir: ¡QUÉ GANAS LE PONEN AL JUEGO! más monstruos, logros, (que completé todos de enfermo) zonas, retos, puzzles, habilidades, limites, ropa sumamente sexualizada, referencias a Newgrounds, cofres y 2 cosas que me llamaron bastante la atención.

Las cartas, que son 50 en total y te dan ciertos beneficios a tus criaturas y a la banda, de forma pasiva y de forma leve, además de ser un logro en si el encontrarlas todas, también tienen descripciones divertidísimas.

Las áreas árcade, si eres atento, verás monstruos esconderse al entrar a un sitio del mapa, si los sigues, te llevarán a un sitio oculto con una maquinita en la que si la tocas, saltará el enemigo previamente visto que será como un jefe oculto, si los vences, te darán una recompensa que también puede ser una carta de monstruo. (suerte con la calabaza)

Y para todo aquel que quiera más retos, ahora llegó la partida custom para que el juego sea más interesante al poder jugar únicamente con un sólo personaje o 2 o 3 depende, también que toquen en cofres y en tu build inicial, armas y armaduras de forma aleatoria, lo mismo con las habilidades dentro de los cofres y poco más, no es la gran cosa.

También se implementaron los desafíos y ''hacks'' y uno que otro cambio de mecánica, de hecho, hay algunos que están permitidos para hacerte la vida algo más fácil para sacar los logros como tener todos los cofres y si no, si quieres capturar bichos, puedes desactivar legalmente la opción de auto ataque por parte de efectos especiales de la ropa o armas.
ya luego en los retos, todo lo contrario, buffos enemigos, menos salud tuya y aumento de la suya, que por cada ataque te devuelvan golpes y mil cosas más.

Ah y algo genial, si tenías una partida guardada, no importa, puedes progresar normalmente aunque estés en el final del juego sin ningún problema.

Nuevamente, gran juego y gran creador.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217659875', 'num_games_owned': 375, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 5976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3700, 'last_played': 1630489469}
review: 谜一样的令人着迷

author: {'steamid': '76561198076290934', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 3500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3500, 'last_played': 1564360710}
review:
El mejor Epic Battle Fantasy de todos.

Tiene más cosas nuevas y más cambios que la mayoría de juegos triple A de la industria y todas hacen que el juego mejor sea de lo que ya era. Son tantos que, si alguien ya se familiarizó con la saga, lo encontrará similar pero a la vez lo verá todo nuevo.


¿Por qué?

Primeramente, ya tan solo empezar, veremos como se efectúa un "reinicio" en la historia.
Matt está jugando tranquilamente a la consola cuando decide salir de casa y poco a poco va conociendo al resto de personajes y estos tienen una actitud más distante entre ellos y a veces muy distinta a la original.

Por ejemplo: Lance era un personaje pesimista pero pervertido, aquí sigue siéndolo pero más frío y repulsivo hacia los demás. Puede parecer una tontería, pero al ver también que su nuevo tanque también es mucho más "moderno" y atractivo, se puede ver  que hay una "evolución" de los personajes pero manteniendo su esencia.

Y eso que solo hemos hablado de la historia y personajes.



Hablemos del gameplay:

Se ha retirado para siempre la barra de maná. 
Ahora las habilidades de los personajes tienen cooldowns (algunas no). 
Esto hace que, por una parte, que no haya que preocuparse nunca más del maná que nos hacían comer magdalenas cuando se terminaba. Sin embargo, esto de que hayan coodowns en las habilidades me parece un gran acierto ya que algunas skills como las bombas de Lance estaban demasiado OP al spamearse sin parar y ahora el misil negro (que por cierto se llama M.O.A.B.) tiene un CD de 10 turnos, que es una barbaridad.


Por otra parte: las mascotas.
Ahora cualquier enemigo puede ser tu mascota si lo capturas. Incluye jefes.
Me ha encantado esto porque en EBF 4 habían muchas mascotas que no me gustaban y acababa usando las 4 de siempre. Aquí pasa más o menos lo mismo, con la diferencia que es mucho más divertido capturarlas. Funciona igual que en Pokemon pero sin master balls: baja la vida a un enemigo, añádele efectos de estado como Congelar o Paralizar y captura segura.


Espera que aún hay más: el contenido post-game ahora se divide por mazmorras.
Viene a ser igual que EBF 4 pero todo mucho mejor hecho, con muchos más enemigos, rompecabezas, jefes difíciles, tesoros ocultos, secretos, etc. Además al final existe un modo de oleadas de enemigos infinitas para los fans de los primeros Epic Battle Fantasy. El contenido es tan grande y abrumador que 12,50 € parecerá un chiste para la cantidad de horas que ofrece.
Con las 58 horas que he jugado, aún me quedan como casi la mitad de las medallas por conseguir.


Y hablando de dificultad, es el EBF más difícil de todos.
Sigue siendo fácil al principio para que el jugador se adapte al juego, pero a menudo que avanza, se va a encontrar jefes y desafíos realmente duros. Mirad si es chungo el final, que al llegar a la última zona, te encuentras en un cofre 99 cafés (y no es difícil de encontrar ese cofre).





Podría estar así lineas y lineas de dialogo, pero en resumen podríamos decir que todo ha mejorado mucho:
- Enemigos más poderosos.
- Recompensas más satisfactorias.
- Rompecabezas más mareantes.
- Contenido más inmenso.
- SinPatas ya parece un gato y es jugable.
- Matt tiene más pechugas para comer.
- Nattalie también tiene más pechuga (pero no para comer).
- Lance es más hombre.
- Pero Anna no es más mujer (esto se arregla con el traje de vaca).


Dejando ya los chistes de tet*s, tengo que decir que POR FIN el juego ya va bien en sentido a gráficos.
Ya puedo poner el juego a tope de resolución y pantalla completa sin me dé crashes ni ningún otro problema. Así da gusto ver el Kyun a 4K.

¡OK DIJE QUE PARABA YA CON ESTOS CHISTES!
Lo que importa es que todo lo malo de los anteriores se ha arreglado, de las 58 horas que llevo ni uno solo problema de rendimiento.







Resumen:

*LO BUENO
- El mejor de la saga. Los cambios le sientan fenomenales.
- Historia, personajes y humor de 10.
- El más desafiante, pero el inicio sigue siendo fácil y accesible.
- Mucho más contenido y nunca se hace aburrido.
- Los enemigos son más grandes!
- Las tet... ¡¡¡YA VALE!!!

*LO MALO
- El juego no se, pero mi estúpido Flanders interior me dijo que desactivase los Escotes desde el menú opciones.



En fin, que más motivos necesitáis?

Este juego lo tiene todo, es divertidísimo, baratísimo y el creador dice desde su Patreón que quiere ir actualizando el juego constantemente.

Si acaso, recomendaría jugar primero a los anteriores, empezando por el 3 que es gratis. El 1º y el 2º no los recomiendo tanto porque son solo peleas y no están en Steam aunque los podéis encontrar en Internet ya que son juegos flash gratuitos.

2019 8/8 追記
攻略情報があまりにも少ないので、良かったら参考に。
・実績を100％にすると行ける場所がある・・・が、初遭遇の仲間との戦闘勝利条件（降伏させる等）を取り逃しやすいので注意。
・お金は最終的に余りまくるので足りない素材はガンガン買おう。パラメータUPアイテムは購入するたびに価格が倍になるので、資金が尽きない程度に適宜投資しよう。
・敵を捕獲するのに重要なポイントは、敵の回避率を下げること。

author: {'steamid': '76561198049015550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4068, 'last_played': 1635019776}
review:
This game is great.  If you don't mind your story a little loose and comical, there is a lot of depth to Epic Battle Fantasy 5.

The game is clearly a labor of love.  I'm 64 hours in and haven't completed everything yet.  I have been doing a lot of side bonus dungeons and boss fights though while avoiding the last fight ... but you know how it goes if you are an RPG fan.

The combat is where the game really shines.  The balance between the different gear pieces is very well thought out and deciding how and when to upgrade each piece to create sets that allow you to survive the different elements brought by each enemy and boss encounter make the game stand out among a massive pile of "cheese your way through"  turn-based RPGs.  In this game you will need to juggle buffs and debuffs, while controlling your enemies through a large number of status-causing abilities and debuff skills in addition to setting up great combos for insane damage (I still haven't figured out the 10 million in one hit trick... but I will!).

To be fair, I have played since the beginning on Epic difficulty, but that is how I played EBF4 as well, and it adds a lot more challenge and fun to the game for me.   There is also the option to turn the difficulty all the way down to 25% for those who are just here for the wise-crackin' and light-hearted comedy that is prevalent in the EBF games.

If you like turn-based RPGs, this game is a must-have.  I recommend it to everyone that I know who plays any type of Final Fantasy style game.  This game deserves to have a much bigger player base than it has.  

Support this developer because we need more like him!

author: {'steamid': '76561198109085446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1659, 'last_played': 1563680854}
review:
While the game is technically fine it does suffer from two big issues. 
First, the game play is identical to EBF3 and 4, they try to change things up by adding No Legs as a character and adding weather conditions; but even on Epic difficulty those things can be ignored as they don't have much of an impact.

Second, is the games style of humor. I get that crass and crude jokes are part of the series, as I mentioned I have played EBF 3 and 4. However in those games the jokes were for the most part good fun and sometimes even made me laugh. This game however goes to far with  a lot of these jokes. I am not sorry to say that I do not find jokes about kidnapping, rape, child abuse, animal abuse, and ptsd funny. 
It is mostly for this second reason that I cannot bring myself to finish the game, and cannot recommend the game.
